author: {'steamid': '76561197968358627', 'num_games_owned': 747, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 76, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 76, 'last_played': 1710951119}
review: It's rare when I buy a game so heavily discounted and still feel it's not worth the price. This plays like a flash game from the early 00s. But not in a cool throwback sort of way. More like in a "some things should be left in the past" sort of way. Maybe I quit before it gets to the good part. But if that's the case, then I can say with confidence that this didn't put its best foot forward.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985133181', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 51, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1711408087}
review:
This game is bad. It was created in a hurry by a young solo developer and it shows. Mullins' other games are worthwhile but this one is just hyperactive teenage edginess, clumsy puzzles, and hostile design. Yes, very clever, you made an obnoxious droning noise I can't disable without muting my whole system. 

This game was so bad I requested a refund of the 79 cents I paid for it and still feel ripped off.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970395722', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 399, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 251, 'playtime_at_review': 399, 'last_played': 1711410018}
review:
For those looking for a unique gaming experience, look no further than Pony Island. Crafted by Daniel Mullins, this debut title serves as a fascinating introduction to his design philosophy. To avoid spoilers (the game's best experienced blind), expect a meta adventure that playfully breaks down the boundaries between player and game. Simple puzzles take on a deeper meaning as a more complex narrative unfolds, one that subverts initial impressions.

Visually, the game takes inspiration from the Commodore 64 era, but with a sinister twist. Glitching and distorted graphics create an unsettling atmosphere, occasionally hinting at a hidden world lurking beneath the surface. 

Clocking in at 2-3 hours, Pony Island offers a unique blend of light puzzling and some very unique moments. Check it out f you're seeking a thought-provoking experience that defies categorization.

author: {'steamid': '76561198212694589', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1709460107}
review:
Pony Island это не просто игра, это целое ПОНИключение!
Когда впервые услышал об этой игре, мои ожидания были ПОНИжены до минимума, но как же я ошибался, ведь они ПОНИмножку росли!
С первых минут она заставит вас ПОНИервничать, ведь разгадывать ее тайны в компании загадочных пони – удовольствие не из легких. Геймплей так захватывает, что время пролетает незаметно, будто вы на спине волшебного пони мчитесь над облаками. Разработчики создали этот шедевр с такой изобретательностью и заботой, что, несмотря на все тёмные уголки истории, вы испытаете бурю ПОНИзитивных эмоций.  Графика и сюжет заставляют сердце биться чаще, а уникальные головоломки не дадут вам скучать. Эта игра не только для ПОНИмающих свое дело геймеров, но и для тех, кто просто хочет получить удовольствие от качественно сделанной игры.  Запустите эту игру, и ПОНИслась!

He descubierto este juego en 2024 y joder, ha sido una experiencia súper satisfactoria. Cuanto menos sepas de este juego mejor. Simplemente si tienes la oportunidad de jugarlo, hazlo. 

Para quien solo pueda jugarlo en Steam Deck: La experiencia se hace muy incómoda, lo intenté durante unos treinta minutos y decidí pasarme al pc. Si aun así quieres jugarlo en la deck, te recomiendo que conectes ratón y teclado para que la experiencia sea mucho mejor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064969282', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1711139262}
review:
Pony Island is more or less a puzzle game with some side scrolling components to it. The best part of the game is the chaotic story that develops as you delve deeper into Pony Island. 

The game is extremely short, even for the price. I believe that it's worth grabbing as part of the bundles that are offered, though.

The graphics and soundtrack are also phenomenal, although only if you enjoy the retro aesthetic. I think with the plot and audio and visual aesthetic, this game is a clear example of "games as art".

If you've played Inscryption, you're likely to enjoy this as it does include some ideas that are further developed in Inscryption.

author: {'steamid': '76561199327176567', 'num_games_owned': 98, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1711090218}
review:
Finished it all on one sitting and I have to say, this game did not disappoint one bit.
It's fairly cheap, so there's not much to expect, especially when I bought this on sale, but I have to admit that I was expecting a lot already when the creator of this game is one of the best examples of how it looks like when one pours their heart and soul into their craft.

I was totally in love and satisfied with my purchase and had a great time with the game.
I wasn't sure what to expect from the game itself, period, as I didn't look much into it other than the fact the game looks gnarly and knowing the developer.

But it did not disappoint one bit. I loved the ending sequences so much, and the little mystery and story to the game even.

All I have to say is that the "bugs", the "features" the "glitches" and ESPECIALLY the end sequences, with the few final battles were one of THE BEST experiences I've had with any game, it made me smile so much and god do I yearn for MORE games like these, I bought this game as well, knowing- that after watching the game awards a few weeks back, I remember Pony Island 2 will be coming out; so I thought to myself, why not?

I heavily recommend these for any fans who love psychological horror, some interesting concepts, or ARG.

I also just wanted to mention that for [spoiler] the Act III Demon Boss, please do not question why, but the first thing I thought in my head was "Sexy Armpits" as soon as they mentioned something disgusting and vile, and laughed my ass off when I saw the ONLY person who I never once interacted with on Steam to be there messaging me- that actually made me jump and freak out a little. God, I love that little scare, kudos. [/spoiler]

review: Really enjoyed Insryption so I decided to check out Daniel's other games. Really enjoyed this one. Short and sweet and has a lot of the same type of design choices and charm of inscryption. I am looking forward to number 2!

author: {'steamid': '76561198002559680', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 173, 'playtime_forever': 489, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 489, 'last_played': 1710980679}
review:
Tbh I was never interested in this game. Just bought a game called Inscryption and because of that I got a copy of Pony Island... honestly a game with a name like this didn't seem interesting to me and I'm also not a fan of YouTubers to know anything about it beforehand.

Inscryption was really nice and after watching the announcement for Pony Island 2 I decided to give this first game a try, it was a cool experience and going into it blindly was definitely the right call.

Can’t say much without giving away spoilers (and this game is very sensitive to spoilers) but all you need to play it is some very basic programming knowledge (I mean REALLY BASIC, so don’t worry) and that's it. Enjoy your early 2010s creepypasta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198843130701', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1694358955}
review: 在steam上玩的第一个游戏，作为meta类游戏属实让我大开眼界，虽说没有中文但是也能勉勉强强的看懂游戏内容，游戏内容也很十分不错，可以无脑入

author: {'steamid': '76561199017234514', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 104, 'last_played': 1703394481}
review:
Sin hablar del argumento ni historia de este por que perdería parte del encanto del juego, es un gran juego, genera intriga interés la mayoría de los puzzles por lo menos te harán pensar unos minutos, es entretenido,  visualmente cumple y evoca a lo que trata de ilustrar, a los juegos arcades, (también esos momento de lucidez...), los logros son una excusa para rejugar y prestar aún más atención a los detalles del juego, vale la pena por el precio así sea relativamente corto, es una muy buena experiencia. 

9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197965485692', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1710447532}
review: Played and was blown away by Inscryption so thought I'd check out Dave Mullins' back catalogue. Pony Island is the first one I've tried and I thoroughly enjoyed it. The game mechanics are very simple, alternating from simple 2d autorun platforming and fairly basic puzzles, connecting together a very engaging story. It's short, but feels a perfect length, feeling statisfying and yet not outstaying it's welcome. You can see the genesis of ideas that would later be greater expanded upon in Inscyption and does not reach the heights of that game, but as it is smaller in scope, and cheaper, it doesnt have to be. Very satisfying way to spend two hours and I completed it in one sitting.

author: {'steamid': '76561199484298111', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1710557233}
review: Pony Island is one of the most unique games I've ever played. I've never finished a game and said “wow” as I completed it. The in-game hacking feature is such a trip, it made me second guess whether it was actually the game or if I was getting hacked by Satan himself. The game has challenging puzzles that are fun and satisfying to solve, the graphics are enjoyable, it has a retro feel, the music is so good I had to buy the soundtrack as soon as I completed it, and on top of it all the achievements are fun to attain. The final end sequence was so climactic it absolutely blew me away. I've never played a Satanically themed game before and I instantly fell in love. Sure, the Lightbringer is trying to steal our souls, but isn't that part of the fun? We even get to kill jesus christ which is always a huge plus for me! Hail Satan! Hail Pony Island!

author: {'steamid': '76561198418355447', 'num_games_owned': 316, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 153, 'last_played': 1709486119}
review:
[h1]Pony Island[/h1]
es un videojuego que desafía las normas tradicionales y te sumerge en una aventura inquietante y llena de sorpresas. Con una combinación de elementos de rompecabezas y suspenso, este juego te mantiene cautivado de principio a fin, desafiando tus habilidades y tu percepción de la realidad virtual. La forma en que el juego rompe la cuarta pared es impresionante, llevando la interacción entre el jugador y la historia a un nivel completamente nuevo.

En resumen, Pony Island no es solo un videojuego, es una experiencia inmersiva y [b]PERTURBADORA[/b] que desafía las convenciones y redefine la forma de interacción con los videojuegos. Sus ingeniosos puzzles, su narrativa única y su valentía para explorar nuevas ideas lo convierten en una opción fascinante para aquellos que busquen algo más que la norma establecida.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3175442097 
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3175442342 
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3175442825

author: {'steamid': '76561198282148408', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1710243027}
review:
Pony Island è un piccolo cult nel mondo videoludico, lo riconosco. Riconosco che Mullins è un grande sviluppatore, con idee che vanno spesso fuori dagli schemi ed un modo di fare particolare ed esagerato, cosa che io apprezzo. Di fatti, ho giocato a Pony Island dopo aver finito ed amato quel CAPOLAVORO di Inscryption (con cui ovviamente non ho fatto paragoni, sia perché son giochi diversi sia perché naturalmente l'esperienza accumulata nel corso degli anni, ha permesso a Mullins di perfezionare il suo modo di fare)

Pony Island non è un brutto gioco, ha un'idea di base interessante, un mood inquietante ed una buona dose di follia ma onestamente l'ho trovato noioso e poco stimolante.
L'idea del cabinato impossessato è carina e divertente sulla carta ma, non son riuscito ad immedesimarmici, dovuto al fatto che le fasi di gioco fossero noiose abbastanza "meh".
Le fasi di "gameplay" in cui controlleremo il pony le ho trovate noiose: certo, non sono il core del gioco e ovviamente sono volutamente fatte così, ma mi hanno davvero fatto cagare.
I rompicapo, in cui "hackereremo" il gioco sono interessanti, vero, forse l'aspetto più interessante del gioco.
Per il resto c'è il nulla: cerca di sconvolgere o di rompere la quarta parete e più o meno ci riesce... ma non posso farci niente, l'ho trovato una cagata.

Non so effettivamente cosa dire, dura poco e son contento cosi: capisco che sia un gioco apprezzato e va benissimo così, il mondo è bello perché è vario. 
Alla fine l'importante è che ci si diverta, cosa che con me Pony Island non ha fatto neanche lontanamente.

PRO:
- I rompicapo sono interessanti
- A tratti esagerato... ma a tratti

CONTRO:
- Noioso sotto letteralmente ogni aspetto

Voto: 4

review: I found the game play loop of the code puzzles extremely tiresome and not fun after the 9th or 10th iteration. I'm glad Daniel Mullins was able to build an actually fun game play loop in Inscryption's card game to embed the story.

author: {'steamid': '76561199039076499', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 405, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 405, 'last_played': 1702979589}
review:
[h1]Дорогая принцесса Селестия. Сегодня я поняла, что продавать свою душу, не самое лучшее решение в моей жизни.[/h1]
[h3]Вкратце:[/h3] Вы поддерживаете довольно старого, [b]НО[/b] очень не опытного разработчика игр. 

[h3]Чуть длиннее, чем вкратце:[/h3]Правда у вас возникает ощущение, что эта игра чисто для высасывания [strike][spoiler]вашей души[/spoiler][/strike] ваших денег. Игра не доделана, Ассеты все бесплатные. В общем Яндере симулятор, но вместо аниме девочек - пони. И вот вы, разочаровавшись в игре, хотите перестать отдавать [spoiler][strike][b]СВОЮ ДУШУ[/b][/strike][/spoiler] свои деньги. Но тут, сразу появляется разработчик и начинает уговаривать вас остаться. Говорит что и план у него есть и что плюшки для донатеров будут. В общем кормит обещаниями. Как хорошо, что вы не глупы, поэтому не верите ему. [spoiler]фанаты Яндере симулятора, что с лицом?[/spoiler]
Как же вам повезло, что помимо вас негодует большая часть "фан базы". И вот объединившись с ними, вы смогли вырваться из цепких лап разработчика. Остается лишь удалить игру. Конец.
P.S. Тот кто пишет во время игры - чмоня!!

review:
何も情報を入れずに楽しんでほしいゲームです。
ひさびさにやりたくなって日本語翻訳を必死にした後に、レビューにてわかりやすい日本語翻訳化のやり方を紹介していた方がいたのを見てﾜｯ…となりました。
面白いので是非ともやってほしいです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198995334075', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 353, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 293, 'last_played': 1708492879}

author: {'steamid': '76561198045643343', 'num_games_owned': 369, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 133, 'last_played': 1708326557}
review:
A very short, very meta little puzzle/horror title. If you enjoyed Inscryption, this is a no-brainer.

Much like DM Games' more recent and much more acclaimed Inscryption, there is a palpable energy and love of the medium here. Also like Inscryption, the truly great moments of the game are interspersed by comparably boring and often repetitive game-play. In some ways Pony Island is a much tighter execution of that experience since it is so much shorter. 

Even as someone who had enough card game and rogue-like experience to feel all the inspirations and innovation in Inscryption, Pony Island actually feels like the easier sell/recommendation since the common (and, imo, best) elements between these games feels more at home in this sort of game than in a sprawling card game system.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027178198', 'num_games_owned': 901, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 405, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 403, 'last_played': 1707656030}
review:
I was blown away by  [b]Inscryption[/b] (a must play Card Game).
After hearing about the announcement of [b]Pony Island 2[/b], I wanted to try the other games made by Daniel Mullins.

I just finished  [b]Pony Island [/b] without any previous knowledge about the game.
It’s really a [b]great experience [/b] ! If you like the eerie atmosphere of Inscryption, you’ll definitely enjoy Pony Island. It's a short but very well made "adventure".

author: {'steamid': '76561198447663900', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1670575507}
review: I know not everyone likes meta stuff, but if you do or want a good starting point then this is 100% the game for you. Honestly all of Daniel Mullin's games are fun to play through and the only sucky part is that you can't really tell them to other people since it's better for them just to experience it and come to their own conclusions. In saying that, I will be impatiently waiting for Pony island 2 to release. Overall, you should buy it if you want a short meta game to play.

review:
Es una experiencia diferente, sinceramente creo que hay mejores en este ámbito pero esta buena en general.

La historia y narrativa es interesante, jugablemente es muy simple pero justo para el juego.

No siento que sea WOW, hay mejores, por esto no lo veo indispensable, pero es un buen juego sin dudas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198110804889', 'num_games_owned': 140, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 191, 'last_played': 1707008354}
review: After being totally bowled over by Inscryption I knew I had to check out more games by Daniel Mullins, Pony Island didn't disappoint. Another unique and totally engaging game. Feel pretty certain there's a fair bit hidden throughout the game that I didn't discover on my first play through, so looking forward to discovering those whilst I eagerly await the release of Pony Island 2.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047204246', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 112, 'playtime_forever': 104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 104, 'last_played': 1706967157}
review: Pony Island is an original puzzle/arcade game with a nice atmosphere and unique setting. I enjoyed the first third of the game; however, the rest feels a bit padded with boring-ish content. There is nothing wrong with shorter games, and this game should definitely trim some parts.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094013974', 'num_games_owned': 488, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1706942903}
review: I grabbed this game because it was super cheap on sale and the reviews were overwhelmingly positive, but I feel like something just isn't clicking with me. It seems like one of those super meta fourth-wall-breaking indie games that definitely would've been popular around the time it released, but I don't think that's my style usually. Maybe the game is good and I didn't play it long enough to find out, but it didn't keep my attention well enough for me to care.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006802861', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 157, 'last_played': 1484402395}
review:
Highly recommend: 10/10.

Note: this game is ~2.5 hours long; it's a short one.

I just love this game.  I recommend other Daniel Mullins Games to friends, but this has to be my favourite of them.
Similar styles of game writing across these games, but there's something about the raw feeling of these puzzles that still makes me recommend this over others.

This game has one of my favourite boss fights of any game; due to a gimmick that's very unique and creative.

Great 2.5 hours spent :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198265383491', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1706037687}
review:
As a fan of Inscryption I figured I'd give this game a try; not really my cup of tea. I played through it quickly and was able to beat it. You can certainly see Daniel Mullins' style of switching up the gameplay with different genres, but jumping and shooting lasers as a pony to save your soul against Satan and demons (and for some reason be accused of killing Jesus???) wasn't my favorite.

With the next Pony Island game announced I'm sure some will be wanting to check the original out, but I'd definitely recommend Inscryption over this shorter game if you want to see what a Daniel Mullins game is all about.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009546644', 'num_games_owned': 519, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1645426220}
review:
Daniel Mullin is one of the most unique and different indie game devs out there, when you play his games you are in for an exciting and distinctive experience. His games sort of have a set pattern you can say, but this is what gives Daniel Mullin Games their personality. 

Pony Island is what you can argue, his first full release game of his formula, its an interesting game with interesting concepts and great storytelling. Its not very long but its short enough for you to be satisfied. Since this is the first game from him, it is not as perfect or polished on the execution as his later entries but it is still a good game and you can see where his style of game started.

The game is part puzzle/part story driven, it has what his other games have, mysterious origin, ARG and engaging gameplay, you really cant go wrong if you want to experience something different. And as always as I say with my reviews for all of his games,

[b]PLAY THE GAME BLIND, DON'T LOOK ANYTHING UP.[/b] at least until you beat it once, feel free to look things up AFTER you're done with the game.

I am very Glad this game is getting a second part because now after playing his other games, I know that he is cooking something really good with the sequel. Buy the game! Support this dev, nobody else is doing what Daniel is in the industry and people like him should be recognized more amongst the big names.

review: Проходив гру після шедевральної Inscryption, і це, напевно, все зіпсувало. Здивувати мене грі взагалі не вдалося, а геймплейно вона в десятки разів більш примітивна, ніж Inscryption. Тому або проходити ігри від розробника в хронологічному порядку, або брати її чисто для колекції (а це варто зробити, щоб підтримати розробника). В цілому гра прикольна, своїх копійок на знижках однозначно коштує

author: {'steamid': '76561198077709456', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1705642940}
review:
I didn't enjoy my time with this one. It felt like a mix of brain-numbing platforming or brain-numbing puzzles. The plot was weaker than I thought it would be - I didn't find it funny or interesting.

Despite how flashy and dramatic this game tries to be, I found myself super bored with everything the game presented me. It was so on-rails that it didn't even feel like a puzzle game. It barely felt like I made any decisions at all. It almost seemed like I was watching a bad movie that I had to click along to follow.

I didn't hate it, but I wish I had those couple hours back.

I don't think the complete play through and achievements are necessary though unless you just can't get enough of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561199521233026', 'num_games_owned': 54, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 615, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 191, 'last_played': 1706917264}
review:
Bastante entretenido para el precio justo.
La mecánica del juego es simple pero cumple con el objetivo por el cual fue diseñado.
La traducción está correcta.
El tiempo que te demoras en pasar el juego varía entre 1 hora y media aproximado, pero para completar algunos logros puede que demores más.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012643852', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1705593273}
review:
게임에 돈도 안 받고 오히려 공짜 티켓을 뿌려주던 녀석...

게임 컨텐츠 만드는 속도보다 사람들이 소모하는 속도가 빨라서 고민이었던 녀석...

개발 실력은 좀 떨어지는지 게임에 버그도 많고, 버그 나올 때마다 안절부절 못하던 녀석...

그러면서도 자기 게임 퀄리티를 더 높이고 싶어서 사람들에게 후원을 요청하던 녀석...

... 그는 그저 귀여운 포니를 좋아하고 게임 개발을 좋아할 뿐인 열정있는 1인 게임 개발자였습니다.

review: This is a very good game.I decided to buy the game after I heard that the sequel was in development. This game of was a pleasant surprise. I just finished it and I thought it was a blast from start to end. I do plan on 100% up but for now I am done.  The only negative I see is that the game is very short, It only two and a half hours to beat, with it probably taking five hours to 100%. This is criminally underrated, it is very good game for people who want a new puzzle / horror game to play for a very cheap price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011607723', 'num_games_owned': 1899, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 377, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 377, 'last_played': 1705203390}
review:
Un juego cortito y con buena trama. Lo jugué sin saber nada y me encantó! Muchas gracias a la personita linda que me lo recomendó y me vio jugarlo, sin dudas me quedó un bonito recuerdo de la experiencia que es este juego. 
Interactúas con lo que parece ser un antiguo juego de arcade llamado "Pony Island", pero pronto descubris que el juego está corrompido por el propio Lucifer, quien intenta reclamar tu alma. Sí querés pasar un buen rato en suspenso dale una oportunidad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198429307439', 'num_games_owned': 2236, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 527, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 527, 'last_played': 1705172507}
review:
每个meta游戏都能带来意想不到的惊喜！小马岛的流程说白了就是让你反复游玩不同版本的小马岛，但重复之中又永远有着新鲜玩意儿。游戏画面可谓十分简陋，却反过来更凸显了文字的魅力。

虽然meta游戏经常被定义为“反游戏”，但小马岛本身其实就很好玩……不管哪个版本都是！

author: {'steamid': '76561199027508066', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1705171169}
review: such a simple yet amazing game, im excited for pony island 2

author: {'steamid': '76561198008652777', 'num_games_owned': 802, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 205, 'last_played': 1705163046}
review:
Good Lord.

I pity people like me, who paid for this for the plot, but ended up being infuriated by the gameplay. An endless runner and occasional programming puzzles are wonderful vessels to deliver this narrative, but they are such over-developed hardcore implementations of the genres themselves to the point of being hyper-antithetical to the overall project. You know shit is real when a YouTube walkthrough spends non-trivial time of trials and errors on getting through these.

If you are somehow hardcore fans of endless runners and puzzles, then you might get off with a lot less suffering, but let's be real, you did not buy Pony Island for gameplay.

The silver lining is I'm glad I play this in 2023, after The Hex and Inscryption, knowing that Daniel has figured out how to interweave interesting narrative and gameplay without letting step on each other's toes.

Daniel, if there is ever a remaster for this, implement accessibility settings. This game needs tons of them.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017244567', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 332, 'last_played': 1705117059}
review: После шедеврального Inscryption - решил поиграть в первую игру от этого разработчика, игра конечно по проще, но оно и понятно все-таки первая работа студии. Но приятные эмоции она доставила и пару моментов реально удивляли. Сюжет тут нельзя совершенно затрагивать, потому что любой момент это уже спойлер, советую к прохождению - игра короткая на часа 4. Словил видимо глюк и не сразу засчитали все достижения,  но это не критично игра отличная.

author: {'steamid': '76561199150773919', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 392, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 392, 'last_played': 1704714641}
review:
прекрасная игра
вознаграждает за любопытство и нестандартные мысли (даёт почувствовать себя программистом) 
история не такая трогающая, но лишь потому что гг нечего терять, но сам сеттинг и атмосфера шикарны
что ещё сказать?.. музыка крутая и графика. порадовал стиль "игра в игре", и зарабатывание билетиков за действия. ещё очень удивили некоторые моменты с 3д графикой. а ещё я теперь лютейший фанат hopeless soul, поэтому сейчас сделаю всё, как он просил ^^
в итоге прошёл на все достижения и не жалею. никого не жалею.

review: This game is short, scattered, and frenetic but held my attention by the sheer fact that it never apologizes for itself.  I would describe this more as an experience than a game, since the actual gameplay elements amount mostly to a combination of Dino Runner and minor programming puzzles.  If you don't expect much going into the experience then you will be able to be pleasantly surprised when the game continually doubles down on its skewed humor.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992689211', 'num_games_owned': 771, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1704318082}
review:
+Unique game that uses meta ability to tell it’s narrative
+Great set of puzzles mixed into the game
+Does not outstay it’s welcome
-It’s platform section can be tedious and repetitive
-While it’s meta nature is great it’s overall narrative is relatively generic
Review:
Pony Island is an interesting take on breaking the meta narrative of a game and it works extremely well when doing this throwing up different ways to break the meta in the game. It’s wrapped in a series of interesting and fun puzzles especially around the completion of games and run of game loops and it is thankfully short as there is possibility this game overstaying it’s welcome. Unfortunately the in game narrative I felt was rather meh compared to it’s meta narrative tricks and the platform section ultimately got tedious
8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198053456099', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1704271573}
review:
Pony Island — это компьютерная игра-головоломка, разработанная и выпущенная компанией D-Pad Studio в 2016 году. В этой игре игрокам предстоит решить различные головоломки и задачи, чтобы выбраться с острова, на котором они оказались (почуствовать себя хакером).

Главный герой - игрок, попадает в виртуальную аркаду с обликом милой игры про пони. Однако вскоре становится ясно, что с "Pony Island" что-то не так. Задача игрока - разобраться в этой таинственной и темной атмосфере, и найти выход из лабиринта загадок и головоломок.

Графика в игре проста и пиксельна, но это дополняет атмосферу искусственности и виртуальной реальности. Звуковое сопровождение соответствует атмосфере игры и создает дополнительную напряженность.

Одна из главных особенностей "Pony Island" - это наличие мета-игровых элементов. В процессе игры игрок будет сталкиваться со взломами, обманами и скрытыми сообщениями. Это создает ощущение потерянной реальности и разрушенной виртуальности.

В целом, Pony Island — это увлекательная головоломка, которая понравится как детям, так и взрослым я подчеркиваю так и ВЗРОСЛЫМ ))). Она имеет достаточно сложный сюжет, который заставляет игроков думать и решать задачи на каждом этапе ее развития. Если вы любите загадки и головоломки, то эта игра точно понравится вам. В особенности если хотите почуствовать себя маленьим Кевином Митником то вам сюда !

author: {'steamid': '76561198081872577', 'num_games_owned': 1566, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1704532345}
review:
[i]Игра, которая ломает четвертую стену и ловко манипулирует пользователем, постепенно погружая в этот необычный мир[/i]

Надоело спасать галактику? Устали от ААА-игр с безумно красивыми и пустыми мирами? Хочется чего-то более приземленного и необычного? Тогда вы зашли по адресу. Этот с виду небольшой, но очень глубокий проект от талантливого разработчика по имени Daniel Mullins, заставит вас полностью переосмыслить все увиденное ранее.

[h1]Все любят пони[/h1]

Перед нами классическая игра про пони. Нам предстоит бегать в горизонтальной плоскости, преодолевать препятствия и отстреливать врагов. Вся игровая механика в данном режиме укладывается в простое управление на двух кнопках, но при этом неплохо так увлекает. Здесь вам и качественное аудио сопровождение, разнообразные уровни в отличающихся декорациях и… Внимание! Бесплатные скины, которые можно найти на глобальной карте, без необходимости их покупать отдельно. Заплатить придется… Вашей душой.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3132073830

[h1] Я – маленькая лошадка и мне живётся несладко[/h1]

По ходу погружения в игру оказывается, что у лошадки действительно много проблем. Все дело в том, что она ненастоящая и представляет собой совсем не то, чем кажется первоначально. На первый взгляд простые игровые механики увлекают и в буквальном смысле погружают с головой в саму игру. Еще раз повторюсь – «В буквальном смысле»! Автор игры умело манипулирует пользователем по ту сторону экрана и порой действительно создается впечатление, что не ты играешь в игру, а она играет с тобой. Чего только стоит реализация чата с разными персонажами в игре, где приходится им отвечать не по заранее заготовленным шаблонам (да-да, печатать на клавиатуре ответы).

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3131324159

Об этой игре невозможно рассказать подробнее иначе сразу будет разбита вся интрига и испортится первое впечатление. Просто знайте – это игра совершенно не о том, о чем вы думаете. Она гораздо глубже. Ни один ААА-проект от современных студий не подарит вам такого уникального игрового опыта и не вызовет настолько сильных эмоций. Поэтому, если вы действительно хотите увидеть что-то действительно новое и необычное – вам обязательно следует попробовать Pony Island.

[h1]->Вердикт<-[/h1]

👉 [b]Визуальная составляющая:[/b] вписывается в общий стиль игры
👉 [b]Гемплей:[/b] уникальный
👉 [b]Сюжет:[/b] сносит крышу
👉 [b]Реиграбельность:[/b] наверное, возможна
👉 [b]Цена:[/b] смешная

[u]Моя Итоговая Оценка[/u] - [b]Приключение на один вечер, но запоминающееся на всю жизнь[/b] – необычный проект от создателя Inscryption. За стоимость пачки чипсов вы получаете уникальный игровой опыт со свежим взглядом в целом на концепцию того, какими должны быть игры. Они должны увлекать и развлекать, а не заставлять зачищать знаки вопросиков на карте. Именно это и делает Pony Island.

[b] Ещё больше обзоров [/b] >> [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/42209702/][b] здеся [/b][/url]<<

author: {'steamid': '76561198064045120', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1704475397}
review:
This was a fun little game with devious mechanics. I fell for it a couple of times. I would've rated it lower if the platforming sections would've been more frustrating but luckily I found them to be manageable even if you have to coordinate your clicking really well.

What I liked:
* There are different elements to the game which are fun to explore
* The puzzles made me feel really smart.
* The style and atmosphere of the game fits within the horror genre without being scary.
* It surprised me multiple times.

What I didn't like:
* The music or sometimes lack thereof but the presence of an insistent sound is a bit annoying at times.
* The platforming parts weren't my favourite.

All-in-all a great experience!

author: {'steamid': '76561198813913875', 'num_games_owned': 103, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 133, 'last_played': 1704191242}
review:
눈 아프다. 형식의 참신함은 인정할 만하나 이용자를 과도하게 피로하게 한다.

메타 게임을 지향하면서도 세이브 포인트로 되돌아가는 시점에서, 그리고 등장인물들의 대사가 똑같이 반복되는 시점에서 몰입이 깨져버린다. 아쉬운 부분이다.

무엇보다도, 처음 나왔을 당시면 몰라도 이제 와서 포니 아일랜드를 플레이해야만 하는 마땅한 이유를 찾기 어렵다. 전혀 즐겁지 않다. 게임을 했는데 즐겁지 않으면 나는 대체 누구를 탓해야 하나?

author: {'steamid': '76561199118148365', 'num_games_owned': 225, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1702483538}
review:
Здравствуйте, Читатели! В сети [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Gerkanofficial/][u]G1rkan[/u][/url], речь зайдет об игре — [b][i]Pony Island[/i][/b].
Если у вас мало времени в самом внизу оценка и послесловие.

[b]Об игре.[/b]
Короткая игра, основа для которой была создана всего за 48 часов. Pony Island — это инди-проект без определенного жанра, здесь вы будете играть в игру в игре, в которой нет обучения, а игровой процесс начинается даже из меню настроек. Одной из прелестей Pony Island является мимикрия, поначалу игра кажется дружелюбной и безопасной, но все кардинально меняется и, как выясняется, в аркадном автомате «Pony Island» сидит дьявол, он и является главным антагонистом этой истории. Отмечу, что с начала раскрытия всей зловещести игры она раз за разом начинает ломать четвертую стену, что у нее получается на отлично и с задачей погружения игра справляется на все сто процентов.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3121087763

Сюжет прост, мы пробираемся в зал игровых автоматов и начинаем играть в «Pony Island», который приковывает нас к себе и, как позже выясняется, сам дьявол захватил этот автомат и пытается улучшить игру, основанную на старой, а именно создать что-то большее из «Остров пони», но он только наполняет игру ошибками и багами, которые мы будем использовать, чтобы сбежать. В этой истории есть несколько ключевых персонажей, я выделю трех. Первый, Главный герой, это буквально вы. Второй, Отчаявшаяся Душа, которая когда-то была игроком, но отчаялась при попытках победить дьявола и его игру. Третий, главный антагонист — это Дьявол, демон, который сидит в игре, в некотором роде его можно назвать искусственным интеллектом, он всячески будет пытаться забрать нашу душу.

[b]Послесловие.[/b]
Хорошая игра на вечерок, с головоломками и сатаной. Сможете ли вы спасти свою душу и освободить других? Узнайте это прямо сейчас! За деньги которые я приобрел игру, а именно 30 золотых я более чем доволен.

[b]Оценка.[/b]
7/10

review:
Incredible little game full of secrets and marvelous game design and thinking by Daniel Mullins.

I had ABSOLUTELY no idea what this was but I was surprised during all my playthrough. This is a wonderful indie game that should be played by everyone, especially for its price and length. I guarantee you you will have fun playing this.

Just wow.

Looking forward to anything this dev can do now, I am absolutely impressed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042030821', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 141, 'playtime_forever': 255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 255, 'last_played': 1703869997}
review:
This game is a great blend of that self aware, fourth wall-breaking meta-narrative stuff that Undertale popularized. 

It proudly wears it's Undertale inspiration on it's sleeve but it's appealing to both fans and non-fans of Toby Fox's work. 

It's an incredibly short game (about 4-5 hours long depending on whether you take the extra time to hunt for the collectibles) but it tells a really cool little story within a story.

This was Daniel Mullins' first real breakout into the industry and his work has only gone up from here.
It's getting a sequel! Give this one a try and if you like it, go get the next one when it comes out!

review: Интересная задумка и хорошая атмосфера, несколько взаимодействий удивили, за что и обожаю игры этого разработчика. Так как эта была его первая, чувствуется неопытность по сравнению с новыми, поэтому во многих местах с загадками было душно, но в остальном, если расценивать это как старт - достойно. Жду вторую часть чтобы посмотреть на такой старый проект под новым взглядом прокачавшегося разработчика.

review:
we need chinese, we need chinese, we need chinese. 我们需要中文。

202304，steam，steam掉卡抵扣，t a o宝，支付宝红包，humble，indie gala，daily indie game，fanatical，杉果，它处自定义包入的本体约4元。爱人如己，目前就这，看以后追评。有中文的游戏请耐心自研体验乐趣，攻略指南尽量不用。不建议使用外挂，插件，作弊之类的，游戏都要这样搞，那现实里那更是如此了。兄弟萌，强烈建议不要第三方平台的小店买y u额，通过饰品等挂steam市场转的，高概率red信乃至封号，且行且珍惜。

review: 想打开Daniel Mullins的脑子，看看他究竟怎么想出来这些神作的！！（感叹）其实是打完Inscryption看到好便宜+好评就顺便买了，上班无聊看评论多数人都是3-4小时通关，于是打了两个午休，幸好没有错过这一作！！游戏全程的噪音BGM我还蛮喜欢，很有代入感，最后和boss对话时候真的很难Focus（前看后忘选手），那个[spoiler] Steam好友消息 [/spoiler]成功吸引了我的注意，[spoiler] 要不是跳出来的那个好友不会英语我就真信了 [/spoiler]（笑）。

author: {'steamid': '76561198081082385', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 153, 'last_played': 1703743141}
review:
Note: Playing after I played Inscryption.

Daniel Mullins does it again (or before? idk everything is meta anyway). While shorter, and not as "well crafted" (I say that with the most love in my heart of course.) for a first showing this stellar. You can see the growth from Pony Island to Inscryption by 10 fold. While I had trouble with one puzzle (end of Act 2) the rest of the game was a blast, even if basic. Mullins doesn't want you to play a game, but experience it. And nothing rings more true than this game. Truly a work of art, or "piece" if you will. Mullins is what should be shown when games are looked at as art pieces, because while simple in nature, there truly isn't anything like interacting with a piece.

author: {'steamid': '76561198389240023', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1690325473}

author: {'steamid': '76561198310412971', 'num_games_owned': 173, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 138, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1703642503}
review: I loved the part with all the colorful objects and the butterflies.  I also did not kill jesus.  I thank my coding class for really helping nail the puzzle portions of this game. This is a certified classic in my arsenal of video games and cherished my time in pony island.  Although I will say I was very confused when there were no cards or bell to play the game at first.  I quickly got a hold of it.  The use of the mouse throughout this game was very revolutionary.  I enjoyed myself very much and recommend it to anyone who has the 2 hours to kill.

author: {'steamid': '76561198272192842', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 187, 'playtime_forever': 491, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 491, 'last_played': 1703675571}
review:
2017年1月在木头桌子上玩了1/2左右
当时还是笔记本电脑的小屏幕，记得当时那一口气还玩得还有点累
倒是刚开始尝鲜徽章之类的功能，给徽章一通升级，就搞得自己好像通关了似的...orz[spoiler]结果当时连徽章里出现的一些形象都不认识...[/spoiler][spoiler]这几年已经不再乱合成了，因为不想让数字无序膨胀了...[/spoiler]
[spoiler]当时决定去玩，除了早知该作大名鼎鼎之奇妙一直惦记在心，也跟当时注意到【朋友S几乎没什么游戏却还都专门把这个玩了】这点也有不少关系[/spoiler]

忘记为什么没有继续了，或许是那在想等等汉化版？
结果转眼马上七年过去了

[spoiler]这次时隔多年再开，多少跟前阵子注意到2代要出了这个事儿有点关系，间接也算推了我一把? 汉化则估计也是不会有了，也不必等了[/spoiler]

这次从头玩的，发觉只有极个别画面有点印象，但都记不准到底是在哪见过的，甚至怀疑是因为自己曾偶然看过相关图片留下的残破印象

结果通关后打开截图文件夹重温，才发觉原来大部分今天看到的内容自己曾经都实际玩过....大脑的记忆还是脆弱啊，还真能很多地方居然都完全记不得玩过了啊...

游戏感觉就不用说太多了，daniel厉害，玩家之心、技巧、Game-Dev要素、故事情感\彩蛋、DumbDesign方方面都很灵
也能在里面看到后来的《邪恶冥刻》里的很多影子（机器人、守护者三boss、steam-api、windows与复古、多机制混合但简化、随叙事的阶段递变/突变、机制的适当主次与发展、放松又直接的软件美学和资产使用风格、交心对话、欺骗与犯贱...)

[spoiler]最有趣也很让人印象深的还包括其中某一段或许恰巧可以作为一些教科书中对于【符号形象和反馈信息的变化带来的体验差异】的恰到好处的例子
而对于射击游戏的【打<->不能打】的使用，也很邪且很灵[/spoiler]

玩完还看了几个别的主播打的实况录播，并行做了下对比和信息较对，挺好，很开心的过程
[spoiler]想来主播玩游戏也算是很好的把旧日那种三两好友一起玩一款单机游戏的感觉映射到了互联网上，尤其是这次看的几个主播录的时候正好身边就有朋友看着他玩，七嘴八舌的就很真实，虽然这一层到网友这边就没有了那种时效性了，但配合弹幕，味道是还原了七七八八分了[/spoiler]
[spoiler]另外，隐藏的结局部分中个别角色之间也据说有一些更暗色的关联设计（在视频的讨论区见人分享来着）看起来讨论不多但如果是真的那也多了很多令人回味的趣味意涵
再加上全成就后的“应付”boss战，加上整个游戏的概念结构从【玩家沉迷游戏】的角度也似乎可以建立解读关系，这些也让我发觉和《little inferno》似乎具有某种暗合之妙
这些都是让我觉得很有启发也有灵魂的点[/spoiler]

为自己墨迹这么久不好好认真玩完感觉遗憾

好在一些旧日的【自然的去尝玩一些自己想玩/重要的游戏的感觉】又陆续回来了不少，是好事儿。

review: OKAY. DON'T GET ME WRONG: I'm the kind of fella that adores Daniel Mullins games, but this one is eaaasily the weakest one out of all of his work. The puzzles can be fun sometimes and the secrets are interesting, but other than that its p mid, especially cuz the whole "game possessed by satan" thing gets old reeeeally quickly - If you want to know everything about the lore of the "Mullinsverse" or don't care about your 5 bucks I'd say go ahead and play it, but other than that it's not super worth it. Go play Inscryption or The Hex tho those bang

author: {'steamid': '76561198360177433', 'num_games_owned': 108, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1703356191}
review:
I definitely received more than I expected from this game, considering the price (I bought it on discount though). What I mean by this is not the playtime, but mostly impression and emotions. Even though the game doesn't take long to beat, there's a lot hiding behind its features.
What lacked for me in this game is the length, I would definitely like to spend more time in it for the game to elaborate on the characters (including MC) and some mysteries. Aside from that, I would love to see more diverse puzzles.
Overall: Recommended, 8.5/10

P.S. The sequel has been recently announced so I've got my fingers crossed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198242023936', 'num_games_owned': 208, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 227, 'last_played': 1703402086}
review:
非常好游戏，使我的小马旋转
各方面都很不错的独立游戏，Daniel的Steam平台处女座便展露其功力，META在本作中更像是一个元素而不是其类别，不过这种锦上添花的效果更能让玩家感到惊喜，事实上游戏里有比META更有趣的内容，不管是对话，挑战，和首领战
略为遗憾的一点是缺乏情感铺陈，最后的场景本来应该[spoiler] 是一段无声但动人的告别 [/spoiler]，但并没有调动起来足够的情绪，不过瑕不掩瑜

author: {'steamid': '76561199252837824', 'num_games_owned': 60, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 429, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 427, 'last_played': 1703353622}
review: Eu terminei o jogo agora e só consigo dizer que é uma masterpiece. Ganhei de presente esse jogo do meu amigo (valeu, André) e fiquei curioso. Confesso que não me surpreendi de início. Achei bem edgy, pra ser sincero. Só que esse negócio vai evoluindo, adicionando mais modos de jogo, e usando muito a quebra de quarta parede. Não darei spoilers, mas ir atrás das conquistas vai ser recompensador. Esse jogo, em promoção, custa menos de >>>3 reais<<<, é leve, curto e vai te proporcionar uma experiência bacana e, na minha opinião, bem imersiva. Mais que recomendado. Vale muito a pena! Comprem logo!

review:
パズルもあるしアクション性もあるゲーム
日本語はないがわかる英単語だけでも読んでいけば大体は理解できるはず(わからないなら翻訳カメラ使えばわかるかも)
音楽がなかなか中毒性が高くていいですね
難易度は要所要所で高い所があると感じたがいい音楽のおかげで何度もやるのも苦には感じなかった
チケット全集めや実績解除は調べれば出てくるのでぜひとも達成する価値はあるのでみんなにもプレイしてほしいと思います

author: {'steamid': '76561197996919908', 'num_games_owned': 1532, 'num_reviews': 875, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 143, 'last_played': 1703332697}
review:
[h1]Doch gar nicht so friedlich? [/h1]

Oh cool, Ponyreiten!

[b]Gameplay[/b]
Spielerisch ist „Pony Island“ sehr schwer zu beschreiben. Es lässt sich fast komplett mit der Maus spielen und bietet ein wenig 2D Spielspaß, aber eigentlich geht um die kleineren Rätsel, die uns das Spiel immer stellt. 
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3120705743&tscn=1703335006
Dabei darf man durchaus mal an seinem Verstand zweifeln und das Spiel gibt sein Bestes, den Spieler reinzulegen. Aus Spoilergründen kann ich hier gar nicht mehr beschreiben. Nach spätestens drei Stunden ist man mit „Pony Island“ auch schon durch, außer man möchte alle Tickets sammeln. 

[b]Story[/b]
In “Pony Island” spielen wir ein Pferd und haben total den Spaß. Oh, was ist dass denn? Warum verändert sich den der Bildschirm und wird so düster? Warte, hat das Spiel gerade meine Seele verlangt? Meine Mutter sagte ja immer schon, dass Videospiele mir nicht gut tun würden…
“Pony Island“ hat viel Humor und lässt den Spieler immer mit einem Augenzwinkern seine Meta-Ebene erkunden. Die Frage ist hier nicht, ob du „Pony Island“ spielen kannst, sondern ob du es überleben wirst.

[b]Grafik/Sound[/b]
OH, EIN PONY! Ähem…es geht schon wieder. Da sich „Pony Island“ in einer virtuellen Arcade-Spielhalle befindet, ist die Grafik sehr pixelig. 
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3120704953
Der Sondtrack ist zuerst sehr unscheinbar, aber entwickelt sich noch ein wenig. 

[b]Fazit[/b]
„Pony Island“ will deine Seele und fordert dann auch noch deinen Verstand. Das Spiel ist jetzt nicht unfassbar schwer, aber es nimmt dich gerne mal auf den Arm und war damals nicht umsonst ein kleiner Hit. Es ist ein sehr schönes Spiel, wenn man einen Abend mal nicht weiß, was man tun möchte. Bis zum Ende bleibt es dabei frisch, auch wenn ein Minispiel etwas oft verwendet wird. Im Angebot kriegt man das Spiel unter einem Euro und das ist es sowas von wert!


Als Kind war ich ja beim voltigieren. Reiten habe ich witzigerweise trotzdem nie gelernt. Aber Pferde sind trotzdem noch ganz okay und zum Durchspielen braucht man auch nicht das kleine Hufeisen. Ich habe mich ja dann auch eher aufs Reviewschreiben verlegt, wobei du mich mit einem Beitritt in [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Drakeschool] meine Steamgruppe[/url] oder die[url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/ger_steam] German Steam Community[/url] unterstützen kannst.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026834709', 'num_games_owned': 420, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 301, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 301, 'last_played': 1703294404}
review: Creo que es la primera vez que publico una reseña negativa en Steam. Y con los años que tiene este juego y lo conocido que es en los círculos indie más alternativos, poco iba a añadir de positivo o de negativo realmente. Simplemente, hasta el acto III el juego me estaba gustando, aunque sin entusiasmarme como otras propuestas autorales tan personales, pero eso no es malo, son simples gustos. Lo que ya no ha sido tanto gusto han sido las secciones C*ÑAZOOOOOOOOOOOOO en ese último acto con el unicornio, de repetir y repetir y repetir, porque se puede morir tontamente ante factores donde el jugador no tiene el control. Pero lo que más me ha sacado de mis casillas es como el grandísimo detalle de tener no solo textos en castellano, sino poder ESCRIBIR TAMBIÉN EN CASTELLANO, se vuelve en su contra en una parte donde he tenido que tirar de guía. Creo que así no se hacen las cosas, y con ese amargamiento he llegado al final, sin ya poder volver a conseguir el ánimo que hasta ese momento me había dado esta muy especialita obra de Daniel Mullins. No creo que me acerque mucho a su segunda parte no.

author: {'steamid': '76561198803613140', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1703283964}
review: Muito fofinho, amei a trilha sonora e a arte dele. Confesso que quando vi o jogo de relance eu não entendi como que baralhos se resolvia os puzzles, mas depois que decidi dar uma olhada por mim mesma, vi que não era tão difícil quanto eu achava que fosse (entretanto, teve uns 4 que eu fiquei muito perdida, sem contar a parte em que eu precisava trocar pro inglês pra conseguir passar do quebra cabeça). No fim do dia, Pony Island é um jogo massa pra quem quer ver pôneis pulando cerquinhas, e [b] "somente isso" [/b].

review: By far one of the weirdest games I have ever played in my entire life. Another one is Gonner and Gonner 2 so check those out if you havent already but I digress...this game is not about ponies. I cant describe it...its....its kinda like hacking but not...you see I cant tell you because it would spoil the fun. I agree with most of my comrades here in the comments that you just have to get the game. Just get it and dont think about it. DO IT NOW (as of 12-21-23) because it is 74 cent man...you cant beat that for a cool ass game...its trippy....its evil...its cute...its weird...its...its not a game about ponies!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561197991161976', 'num_games_owned': 5774, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1702977734}
review:
3시간 정도 플레이해 일반 엔딩만 보았다. (3.6시간으로 나오지만, 오래전 30분쯤 하다 날려먹은게 있음.)

너무 늦게(2023년도 말에) 플레이하며 공략도 참조한 것이 문제였을것 같은데, 명성만큼의 대단함을 느낄 수는 없었다. 

지식으로는 메타 게임계 시초들 중 하나고 역사 중 중요한 위치라는걸 알겠는데, 그걸 받아들여 소화하기에는 너무 많은 시간이 지나버렸달까... 언어 이해의 문제인지도 모르겠지만, 주관식 답 넣는 부분은 저게 왜 저 답인지조차 이해 안 가는 부분도 있곤 했다.  

손 재주 때문인것도 같지만, 뻔히 보이는 짧은 아케이드 스테이지를 못 꺠서 리트라이 여러번도 했고... 퍼즐에 실시간 대응하는걸 머리로는 알겠는데 굳이 저렇게 짰어야 했나 싶기도 했다. 

썸 업은 썸 업인데... 10점 만점이라면 6~7점 근처. 발매 후 너무 오랜 시간이 지나서인지 동감하지 못하는 부분들도 있었고, 이게 이렇게 해서 저렇게 넘어간다는걸 이해 못 하거나 납득 못 하는(그래서 몰입에서 튕겨나오는) 부분들도 있었기 떄문.

그래도 이렇게 한 시대를 풍미하고 역사에 획을 그은 것을 엔딩 봤다는 사실 자체는 좋다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198257489753', 'num_games_owned': 104, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1702779387}
review: I ended up buying Pony Island because it was really cheap on sale and Pony Island 2 is releasing very soon. Despite its age, it's extremely solid and very fun. I only had experience with Inscryption as the creator's previous game, and all the heart and soul of Inscryption is still present in Pony Island. It's a game I really had to force myself to pull away from finishing all in once sitting. Deceptive complexity in its puzzles, an interesting narrative, and unique graphics all help to solidify it as a game that keeps your attention very well and offers amazing value for your time. Furthermore, with the price that it's offered at, I feel like it's something everyone should have in their library as one of those must-play-at-least-once games. Get Pony Island.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010088575', 'num_games_owned': 43, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1702763968}
review: Pony Island is a short, fun, unique experience. Well worth the price of admission. If you're into meta-narratives, this one is up your alley. As with most games of this sort, the less you know going in, the better.

review:
Non è possibile che un gioco del 2016 sia ancora così tanto buggato! (cit.)
Pony Island è un gioco incredibile, un gioco che vi spingerà (in maniera violenta) a pensare fuori dagli schemi, un gioco che romperà non solo la quarta parete, ma anche la vostra condizione di persona sana di mente.
Consiglio a chiunque sia dotato di buon gusto di provarlo! L'esperienza è breve, ma vi ripagherà incredibilmente!
Se volete vedere come inizia il gioco, con i suoi primi minuti di gameplay vi lascio un video qua sotto.

author: {'steamid': '76561198228776380', 'num_games_owned': 300, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1702487358}
review:
Better platformer than Mario, would brohoof again /)


In all seriousness, Inscryption's one of my favorite games of all time, a game with such an authentic & stellar identity that subverted my expectations not only as a card game, but also as a game that has such a fundamentally unique relationship between developer & player. It's a game I still think about a lot even after the nearly 2 years that have passed since I played it.

Fast forward to current day, where Pony Island 2 was just unveiled to the world a few days prior. I'll admit it. I instinctively laughed at/groaned a little at the thought that the same developer who made a game as amazing as Inscryption also made a game called [i]Pony Island[/i] of all things, let alone plans to release a sequel nearly a full decade after the original title's release... But I liked what I saw in the Pony Island 2 trailer too much (not to mention I also just love pandas too much :P) that I figured "well... What's the harm in giving the original game a shot?".

While EXTREMELY short, it's amazing how much of that same aforementioned authentic identity I mentioned Inscryption having you can see in Pony Island. It really feels like this game laid the foundation for what would be Daniel Mullins' signature brand in videogames, in terms of visuals/music/story/etc. That same brand is what Inscryption RELISHES in, & it seems like it'll be just as present as ever in Pony Island 2.
(Truthfully I haven't played The Hex as of writing, but from what I've seen it seems like it's still present there, albeit maybe in a way that feels like Daniel Mullins is still trying to find his game dev identity? Guess I'll have to play it for myself to confirm)

As for the game itself? I loved what I saw - an impossible platformer that you need to ""hack"" via a really cool puzzle concept in order to beat, with your soul & many others hanging in the balance - but I feel like this idea was done & over with prematurely. I was left longing for more. It's like going into a play expecting a 3-part act but realizing the curtains were closing by act 2.

That's not really a direct criticism against the game itself - Pony Island was created as the result of a game jam 2 years prior to the official game's release, & during that entire time, Mullins was really the only person working on the game with whatever spare time he had, as he wasn't able to work on the game full-time... But that's just how game development goes sometimes. Plus, I think the subversion of expectations is the real value of the game, rather than the gameplay or time investment itself.

Regardless, while Pony Island might've been a cute concept for a game, its true value is what it symbolizes & represents - an unconventional platformer that held more than what meets the eye, with its DNA being ever so present in its developers' future works, & whose release would mark the beginning of a journey of what I consider to be one of the greatest indie developers out there.

Can't wait to see what Daniel Mullins has in store for us with the release of Pony Island 2!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561197986432154', 'num_games_owned': 4600, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1702238632}
review:
[b]Trapná hipsterká adventura, arkáda a trolling v jednom inspirovaná The Stanley Parable! Je s podivem co všechno může skončit ve škatulce "extrémně kladné hodnocení".[/b]

       Místo 1st person procházení kanclíků tu máte celý ujetý operační systém a na něm ošklivou arkádu s poníkem ve stylu osmibitových her, vypravěče tu nehledejte. Prostě jen spustíte systém, zkoušíte programy a dějí se podivný věci, nic nefunguje jak by mělo a hra si s hraje spíš s vámi než vy s ní. Sem tam když něco vyřešíte vás hra oblaží nějakým tím rádobyvtipným textem či efektem. No budiž.
       
     Jenže narozdíl od Stanley Parable to není zrovna vtipný a už vůbec ne zábavný. Hra vás vůbec nevede za ručičku, právě naopak často není absolutně jasný co po vás hra vlastně chce, co byste měli řešit, jestli jste něco důležitýho přehlídli.

     Takže jsem se během hraní nehraní hned dvakrát zasekl. V prvním případě jsem hru v beznadějný situaci prostě restartoval, kupodivu pak situace šla najednou řešit normálně... takže to byl možná bug?! Ale jen chvíli potom jsem se definitivně zasekl na nově zpřístupněné arkádě, kde jsem neustále umíral aniž bych vůbec tušil proč a jejím "options" pokud se tak dá vůbec nazvat. Po další hodině marnosti jsem usoudil, že takovej oser za delší hraní nestojí a ukončil to.

[h3]Srajda pro retro hipstery s divným smyslem pro humor a youtubery, pro běžný hráče to rozhodně není. Těžko uvěřit, že za touhle hrou stojí stejná osoba jako za zajímavou karetní Inscryption.[/h3]

review:
this game is just as baffling and mind-altering as inscryption. it's clear that both games are made by the same solo-dev, and that the lessons they learned through making pony island strongly helped in making inscryption a masterpiece.

similarly with inscryption (i'm sorry, that's the last time I'll compare them), this game is best to go in blind and without spoilers. rest assured, i'm sure you'll enjoy it. after all... what c̫͎̰͟ͅͅo͉̳u̼̝̺͚͝l̘͇͕͜d p̷͟͏̝͉̺͕̼o̫̯͚͎͈̪̕͡͝ṣ̴̥͇̗s̷̡̪̦̯̞̟̤̤̜͟ì̫̬̭̞͇͞b͉̰̮̣̠̹̝l͓̭̩̟͚͠y̶̺͎͝ͅg̴̬͍̭̖͎̰̜̣̤̤̣̗͙͚̖͕͞o̡̲̳͕̜͖̼͇͉̖̗͘͜͝ ҉̷͈̲̝̹͡w҉҉͜҉̲͉͍̗̝̲̟̬̗͔̻̼̪̯̕r̢̲̻̗̳̹̺̀͢͡ǫ̵̖̯͕̗͘͝n͞͏̴̨͔̼͇̘͘g͓̗̱̗̮̠̬̪̺͓̟͔̕͞?̗̯̲̙͔̺̲̺̫́̕͢ ̧͟͡͞͏͕̘͉͇͈̯̜̣̟̣̰̱#̛͖̲̟̗̰͕̟͈̥̼̠͍͇̘̣̣͟

author: {'steamid': '76561198043491235', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1702242631}
review:
A few bucks for a few hours of ponies. It's hard to complain about price, so I won't. And to respect all the other reviewers who want you to go in blind, I'll keep this as vague as I can.

I think the dev learned a lot of valuable lessons from this game in his following games. And I'm super interested in pony island 2 to see how he reintegrates those lessons back into this IP. But the gameplay loop in this one is pretty rough, and the most interesting sections are over quickly. Those other games I'm hinting towards are much better, and you should skip straight to those instead of letting this be your first experience with the kinds of games this dude likes making.

And if you're hungry for more after those games, you can come back here and ignore everything I'm saying.

author: {'steamid': '76561198346120771', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 268, 'last_played': 1702241556}
review:
Minha análise pode ser meio polêmica em comparação ao restante das análises, mas eu sinceramente esperava mais do jogo. Fechei 100% do jogo (incluo as conquistas) em 4 horas, fora que para os caçadores de conquistas é um jogo que vai te deixar bem frustrado de pegar todos.

Conhecendo os jogos do Daniel Mullins, eu já esperava bizarrice no jogo haha. Entretanto, para aqueles que ja jogaram Inscryption (por exemplo), não vão sentir muito entusiasmo neste jogo, os plots do jogo acabam sendo tão clichês que se torna fácil saber o que vai acontecer na história antes mesmo do ápice do desenvolvimento.

Claro... o jogo não é RUIM, mas garanto que não vale o preço cheio (e na verdade é por isso que coloco como "não recomendo").

Fora as minhas críticas, dá pra ver como o Mullins se emprenhou nesse game, se fosse possível eu não selecionaria "recomendo" e nem "não recomendo", pois minha decisão final foi baseada no preço cheio que pedem. Mas caso comprem, aproveitem uma promoção e faça questão de coletar todos os tickets!!

Obrigado a todos!

author: {'steamid': '76561198249405412', 'num_games_owned': 489, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 271, 'last_played': 1702231179}
review:
Went into this game not knowing what to expect and it very much amazed me.

You can tell the amount of love the developer put, it's very creative and has lots of personality. Certain scenes surprised me and left me thinking "How?"!
Plus the achievements are simple and reward you with the true secret ending if you get them all, leaving you very much satisfied and ready to finally uninstall.

I would recommend it to anyone looking for a short fun experience, especially with the discounted price (74 cents!!).
Looking forward to Pony Island 2! <3

author: {'steamid': '76561198001116101', 'num_games_owned': 4699, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 472, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 465, 'last_played': 1702232390}
review:
I was eyeing this game for almost since it was released, but It took me a while to play this game, even if it was cheap and short. I just finished it, twice, getting all the achievements and exploring (known) secrets. The game is 5 hours or so to complete all the achievements, unless you won't resort to online guide and get stuck on something, though I did spend extra 2 hours repeating one game for an extra hidden dialog. :)

As far as Linux goes, the game is a native Unity game, it's 32-bit (but the same is on Windows) and uses OpenGL (Vulkan is not enabled, but it works with Zink), I had no trouble whatsoever under Wayland with Steam-native on Arch without Proton or Steam Linux runtime. The only issues are is that I couldn't access the key rebinding menu that's supposed to pop up when launching the game holding shift (but I had the same on Project Zomboid), and one scene [spoiler]where the game shows Windows screen, breaking immersion a little, but since the game was released a while ago, some other popup there is outdated now, and doesn't make sense outside of Steam anyway[/spoiler].

I didn't try playing it on Steam Deck or a controller, but it requires some keyword prompts, so it's best played with keyboard + mouse anyway.

All in-all, especially now that a second part is announced, I wholeheartedly recommend playing it for the experience, especially as it's dirt cheap on sale, and I heard the other games from the developer are good as well!

author: {'steamid': '76561198448955144', 'num_games_owned': 30, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 623, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 623, 'last_played': 1702213611}
review:
実績「The Full Truth」について。取得方法に関するネタバレあり。

この実績の取得方法を調べるとき、「[spoiler]5つ目の質問（私はどうやってここに来た？How did I get here?）はAct IIIでしか入手できない[/spoiler]」という情報が出てきますが、これは誤りです。

[spoiler]Act I、おそらくAct IIでも入手することができます。[/spoiler]

[spoiler]もちろんAct IIIでも取得できますが、3つの質問の中からこの質問が出るかはランダムなので、周回に10分はかかるAct IIIよりも、1分くらいで周回できるAct Iの方が良いです。[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198802744957', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1702169735}
review:
It was an ok experience but seeing the "overwhelmingly positive" reviews, I thought I had to balance it out. 

If you have played Inscryption already, there is not much point in playing Pony Island as it is essentially the same game in spirit, with Pony Island being more of a bare bone prototype in comparison.  If you're looking for something like Undertale, no this is not it either.  Pony Island builds a game around the idea of "being meta", instead of adding a meta layer to existing developed gameplay and narrative.  If you take away the "meta", there is no plot and there is no game.  I am sure the devs are aware of this as well, and Inscryption is their answer to it.  Just play Inscryption.

author: {'steamid': '76561198852325089', 'num_games_owned': 262, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1702113912}
review:
[h1]SUPERHOTぶりの衝撃を受けた[/h1]
　2025年に2が出るという情報を耳にして始めましたが、非常に新鮮な要素が多く、面白い作品でした。
　このゲームはSUPERHOTのあのデジタルな感じが好きな人であれば非常に楽しめる作品だと思います。
　[spoiler]初代MGSのサイコマンティス戦みたいな演出もあり、結構びっくりしますｗ[/spoiler]
　2時間もあればよほどのことがない限り初見でクリアできると思います。
　[b]セールで安いうちに買っちゃってください。[/b] 
事前に情報を仕入れるのはネタバレになるので最大限楽しみたいのであればやめておいた方がいいです。

[h1]日本語化について[/h1]
　このゲームは日本語未対応ですが、他のレビューにて日本語化MODを配布している方がいるので、そこから日本語化MODをダウンロードすることをおすすめします。たぶん日本語化MODを入れないと英語がわからない人であれば、そこそこきついと思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561198379962395', 'num_games_owned': 673, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1702083358}
review:
Uma Montanha-russa Satânica de Surpresas em Pony Island

Pony Island, o jogo que me fez questionar a realidade. Com o anúncio de Pony Island 2 na TGA deste ano (2023), decidi investir meus modestos 2,54 reais na experiência, e posso dizer com toda certeza que valeu cada centavo. Daniel Mullins, o cérebro por trás dessa desgraceira, mais uma vez demonstrou sua genialidade, assim como demonstrou em Inscryption, e tenho certeza que vai demonstrar no segundo jogo do pônei do diabo, altamente recomendado. (não é um jogo sobre pônei)

review:
I loved Inscryption, it was refreshingly good. So, in anticipation of Pony Island 2, which had just been announced, I tried Pony Island. I finished it in 2.2 hours. 

This developer is very inspiring. His approach to games is different. Either he wrote the manual on game development, or he ritualistically sacrificed it.

author: {'steamid': '76561199494911253', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1702035395}
review:
難易度が高すぎて「面白い」とは、思えない。


超オタクなんだろう、作者が、オタク向けに作っている（０か１の世界、白黒の世界で生きているような、アスペルガー度が高い人間向け）それで、話題になっていて、一度はやってみようと、プレイしてみた。

結論として「難易度が高すぎる」
ゆえ、面白いとか楽しいとか、作者がすごいとか、そういう感想の前に「ストレスが溜まる」
作品としては、確かに、すごいと思う、高評価も理解できる、
が、
「ゲームとして」面白さや楽しさが少ない。にも拘わらず、圧倒的高評価、みたいなのは、
「妄信」「カルト」みたいな、オタク（アスペルガー人かつ、外交的ではなくゲームとか内にこもる趣味をしてる）気質、
認知特性ゆえな「作者や作品を過剰に、美化や神聖化している」そういう傾向もあるのかな、とか、思った。

私が、この作品に、辛辣気味になる理由
「キモイ、日本の、ミソジニー男（発達障害に無自覚で、差別をなんとも思ってない、それが当たり前みたいな、キモイ男たち）」が、レビューで「非処女がどうこう」（角で刺すとか、そういうこと、書いていた）
そういう、気持ち悪い＆日本の恥（…）って感じの、レビューを書いていて、それが、トップページに表示されたりするから。（Steamとか、「ガチゲーマー」みたいな、「発達障害無自覚」で「発達障害の親との確執」とかで、マザコン＆ロリコンのミソジニー男が集まってる界隈、そういう、「ミソジニーで気持ち悪い」レビューとかも、支持するユーザーがいたりして、上位に来たりする）

そういうので、このゲームに対する、印象が、あまりよくないのもあり（作者と作品には関係ないけど）
それが評価に１割ぐらいは影響してるとしても、残りの９割は
「難しすぎ、簡単にクリアできない（恐らく、意図的に。プレイヤーを選びたいのでは、とか、思ったり）
それで、楽しいとか面白いとか、作者の自己顕示や才能やゲームへの愛憎とか、そういうのに感嘆する以前に
難しい！という、ストレスが溜まる」

そういう、否定的な評価につながる、プレイ体験があり。
評価される理由もわかるけど（良くも悪くも、唯一無二の世界、というのは、あると思う）
「ゲームとして、一番大切と思ってる、面白さや楽しさがない」（感じられない、難易度が高すぎるゆえ）

それで、オススメしないという、評価になった。

author: {'steamid': '76561198152532873', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 276, 'last_played': 1701673577}
review:
I'm not generally a fan of puzzle games but Daniel Mullins has a way of  sucking you into the world he's created and hunt for secrets. I found out that if you call an NPC "daddy" they have a unique response to it :)

This game is really sweet, the puzzles challenged me but didn't have me TOO stumped to the point where I just got frustrated. There was o nly one puzzle I ended up needing to look up, it turned out I *was* doing the right thing, I just had the timing wrong.

Everything about the atmosphere in the story is superb. The only real problem I have with this game as well as Mullin's other games is that unless you're a diehard cryptographer/secret hunter, you need to wait for other peple to release hour-long documenatries on the game well after its releaase to understand wtf is going on.  Once you have everything laid out in front of you, the story is really cool, but you don't ever really get that payoff IN the game. You almost certainly will need to look at outside sources to understan what's happening in it, which is a little unsatsifying imo. But, the game is tons of fun while you're playing it. 

8/10

review:
日本語化の方法を紹介しているサイト
https://awgsfoundry.com/blog-entry-538.html


手順が多くめんどくさかったのでgoogle driveに変換後のファイルを残します。
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1PZr-UFB8F32wKcBciE9H_nb4vDmac5-A?usp=sharing

ダウンロードしたらC:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Pony Island\PonyIsland_Data内のデータを置き換えてください。
デフォルトは英語ですが日本語に置き換わっているのはフランス語です。
言語設定をフランス語に変えてください。
セーブデータを作らないと言語設定が英語に戻るバグがあるそうです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198185288637', 'num_games_owned': 137, 'num_reviews': 119, 'playtime_forever': 110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1697389432}
review:
Esperaba que fuera más largo... Pero de todas formas es super bueno.
A nivel de historia... Es la típica del juego maldito, pero con la peculiaridad de que vamos hackeando el juego maldito, lo cual no se si es decepcionante o hilarante por parte del demonio que lo creó, en general eso hizo que se sintiera diferente a otras historias de su tipo.
A nivel jugable la formula es cuanto menos curiosa, ya que es parecido a un endless runner de scroll lateral, pero por niveles, al menos en lo referente al Pony Island metaversal, y los cambios que se van generando logran que se mantenga interesante. Los puzzles de hackeo son lo sorprendentemente buenos, son complicados sin caer en lo virtualmente imposible, y las mecanicas progresan de manera similar que con Pony Island. En general es muy bueno, el buen progreso jugable les hizo un gran favor.
A nivel sonoro no tengo nada que destacar, y nivel grafico es bueno.

Aunque considero que no es TAN excelente como habia oido, reconozco que tiene sus meritos, esta genial para pasar una o dos tardes, lo recomiendo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113225944', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 266, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 266, 'last_played': 1548520654}
review: Pony Island engaña con su apariencia inicial de un juego sobre ponis, revelándose rápidamente como una experiencia oscura y llena de giros. Me fascina cómo rompe la cuarta pared, combinando puzzles y plataformas con una narrativa meta. Es inquietante y surrealista, simple en diseño pero profundamente efectivo. En resumen, Pony Island es una experiencia única en el mundo de los videojuegos, perfecta para quienes buscan algo totalmente fuera de lo común.

author: {'steamid': '76561199227523750', 'num_games_owned': 115, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 479, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 479, 'last_played': 1700554845}
review:
[h1] Introduccion [/h1]
 
lo habia encontrado en rebaja y habia visto varios videos sobre el juego y por el precio decide darle la oportunidad mas que nada por que soy bastante fan de este tipo de juegos que rompen la cuarta pared y con unas reseñas muy buenas tome la decision de comprarlo.

[h1] Argumento [/h1]

en poco tiempo descubrimos que el juego está corrompido por el mismo Lucifer, quien está tratando de reclamar el alma del jugador(nosotros) para sí mismo. Somos ayudados por el alma de un jugador anterior a acceder a la programación interna de Pony Island para sortear las trampas dejadas por Lucifer y salvar no solo su alma, sino las muchas almas atormentadas que están atrapadas dentro del código del juego.


[h1] Jugabilidad [/h1]

Pony Island tiene la tipica jugabilidad tosca de un juego de arcade. Es principalmente un estilo de apuntar y hacer clic, en algunos momentos usamos una  especie de sistema operativo simulado. debemos explorar la programación interna del juego de arcade «Pony Island» para poder ir progresando. A veces, debemos jugar «Pony Island», un tipo de juego que consiste en correr sin fin, guiando a un poni a través de un valle cubierto de hierba, evitando obstáculos y disparando a los enemigos. así como del sistema operativo, haciendo clic en los «portales» que aparecen en la pantalla, presentandonos un pseudocódigo simplificado junto con uno o más cuadros y comandos de instrucciones visuales, como «mover hacia abajo», «mover a la izquierda» o «repetir». En estas pantallas, nosotros deberemos reordenar las instrucciones visuales para modificar cómo se ejecutará la «programación». Esto evitará cualquier «corrupción» en el código del juego o, en algunos casos, «engañará» al juego (por ejemplo, aumentando sus puntos de experiencia) para poder avanzar, en pocas palabras serian una especie de puzzles. La persona con la que nosotros hablamos dentro del juego a través de mensajes crea portales a los archivos principales, con los que se puede interactuar. En una parte del juego, hay cuatro personas, incluido Nosotros: «1U©iF#r» (el Diablo), «CORRUPTED», «h0peles$0ul», y tú, el «Guest»

[h1] Graficos [/h1]

desarrollado por Unity no podemos hablar mucho del apartado grafico siendo un juego 2D y que recrea un juego arcade de muchos años atras, aunque el juego se ve bastante bien para ser que no busca exactamente tener buenos graficos 7,5/10

[h1] Sonido [/h1]

no tenemos dialogos en si solo ruidos y textos pero en ni un momento tenemos algun dialogo, los sonidos son simples y bonitos con el ambiente del juego los sonidos le queda perfecto, es un juego que no hace falta dialogos con los textos es mas que suficiente 8,5/10

[h1] 100% [/h1]

Su 100% la verdad es bastante facil entre 6/9 horas tranquilamente podemos terminarlo para la primera pasada les recomiendo jugar al juego y disfrutar su historia despues pueden
sacar los logros tiene logros simples y un logro de coleccionar tickets que son en total 24 tickets el cual tambien nos desbloquea un final secreto.
 Les dejo la guia la cual use para sacar todos los logros y asi no se les dificulta encontrar todos los tickets que la verdad no estan tan dificiles en dos pasadas obtendran el 100%

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=845486718
[h1] Conclusion [/h1]

Pony island es el tipico juego que rompe la 4ta pared pero de la manera en que lo hace es bastante unico y un juego que lo que tiene de malo es la poca duracion que tiene en una tarde tranquilamente lo podemos terminar de manera facil por eso pienso que lo unico malo del juego es su corta duracion, su precio la verdad vale la pena(EN ARG NO) y mas si lo conseguimos en descuento, Pony island es mas que nada para a los que les gusta este tipo de juegos, Tiene buen sonido para el ambiente que tiene el juego y un apartado grafico simple pero como dijimos anteriormente la base del juego no es su su apartado grafico ya que jugamos un juego de arcade viejo, para los fanes de juegos indie este es un juego que tienen que tener en sus colecciones.

NOTA FINAL : 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198315388061', 'num_games_owned': 165, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 871, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 871, 'last_played': 1700385464}
review:
Una experiencia muy divertida con una estética bastante única, sin mecánicas o controles muy complejos y con puzzles creativos que se tornan cada vez más desafiantes sin llegar nunca a ser muy frustrantes [spoiler]a excepcion del ultimo puzzle de las mariposas jajaj[/spoiler]. Los diferentes 'jefes' del juego interactuan con el jugador de maneras muy originales y en general es un titulo muy consciente de si mismo y de sus jugadores. 
Disfruté mucho de encontrar los diferentes easter eggs y secretos y de atar los cabos sueltos que el juego te va dando. Un juegazo must play, super memorable y que vale mucho la pena por su precio.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996219217', 'num_games_owned': 964, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1700177127}
review:
[spoiler]算是轻度的Meta游戏，当然也可能像邪恶冥刻一样有ARG成分。

GamePlay没法跟邪恶冥刻比，只有一个简单的横板跳跃游戏，控制小马跳过障碍物，同时也能发射激光攻击敌人。还有一部分是解密，几列代码，通过在部分节点设置方向符，让代码顺利执行。总体上玩法偏轻度，但氛围营造的不错，流程比较短，相较邪恶冥刻感觉就是浅尝辄止。

这次的剧情是发生在一个像是游乐厅的地方，玩家玩着一台名为Pony Island的街机（当然，最开始感觉像是电脑）。意外发现了被囚禁在机器中的灵魂，和玩家通过聊天软件沟通，恳求玩家帮忙删除3个核心文件，以解救他的灵魂。所以玩家就开始一边玩Pony Island一边寻找核心文件删除。流程中当然会遇到潜伏在这个机器上的恶魔的阻挠，也有少许轻度解谜的要素，需要玩家在电脑中寻找线索和答案。总体上算是制作组的一个试水作，完成度不错，但内容量少，风格化相对突出的一款小品。[/spoiler]
