review: From the creator of The Hex and Inscryption. I feel like this is necessary to say since they all are part of a dark and fascinating world that's being built upon. Pony Island is a strange adventure with fun puzzles with secrets hiding throughout. The unique playstyle and narrative rise this (and all of Mullins games) above the rest. Give it a go! Maybe kill Jesus while you're out there...but no. Don't kill Jesus. This IS just a game...right?

author: {'steamid': '76561198804370253', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 479, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 479, 'last_played': 1608452391}
review:
今天浏览我在Steam上玩过的游戏，发现这个还没有写评测，怀着“大概写完可以心满意足去睡觉吧”的心情又在电脑前多逗留一阵。最近又开始入睡有些困难，开始近乎玄学式地搜刮可以让入睡变得更容易的办法，但愿写评测可以是不错的一个。

Pony Island是一款meta游戏，[spoiler] 当中与创作者的交流是这个游戏的灵魂，让我又兴奋又害怕，徘徊在控制与被控制之间 [/spoiler]。全部游戏可以理解为在玩几个小游戏，但玩家感受到的是熟悉的游戏在不知不觉中以不熟悉的方式出现并且挑战玩家对游戏传统的认知。递进感也很好，一步一步将玩家引入游戏的世界，将meta游戏的独特慢慢展现出来。[spoiler] 有一个地方与steam好友系统的互动真的骗到我了，非常惊喜，能够让我惊喜的游戏是蛮少的。 [/spoiler]

对于从来没有玩过meta游戏的玩家来说，这是不错的入坑作品，流程不长，娱乐性强，虽然是单人游戏，但是仿佛买游戏送朋友般可以在陪伴下度过一段游玩时间。千万不要被它简陋的画风劝退，买下来试试，两个小时足够让你喜欢上它。对于喜欢meta的玩家，还在等什么呢？文字量比较小，不认识的单词翻翻就懂了。

咦，原本是有点困意的，写完评测后更精神了？

author: {'steamid': '76561198099849297', 'num_games_owned': 508, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145, 'last_played': 1672296141}
review: "Pony Island" es un juego de puzzle y aventura con un giro inesperado. En este juego, te encuentras atrapado en una versión distorsionada de un inocente juego de ponis. A medida que avanzas, descubres que hay algo siniestro y maligno detrás de la aparente dulzura del juego. Deberás resolver acertijos y desafíos para escapar de esta trampa diabólica mientras te adentras en una narrativa intrigante y surrealista. "Pony Island" es conocido por su estilo único y su capacidad para subvertir las expectativas de los jugadores. Si estás buscando una experiencia de juego fuera de lo común y llena de sorpresas, "Pony Island" es una elección interesante.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009510626', 'num_games_owned': 1114, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 507, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 507, 'last_played': 1683294746}
review:
Pony Island is a peculiar and unconventional indie game that takes players on a mind-bending journey unlike anything else. With its unique blend of genres, unexpected twists, and distinctive presentation, Pony Island captivates players from start to finish, leaving them contemplating its enigmatic charm. While not without a few minor hiccups, it is undoubtedly an experience worth undertaking, earning a solid score of 4/5.

At first glance, Pony Island appears to be a simple and innocent arcade game featuring adorable ponies. However, beneath its seemingly innocent exterior lies a dark and twisted narrative that unfolds in ways you could never anticipate. The game takes pleasure in subverting expectations, constantly challenging and engaging players with its clever puzzles and unconventional mechanics.

The gameplay of Pony Island is refreshingly unique. It blends elements of classic arcade games with puzzle-solving and a touch of meta-narrative. Maneuvering through the glitchy and glitch-filled levels, you'll encounter obstacles, riddles, and unexpected surprises that keep you on your toes. The way Pony Island subverts traditional gameplay conventions and breaks the fourth wall is a stroke of genius, creating a truly immersive experience.

The storytelling in Pony Island is where the game truly shines. It cleverly weaves a mysterious and thought-provoking narrative that keeps you engaged throughout. The way it incorporates themes of technology, mythology, and existentialism is intriguing, often leaving players questioning the nature of their own reality. The game's plot twists and unexpected revelations are delivered with finesse, providing a memorable and satisfying experience.

Visually, Pony Island employs a retro aesthetic that pays homage to the classic arcade era. The pixel art style, combined with glitch effects and eerie atmosphere, creates a distinct and memorable ambiance. The sound design complements the visuals perfectly, with a haunting and atmospheric soundtrack that enhances the game's overall tone.

While Pony Island is a remarkable experience, it does have a few minor shortcomings. Some puzzles and mechanics may feel repetitive after a while, and a few segments could benefit from further refinement to maintain a consistent level of engagement. However, these minor flaws are overshadowed by the game's overall uniqueness and creativity.

In conclusion, Pony Island is an indie gem that pushes the boundaries of traditional gaming. Its unconventional narrative, inventive gameplay mechanics, and distinctive visual style make it a captivating and memorable experience. With its intriguing twists and thought-provoking themes, Pony Island stands as a shining example of indie game innovation. While it may not be perfect, its charm and originality make it an absolute must-play for those seeking something out of the ordinary.

Score: 4/5

review:
굉장히 새로운 장르의 게임이었습니다!

공포게임이라는 생각은 전혀 안들었지만
트레일러에서 보다시피 기괴스러운 연출은 많이 나옵니다.

숨겨진 요소들을 직접 찾아가는게 이 게임의 진짜 묘미라고 생각하지만
모든 시크릿을 혼자서 다 찾기가 어려워 저도 가이드를 많이 참고했습니다.

개인적으로 진엔딩은 조금 마음에 들지 않았습니다.
제작자의 의도가 무엇인지 모르겠더군요.

author: {'steamid': '76561199099866769', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 280, 'last_played': 1683397735}
review:
Divertido e interesante videojuego que te obliga a ponerte en tensión para lograr descifrar sus errores de código. Breve pero intenso, no necesita tener 50 horas de gameplay para ser una obra notable. Cuenta con una banda sonora que se integra a la perfección y un estilo de juego engañoso y sorprendentemente divertido. Sistema de logros asequible y ameno con alguna que otra sorpresa.

Cuando lo completes, por favor, desinstala Pony Island. Gracias.

author: {'steamid': '76561199168747208', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1667466699}
review:
Игра стоит прохождения, но теперь насчет плюсов и минусов.
Плюсы: 
1. В игре интересный сюжет и он не затянут.
2. Геймплейная составляющая прикольная и уникальная, хоть совсем не бросает вызов.
3. ??? (пройдите стимовскую версию, чтобы открыть).
4. Есть доп. контент, для тех кто хочет увеличить прохождение.
Минусы:
1. Игра достаточно короткая, даже учитывая доп. контент.
2. Игра в некоторые моменты просто скучная.

author: {'steamid': '76561198442691061', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 219, 'last_played': 1657386571}
review:
Сколько ждал , сколько терпел ..... И наконец-то я купил её (конечно давно но это совсем другая история)  ). Я хотел её купить когда она вышла (у меня тогда был другой аккаунт) . 
 С начало я бы хотел сказать вот что. Это игра которая ломает 4ю стену (дай в принцепе сам разраб любит такое добавлять) но конкретно это игра интересна тем , что мы не знаем кто мы и откуда мы и что за банкомат перед нами стоит . Эту игру можно пройти оч быстро , если ты знаешь что куда , если нет то гарантирую на 5 часов игры (могу обмануть). Я бы мог поделится с вами мысли , но я уверен что многие знают эту игру (если нет то уж простите) По этому я советую вам лично пройти её 
 А теперь я хочу спасти единственную душу , которая осталось в этой игре .....

author: {'steamid': '76561197990850747', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1682987277}
review:
Based on the reviews I always thought this is an absolute must-play, but this game is absolutely (below) average and should only be played if bored.


I guess it's worth its money, the puzzles are fun compared to the plattforming sections, there are some interesting concepts and gameplay mechanics that keeps it interesting.

In contrast is a fairly stupid story, a meta element that really is not that great in 2023 and way too long plattforming sections that are simply boring.

It was probably better when it was new

review: Типо игра с двойным дном и религиозным сюжетом, хватит на один вечерок. Играем за пони, а потом как понеслась сатанинская ересь, гг приходится отдуваться за всех предыдущих игроков автомата Pony Island. Цепляет и интересно выглядит, можно попробовать.

author: {'steamid': '76561199454551977', 'num_games_owned': 73, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1682951565}
review: Ben de oynadım bitirdim sonra yorumlara baktım amq herkes oyun bitince oyunu silmiş. Ne iyi niyetli insanlarsınız siz ya...  Şuan oyun dosyalarını arşivliyorum diskimde de yeteri kadar yer var. Hatta yapabilirsem oyunun birkaç kopyasını da bilgisayarımda tutmak isterim. Size de tavsiyemdir, iyi niyetimizden oynamadık bu oyunu. Oyundan sonra olabildiğince şeytanlaşmayı düşünüyorum. Hatta belli mi olur belki bir ara oyun yapmaya niyetlenirim orada kullanırım bunları. Bir gün şeytan falan olabilirsem de atıştırmalık bir şeylerim olur bunlar. Size de silmemenizi tavsiye ederim. Yapımcı o kadar ruh toplamış sonuçta niye serbest bırakalım ki?

review: Its a fun and enjoyable puzzle game with a real portion of scaryness to it. Especially in the 3rd wall breaking aspect. I really recommend you getting this game as its pretty good and usually fairly cheap!

author: {'steamid': '76561198321007490', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 488, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 394, 'last_played': 1694975016}
review: Pony Island ist ein erfrischendes und ungewöhnliches Spiel, das den Spieler in eine faszinierende Welt voller Geheimnisse und Überraschungen entführt. Die ansprechende Pixel-Grafik und die eingängige Musik schaffen eine stimmungsvolle Atmosphäre, die den Spieler von Anfang an in den Bann zieht. Besonders beeindruckend sind die raffinierten Rätsel und Herausforderungen, die den Spieler immer wieder aufs Neue fordern und für anhaltenden Spielspaß sorgen. Aber auch die Geschichte des Spiels, die nach und nach enthüllt wird, ist fesselnd und originell. Insgesamt ist Pony Island ein großartiges Spiel, das mit seinen kreativen Ideen und der liebevollen Gestaltung zu begeistern weiß. Ein absolutes Highlight für jeden Gamer!

author: {'steamid': '76561198282735994', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 170, 'last_played': 1625474372}

review: What can I say about Pony Island? Well, if you're looking for a wacky, disrupted, fourth wall breaking, paranoia inducing experience, then this game is for you. You never know what to expect next as the game experience unfolds. Maybe it isn't for everyone, and definitely isn't for all occasions, but it's absolutely worth checking out if you love out of the box and abnormal yet entertaining games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006885175', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 250, 'last_played': 1681026240}
review:
Press face against screen to continue.

You maybe in my boat coming off the manic nightmare that is Inscyption.
And as another Daniel Mullens game, you're in for some fun.
It 100% met my expectations maybe even surpasses them.

While I'd still say Inscryption is a better game, Pony Island is a fraction of the cost and well worth the 5-6$ CAD.

As with Inscryption try not to look things up, you may ruin your experience.

review:
ゲームプレイヤーのロールプレイ、という体のパズルゲーム。画面のあちこちクリックして手がかりを探す感じ。一本道をなぞっていけるか詰まるかというだけのゲーム性なので、他の色々なジャンルのゲームが苦手な人向きだと思われる。
つまらない作業と手探りを合間合間に強制されながら、自己陶酔の賜物でしかない演出を眺めるだけ。レトロゲーがモチーフなわけだけど、レトロゲーのアーカイブスをやってるほうが千倍楽しいですね･･･

author: {'steamid': '76561199066602883', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1680434625}
review:
Great game, I definitely recommend giving it a chance. This game was truly a unique experience. The story itself isn't too long and the puzzles are really nice. Some are easy, some not so easy. The entire story takes about 2 - 3 hours or so. (That is if you are not rushing it or trying to speedrun it). There were multiple secrets, small hints and quite a few tricks which I really liked. The game itself is really creative and both cute and a tiny bit scary (not scary to me but some people may have different experiences). The story itself is really interesting and quite easy to follow. 
 Overall, the game is really enjoyable and I highly recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128988688', 'num_games_owned': 318, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1679694588}
review:
A game that established the fourth-wall breaking theme of "the player vs the game". Later titles such as "There is no game: wrong dimension" improved on the concept and play a lot smoother, pony island can be a bit tedious and repetetive. However, it does not overstay is welcome, has fresh and unique ideas and should be appreciated for the things it introduced.  

On the steam deck, you have to make regular use of the onscreen keyboard and drag and drop which can lead to hand cranmps while dragging and dropping, so I recommend using the shoulder buttons to simulate clicks

author: {'steamid': '76561199483816316', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1679954257}
review:
Ingredientes:

6 choclos grandes
1 cebolla mediana picada en cubos pequeños
1/2 taza de aceite vegetal
1/2 taza de leche
1 cucharada de sal
1/2 cucharadita de comino
1/4 cucharadita de pimienta
Instrucciones:

Desgrana los choclos y licúalos junto con la leche, la sal, el comino y la pimienta. Debe quedar una mezcla homogénea y sin grumos.
En una sartén grande, sofríe la cebolla en el aceite hasta que esté dorada.
Agrega la mezcla de choclo a la sartén y revuelve constantemente a fuego medio-bajo hasta que espese. Esto puede tardar entre 30 a 40 minutos.
Una vez que la mezcla haya espesado, retira del fuego y deja enfriar.
Mientras tanto, prepara las hojas de choclo. Pela las hojas de choclo con cuidado y corta en cuadrados del mismo tamaño.
Coloca una cucharada grande de la mezcla de choclo en el centro de una hoja de choclo y envuelve formando un paquete. Asegúrate de que quede bien cerrado.
Coloca los paquetes en una olla grande con agua hirviendo y cocina durante 45 minutos.
Una vez que estén cocidas, saca las humitas del agua y déjalas enfriar antes de servir.
¡Y listo! Ya tienes unas deliciosas humitas para compartir en familia o con amigos. ¡Que las disfrutes!

author: {'steamid': '76561199046142176', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 251, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 251, 'last_played': 1679816721}
review:
私のように英語が苦手な方にはお勧めしません

そこそこ早くテキストが流れるので英語苦手な人間は断片的にしかストーリー理解できず悔しい思いします

2023年3月現在日本語化パッチが公開されておらず（過去には公開されていたようです）
日本語化の方法もあるようですが面倒なのとクラッシュの可能性もあるようで私はやまリませんでした

設定や演出は面白いと思ったので日本語化の労力が苦でない方や英語得意な方ならお勧めです

author: {'steamid': '76561198336484952', 'num_games_owned': 484, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1679635307}
review:
[h1]INSERT SOUL 2 PLAY[/h1]
神仙游戏
慕邪恶冥刻的名而来
作者是真的把玩家心理和glitch art玩明白了
[hr][/hr]首先声明不要被标题迷惑了
本作不是什么子供向的欢乐小游戏
但也不是什么穷凶极恶的邪典游戏啦
更类似于都市传说一般令人毛骨悚然的感受
你是一个被恶魔囚禁于街机游戏里的灵魂
随着和另一个无助灵魂的合作过程中
解放所有被恶魔困于此地的灵魂
并逐渐发现小马岛的真相（
[hr][/hr]游戏玩法主要分为三块
在解谜游戏的大框架下套入了谷歌恐龙小游戏+伪代码解谜
期间随着剧情层层深入小游戏的难度也逐级上升
难以想象只用两个键操控的跑跳小游戏也能构建出如此丰富的操作空间
同时游戏中伪代码形式的解谜以及各类glitch art尤其契合主题
使得整体的游戏氛围塑造显得诡异、仿佛后末世一般的荒凉
而一切都在最终的BOSS FIGHT下迎来宏伟的谢幕
但还没完
[spoiler]作者充分利用玩家心理为收集全部票券的玩家准备了隐藏boss战
这场boss战纯纯是为了满足此类全收集玩家的心理而出现的
在令人满足的同时还没有背离剧情的初衷
表现hopeless soul的无奈与妥协[/spoiler]
[hr][/hr]本作白金难度不高
个人白金时长3H
打了两遍流程来收集票券和问题
但这么优秀的艺术品管他什么白金
强烈要求所有人都来体验一下本作

author: {'steamid': '76561199073220819', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1679578800}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198827886302', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1679435669}
review: Saw this precious game on youtube years ago and couldn't walk past this unique experience when i saw it on a sale. I think given the awesome games Daniel have made as of now, especially the most recent Inscryption, it is evident that this game deserves the utmost praise and respect as the first ever project made by such a skillful developer, which despite being first, was very high quality. This game has the humor, the subtlety, some interesting lore and very thoroughly made puzzles which I honestly enjoyed the most. I hope whoever considers buying this game for times to come never thinks twice!

review: I don't get the hype.  The game play is bad and repetitive.  The graphics are horrible.  The puzzles are average.  The story is a good idea, but wears out quickly. author: {'steamid': '76561198869416351', 'num_games_owned': 251, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 388, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 351, 'last_played': 1699638600}
review:
Bu oyunu normalde küçükken korsan bir şekilde bitirdim ama başka bu firmanın başka bir oyunu olan "inscryption"  alcaktım ama indirimide baktım ki oyunun normal fiyatı önceden korsan bitirdiğim 2 oyunla beraber (pony island ve the hex)satilan paketin nedenini bilmediğim bir nedenden dolayı daha ucuzdu bu yüzden böylle aldım (paket 28 liraydı oyun 30 liraydı) hem oyunu ucuza aldım hemde önceden oynadığım korsan olarak oynadığım oyunlara saygısızlık olmasın diye böyle alayım dedim ve sonuç burdayız


oyun oynanış ve hikaye olarak bilgi vermiyecem eğerki yetenek gerektiren oyunları seviyorsanız bu oyunu  almayın bu oyun yarı bulmaca yarı hikaye oyunu hikayesinin başını kısaca özetlersek ruhumuz "pony island" adında bir oyuna sıkışıyor vev burdan kurtulmaya çalışıyoz



son olarak bu oyunu çok sevdim ama yinede sildim nedenini oyun sonunda sizde anlarsınız

author: {'steamid': '76561198132847063', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 433, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 433, 'last_played': 1679214902}
review:
Pony island is a very clever and interesting puzzle game. It tries to mess with you and your perception of reality. It is full of optional secrets for you to discover. A true collector's item.
It is true, as other reviews have pointed out, that you have to go in blind to get the full experience. Don't spoil the surprises!

author: {'steamid': '76561198305320973', 'num_games_owned': 576, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 192, 'last_played': 1678623715}
review:
Гра сподобалась, але походу подібні жанри не зовсім для мене. Хоча випадково знаходити якісь секрети звісно кайфово, але при цьому вибивати платину не хочеться. Добре, що вона хоч коротка. 
Оцінка 2 із 4, себто середня, хоч і признаю звісно, що гра можна сказати унікальна все таки, просто не моє.
Але один момент, майже наприкінці, звісно топовий, я прям декілька хвилин сидів розбирався чи то реально. Хто поняв, той поняв

author: {'steamid': '76561198256416713', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 342, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 342, 'last_played': 1623594799}
review:
Un juegazo con alta banda sonora, esta demás decir que es del tipo de juegos que parecen tiernos pero no lo son.
La estética o temática del pixel art me encanta ya que va con la banda sonora y el suspenso y lo tétrico de los momentos en el juego.

Además hay unos coleccionables que son unos tickets, y al tenerlos todos ujui créanme que vale MUCHO la pena (al menos para mi lo fue).

author: {'steamid': '76561199058205584', 'num_games_owned': 313, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 104, 'last_played': 1672335175}
review: This game’s just okay, honestly. The Hex and Inscryption took from what this game started and turned it into some of the best gameplay and storytelling I’ve ever seen. As for Pony Island, you might enjoy it blind. If you know what happens in it, there’s not a lot to enjoy. I’ll still recommend though, for what this game started, and for the fact that the game is still well-made, it just hasn’t aged very well in comparison to far superior games made by the same person.

author: {'steamid': '76561198107654107', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 107, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 350, 'last_played': 1676975853}
review:
Первая (из трёх на данный момент) игра Дэниэла Маллинза, в целом, похожа на вторую.

Самые зачатки "деконструкции", когда в игре не то чтобы есть геймплей, но зато есть "ломание устоявшихся шаблонов". Это интересно и быстро - игра проходится за два часа. И потом ещё можно потратить 3 часа с прохождением, потому как, видит бог, искать "все секреты" в линейной игре - то ещё неудовольствие. А с прохождением это как перепройти с dev-комментарием.

Рекомендую, мило, нестрашно, интересно.

review: Very unique game. I was at the Museum of Popular Art in Seattle and walked into a videogame exhibit room - where you can actually play a few games. I sat down and played this for 2+ hours at that time. Wildest museum experience I've ever had. Highly recommended as an artistic experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007432801', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 178, 'last_played': 1675990631}
review: A very nice and well-made (meta)game, clearly showing the vast talent and potential of Daniel Mullins. Pony Island is well-designed and is a showcase of how great low-budget indie games can be: limited in scope yet polished and highly enjoyable.

review: A good little horror game, that i wish was something more. It personally doesnt do the horror well for me, but I do enjoy this game, and think it is phenomenally well made especially for its time. You should play it at least once, even if you dont find it scary.

author: {'steamid': '76561198302892519', 'num_games_owned': 198, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1675561468}
review: Wow... what an experience. So many innovative ideas that I've never seen. [spoiler]The fake steam messages, the hopeless soul asking the player to uninstall the game to save him, the part when you go into the recycling bin and one of the games you click just brings you right back into the one you are currently playing, the 3d sections within the entirely 2d game, and i know there's more im forgetting. [/spoiler] Great ideas need great execution, and it was great. The puzzles were fun, the music and visuals created the entire tone, and the story (for the most part, still not sure about the random glimpses into the main characters past) was fitting. This game is like 2$ on sale, just buy it.

review: I wanted to give this game a good review but there is one reason why I didn't is all because of Jesus. Let me explain: in order to get one of the certain endings, you have to get all 24 tickets. One of the ways to do that is to not kill Jesus when you're playing the game in the 3 act. However, it's next to impossible. If it was Jesus flying around, you'd be fine but there are two white butterflies that you cannot touch. You shoot them, you restart. And to top it all off, you have to deal with the normal butterflies too! There is no way in hell to get that ticket because they made it to complicated. So yeah, I'm upset because now I won't be able to finish the game all because of one ticket.

review:
This game feels like it doesn't respect itself, but still demands respect from its audience. The entire theme feels so over-the-top, middle-school level edgy, but it still tries to pass off as clever and deep.
On top of that it doesn't even feel narratively coherent in any way.
Gameplay wise it's also not really good, most of the puzzles were really simple and the "platforming" parts were either laughaubly easy or just annoying.

author: {'steamid': '76561198136647171', 'num_games_owned': 7345, 'num_reviews': 277, 'playtime_forever': 434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 298, 'last_played': 1674340174}
review:
[h1]Pony Island[/h1]
En un ordenador lleno de archivos corruptos hay un juego lleno de bugs que todavía "funciona"

Pony Island es de esos juegos en el que interactúas rompiendo la 4ta pared. 
Algunos como [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/ewoda/recommended/1240210?snr=1_5_9__402]There is no game[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/ewoda/recommended/1275670?snr=1_5_9__402]Outcore[/url] o del mismo autor como [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/ewoda/recommended/510420?snr=1_5_9__402]The Hex[/url] tienen en común con este la lucha contra la computadora que te va haciendo putaditas poniéndote en duda de si es así el juego o te están hackeando de verdad.

[u][b]Pros[/b][/u]:
✔️ Las putaditas del juego y lo original de algunas situaciones y puzzles
✔️ Precio

[u][b]Contras[/b][/u]:
❌Corto (Se termina en una tarde)

Si te gustan los juegos de este estilo, es de compra obligada.

Nota: [b]8/10[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561197970753301', 'num_games_owned': 857, 'num_reviews': 210, 'playtime_forever': 263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 263, 'last_played': 1674098103}
review:
A great balance of fourth-wall breaking gameplay (smart enough to make it work) and some actually challenging puzzles makes this an easy game to recommend.

Literally my only quibble is that one logic puzzle mechanic was explained vaguely enough that I was 100% convinced the game was bugged until I just decided to brute force the puzzle by trying every possible combination and learned I misunderstood something.  I feel like the ability to hit a wall like that in a goofy quick game is a little surprising, but again, that is the only negative I can think of at all.

review:
Este juego captó mi atención desde el primer instante en que lo vi hace ya varios años, lo compré con una imagen bastante buena, me imaginaba un titulo bastante original y medio denso.
Después de jugarlo me gustaría decir que es mejor llegar al juego sabiendo muy poco de este, siento que incluso no lo podría definir en un solo genero; te encuentras puzzles, plataformeo, exploración y más.
en fin, jueguen pony island xd y si tienen al menos una ligera noción de desarrollo y diseño de vídeojuegos lo van a gozar más incluso

author: {'steamid': '76561198004773202', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1673881844}
review:
Intéressant si vous n'avez jamais fait aucun jeu de Daniel Mullins, ou que vous voulez voir où et comment tout a commencé.

Mais si vous avez déjà fait The Hex et/ou Inscryption, honnêtement, il n'y a pas vraiment d'intérêt à faire ce jeu.

Ceci dit, ça reste sympa, le jeu se finit en un peu plus de 2 heures, et ça a permis de poser les bases (et donc permis l'existence) de The Hex et Inscryption, qui pour le coup sont, sans être des chefs d'oeuvres, des coups de génie qui font avancer le jeu vidéo.

Bref : honnêtement, surtout vu le prix dérisoire, je recommande !

author: {'steamid': '76561198024707408', 'num_games_owned': 2339, 'num_reviews': 178, 'playtime_forever': 146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 1673551541}
review: Pony Island is a narrative-heavy puzzle/arcade game that is composed of two major mini-games (one type of arcade and one of puzzle) - and there is a twisted and original story that binds them. All in all, I have to be tentatively positive about this game. I hated the actual core gameplay of arcade game (which is you spend majority of time). The puzzle game was mediocre at best. That said - I do not regret playing the game because I liked the story (it's not groundbreaking but very interesting) and the aesthetics enough to make up for the poor gameplay.

author: {'steamid': '76561198131965044', 'num_games_owned': 149, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 147, 'last_played': 1673709745}
review:
This will indeed be an interesting review, as I had purchased this game in an Inscryption bundle with absolutely no knowledge of the game in advance. So, with absolutely no idea or preconceptions, I opened up Pony Island. Here's a few non-spoilery feelings about it.

Really Good: If you enjoyed the mind of Daniel Mullins in a game like Inscryption, you'll love the overall feel of the game. The plot points feel like something you would expect from on of Daniel's games, and that's not a bad thing at all. The mood and the personality of the game were pretty cool. DM's trademark dark humor and attention to detail is here. I really liked the very very end. (no spoilers)

The Kinda Good: I really enjoyed the puzzles (at first - more on this later) and felt that going through the code of the game was quite interesting. The gameplay was easy to learn and understand (more on this later, too!). 

The "ugh": The puzzles become very repetitive towards the end. While the puzzle idea is novel, and the puzzles offer a nice degree of challenge, they become a chore towards the end, and I rolled my eyes when I had to play them. Luckily, this only happened towards the end of the run. The gameplay was perfectly fine, and while I realize the importance of (basically) repeating the same thing over and over again, it didn't make for a really satisfying game play.

The "I wish": I know this game came out nearly 7 years ago. I firmly believe that Daniel, knowing what he knows now, would be able to make this game an absolutely legendary game. 

On its own, it's definitely worth a punt, especially if you're a fan of Daniel Mullins or you don't mind interesting puzzles (that may get a bit repetitive towards the end). Recommended with a caveat.

author: {'steamid': '76561198396388057', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 287, 'last_played': 1673644023}
review:
A nice, short experience that plays around with a few variations around a very simple idea. The plot isn't stunning, but it's clever enough to be engaging. There is a good amount of secrets and little jokes to find around.

My first play-through took me a little over two hours, and another three hours to work through the game to get all the achievements (with a guide to help, which I recommend if you're going for completion because some are pretty tricky).

If you're into long, full, complex games, this probably isn't for you. But if you can enjoy a little gimmicky experience, I would recommend this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198169322622', 'num_games_owned': 180, 'num_reviews': 125, 'playtime_forever': 390, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 166, 'last_played': 1673466423}
review:
Like pretentious games? Like being fooled by the tag "Psychological Horror"? Like being tricked this is one of those games that fuck with you like When the darkness comes or (it's lesser doublet) Stanley Parable? Well spoiler, this ain't. After you strip away the pretentiousness (better use a spatula, or a blowtorch...), it's a basic mini-game collection with a lot of annoying parts (especially that last butterfly puzzle and the Beelzebub fight that NEEDS TO HAVE A FUCKING HEALTH METER) you really don't want to play in the year 20XX (hell the Atari 2600 had better games than the minigames in this one, and with a scoring system too). The story is passable, but certainly nothing special – and that's the real downfall of this game. For a story like e.g. Portal, I am willing to suffer through bad and boring gameplay (the gameplay in Portal did inded get really old and annoying in the second one, for the record), but not for something that turns more nondescript and generic the longer it goes on. Pony or Satan (who only spouts some generic platitudes and can't even be called a character despite being the vague villain of this game), nothing means anything to me or leaves any impression on me here! And of course, there's the tiresome "collect tickets hidden literally everywhere in the game" achievement that forces you to replay the game if you actually want to experience it for yourself the first time you play it (like I as a gamer usually do – minus the overly hard puzzles that would take away too much of my time and brain cells) and not just follow the guide to a T the first time (which definitely is the better strategy for the true achievement hunter). That would be ok if this game had replay value... but yeah... nope.

Despite what I said, this would still be a sideways thumb if Steam allowed that, as the structure of the game is still pretty creative (though the "pony" trope is everything but), but alas, as Steam is as black and white as [insert political comparison relating to America in the 2010s+ here] it's a thumb down. Truly a sign of the times.

Btw, I would've been literally stuck on the "text adventure" screen cause I didn't know how to go back to the menu, and apparently (unlike in ANY actual text adventure ever made, or DOS for that matter), you cannot have the screen repeat itself so you can see the list of commands again) if I hadn't looked up the situation in a video guide. Your call whether that's a "Did not do the research", or "Did they even test this game before they released it?" Thank Satan for creating the internet...

PS: Do try out When the darkness comes. It's got the scariest moment I ever experienced sitting in front of a computer screen...

review: This game is Genre-breaking, and TOTALLY BRILLIANT.  It's definitely one of THE BEST games that I have EVER played.  Honestly, I've never played anything like it.  Anything.  It surprises you left, and right.  You have no idea wth is going on, and then you do, and then you don't.  Great gameplay, great soundtrack, brilliantly written, philosophical, and just on a whole other level than other games really.  I can't say much about it, as it will spoil it.  But what I CAN tell you is that if you don't play this game, then you have NOT lived a full life.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043595516', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 136, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1672890607}
review:
A surreal, atmospheric, narrative-driven puzzler with plenty to love & little to dislike. The puzzles aren't overly difficult if you're the kind who likes to think outside the box a bit, & they link together the whole story really, really well.

It's hard to talk too much about it without spoiling what makes it so enjoyable, but at full price it's a deal, & on sale it's an absolute steal. If you're into fourth-wall breaking funky puzzle mayhem stories, it doesn't get much better than Pony Island.

author: {'steamid': '76561198430528642', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 595, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 595, 'last_played': 1661608041}
review:
oyun gayet iyi sırada:
Kemalpaşa tatlısı tarifi

Malzemeler:
1 Paket 150 gr. Kemalpaşa/Peynir Tatlısı
Su: 1000 ml. (5 su bardağı)
Şeker: 900 gr. (4,5 su bardağı)
Limon: 4-5 damla
Tencere: 30-35 cm çapında 20-25 cm derinliğinde tavsiye edilir.
Hazırlanışı:

Su, şeker ve limon suyunu tencerenize boşaltıp ocağınızın altını yakarak üzerine yerleştiriniz.
Şerbeti kaşıkla iyice karıştırıp 1 paket (150 gr.) Kral Kemalpaşa/Peynir tatlısını tencerenize boşaltınız. 10 dk. aralıklarla tatlınızı yavaşça karıştırınız.
Şerbet kaynadıktan sonra ocağınızın altını orta ateşe ayarlayarak 30-40 dk. kaynatıp ocağınızı kapatınız.
10 dk. dinlendirdikten sonra tatlınız hazırdır.
Not: Arzuya göre tatlınızı ikram ederken, dondurma, Antep fıstığı, kaymak veya Hindistan cevizi ile süsleyerek servis yapabilirsiniz.

author: {'steamid': '76561199087752279', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 375, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 375, 'last_played': 1671898104}
review:
[h1]Pony Island: insira a sua alma para jogar[/h1]

Opa, tudo bem? Recentemente joguei Inscryption e facilmente se tornou um de meus jogos favoritos, seja pela sua gameplay que mistura um Roguelike com um jogo de cartas que constantemente muda, ou pela sua história instigante onde você jogador é convidado a desvendar os mistérios escondido nesse pequeno disquete onde está o jogo e seus segredos. Quando ia como o jogo eu comprei o pacote completo onde vinha todos os jogos do mesmo criador, e Pony Island é outro jogo dele, se não me engano o primeiro lançado na Steam, então sem mais nem longas segure minha mão nesse reino de fantasias e vamos juntos através dos volumosos arco-íris adorar ao diabo.

[hr][/hr]

Pony Island é um jogo de Puzzle com pequenos momentos onde você irá controlar um Pônei e junto dele irá passar de vários desafios como pular cercas e derrotar fofas borbole- demônios ferozes em busca de sua alma. O jogo é super simples e curto também, a gameplay consiste em resolver puzzles e passar desses pequenos levels com o pônei, toda a identidade visual puxa para um jogo de fliperama, isso é algo que aparentemente é comum nesse criador de jogos, já que Inscryption também tem uma pegada de jogo antigo, com Pony Island não é diferente, mas mesmo com sua simplicidade que facilmente poderia se tornar repetitivo Pony Island surpreende a todos com várias reviravoltas e puzzles simples mas inteligentes que muitas vezes me surpreenderam pela criatividade e surpresa, tem muitos momentos que o jogo quebra a quarta parede e tenta te sacanear, a própria estrutura do jogo consistente em usar bugs do próprio jogo para conseguir progredir e derrotar todos os demônios nesse fliperama. Jogabilidade super simples, puzzles divertidos e uma duração generosa, Pony Island não decepciona em nenhum momento, talvez apenas no final que poderia dá um gás com uma batalha muito grandiosa, mas isso apenas se você desvendar os segredos do jogo em busca de todos os Tickets, se você deseja um final digno de jogo, seja um guerreiro e busque todos os Tickets desse fliperama, você ganhará a melhor batalha do jogo. Outro ponto que não me decepciona é a trilha sonora, muito boa e competente, o jogo por ser curto não existe tantas trilhas sonoras, mas todas que tem é muito boa, além que desde cedo Daniel Mullins flertava com a ideia de um jogo com uma história oculta.

[hr][/hr]

Eu amo como uma sucessão de eventos influenciam o futuro, é como se Daniel estivesse preparando terreno para Inscryption já que a Lore de Pony Island é muito similar ao que acompanhamos nos ocultos dos dados_antigos de Inscryption. Você jogador anônimo acorda em um fliperama no nada e começa a jogar o único jogo disponível, Pony Island, poucos minutos jogando você percebe que algo mal está muito certo... O jogo está estranho, cheio de bugs e problemas, além de todo o estilo visual fofinho e colorido perdeu para um tenebroso e escuro, depois de continuar jogando e quebrando ainda mais o jogo, você descobre que o jogo está vivo, algo dentro dele começa a falar com você e sacanear com sua cara, você entra em um loop de morte atrás de morte, isso até uma alma sem esperança te resgate e te dá uma missão, destruir o jogo. Nessa aventura você passará por vários desafios diferentes em busca dos três arquivos primordiais que mantém o jogo em ordem e mantém você preso nele, a história do jogo é bem simples mas já dá um flerte do que futuramente viria a ser Inscryption, além de quê várias coisas dentro do jogo são deixados em oculto, muito sobre o seu personagem, se você explorar bem você consegue encontrar um demônio que te dá visões de sua vida para te ajudar a lembrar quem você é, muitas respostas são deixadas apenas na teoria, o jogo te dá apenas a base para entender o que está havendo e mesmo sendo um enredo super simples ele é bem decente, funcional e interessante, futuramente criaria mais profundidade e viraria o que hoje conhecemos como Inscryption.

[hr][/hr]

Pony Island é um ótimo jogo para jogar quando estiver sem nada para fazer, super curto capaz de zerar em apenas um dia, uma história bacana, uma gameplay simples mas interessante, jogo por trás de seu nome fofo tem toda uma história envolvendo satanismo e almas atormentadas, muito divertido e interessante, gostei bastante da experiência, fecho Pony Island com nota: 8.

Bu oyun mükemmel. Bu oyuna dair hiç birşey bilmeden oynamanızı tavsiye ederim. ancak bu şekilde tam zevk alabilirsiniz. Oyunun hikayesine ve mantığına bayıldım. Özellikle de final mütişti. author: {'steamid': '76561198058751556', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 385, 'playtime_forever': 570, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 303, 'last_played': 1703087781}
review:
[h1] Поняшки-блестяшки: Радужное представление [/h1]
[b] ОБЗОР СОДЕРЖИТ СПОЙЛЕРЫ!
ЧИТАЙТЕ НА СВОЙ СТРАХ И РИСК!!! [/b]

[quote=Мужик из окна] Вы кто такие? Я вас не звал! Идите в “Pony Island” поиграйте! [/quote]

Начну с самого важного: игру стоит проходить за один присест, иначе вам будет казаться, что она какая-то рваная или происходящее в ней непоследовательно.
Меня по началу просто вынесли «головоломки».
Да, это обычные задачки для первого класса, но прорешав весьма неплохое их количество, я не выдержал и вышел, ибо очень тупил.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2909642761
Советую садиться с хорошим настроением в игру, иначе мрачные тона сделают с плохим настроением всё только хуже, чем было до этого.
За кого мы играем я не понял.
Вроде четвёртая стена ломается, но и себя я персонажем данной игры не ощущал.
В конце так вообще какой-то дух, не понял до конца что это и кто это, «отваливает» от автомата с игрой, улетает и очухивается перед двумя башнями, а ему подмигивает после этого пролетающая поняшка.
Ну такой себе финал.
Да, потом ещё беседа будет, но это тоже не претендует на оконченную историю или конец чего-либо вообще.

Теперь хотелось бы проговорить случаи, когда игра реально поразила.
Пришёл я в восторг от момента под конец игры, когда тебе начинает «писать» друг из Steam.
Вот тут я как-то перекакался, ибо с человеком, который начал строчить во время игры, я никогда не общался, а мы просто находились друг у друга в списке друзей.
«Пони? Это шутка?» - написал он мне.
Я сначала думал, что он быканул и мне хотелось написать пару ласковых.
Через пару секунд до меня дошло, что окошко сообщения слишком подозрительно выглядит и понял данный трюк.
Однако, мне это понравилось.
Также момент с каким-то «дядькой» на облачке…
Ну дую я и дую на него, а потом вылезает интересная и весьма неожиданная надпись, что я убил Иисуса…
Честно говоря, такое тоже весьма пугает.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2909643220
Выделяется ещё и то, что в игре что-то происходит резко: ты даже не понял, что нужно сделать, делаешь и получаешь леща прямо по лицу.
Скримеры вроде как и есть, но это больше не орущие страшные морды, а что-то выбивающееся из нормы правильного и обыденного…
Не знаю, понял ли меня кто-нибудь хотя бы?
К примеру, обычная белёсая звёздочка в игре, которая резко становится кровавой пентаграммой, а разработчиком - Сатана.
Ну это немного пи34ец, неправда ли?
Однако, если у игры пряников много, то я парочку ударов заряжу по разработчикам.
Меня абсолютно не привлекают моменты, когда игра сама вылетает по своему желанию.
Ну решили, что так надо сделать, ибо это пугает, вероятно, но нет.
Это конкретно выбешивает!
Даже после финальных титров и разговора с дружком игра выходит сама.
Пожалуйста, если кто-то из начинающих разработчиков это читает, умоляю вас: никогда не делайте «оригинальный» вылет игры, прошу!
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2909643493
Хотелось бы узнать ещё такой момент: почему пони с рогом в башке и с крыльями?
Почему не единорог?
Почему не Пегас?
На мой вкус, а у меня вкус прелестный (нет), название «Unicorn Island» подошло бы.

author: {'steamid': '76561198889251704', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1672259359}
review:
Un bon gros jeu de poney avec du rose à la my little pony XD .
En vrai de vrai le jeu nous propose une très bonne expérience un peu comme un There is no game mais à une sauce différente pour ceux qui connaîtrais ce jeu . A l'inverse de celui ci , c'est un jeu ou l'administrateur nous empêche de faire le jeu en nous créant tout plein d'obstacle impossible à passer sans avoir accès à des petits bugs dite par lui du à son jeu non finaliser à la sauce horreur sans faire peur pour en rassurer certain . Mélange de parcours à la géométrie dash ou d'un mario run c'est comme vous préférez + casse tête en mode hackeur intello ( ça donne cette impression avec tout les bugs qui avait ) ça donne se jeu avec certes une duré pas trop longue mais pour un jeu indé pas trop cher franchement ça vaut le coup !!!!!!!! .
Le 100% des tickets est conseillé si vous voulez avoir un bonus et un plus pour le jeu sans que j'en donne plus ^^

author: {'steamid': '76561199013479211', 'num_games_owned': 129, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1672013739}
review:
Pony Island je absolutně úchvatná a jedinečná hra, která mě naprosto uchvátila od začátku do konce. Hned na začátku vás hra vtáhne do svého podivného světa a nepustí vás, dokud neobjevíte všechny jeho tajemství.

Co dělá Pony Island tak zajímavým, je jeho inovativní přístup k hernímu designu. Na první pohled vypadá jako roztomilá arkádová hra s poníky, ale brzy zjistíte, že se jedná o mnohem hlubší a sofistikovanější zážitek. Hra odkrývá nečekané vrstvy složitosti a tvoří velmi chytré hádanky, které si vyžadují kombinaci logiky a kreativity.

Grafika a zvukový design jsou zde velmi efektivní a dokonale zapadají do celkové atmosféry hry. Tmavá a podivná nálada stvořená ve hře posiluje pocit tajemství a napětí. Zvukové efekty a hudba přispívají k vytvoření intenzivního herního zážitku a dodávají hře další vrstvu autentičnosti.

Jedním z nejzajímavějších prvků hry je důraz na příběh. Pony Island má vynikající vyprávění, které postupně odhaluje mnoho nečekaných zvratů a tajemství. Bez cinknutí chci říct, že příběh ve hře je zcela odlišný a hlubší, než byste čekali od pohledně arkádové hry o ponících.

Hratelnost je skvěle navržena tak, aby byla výzvou, ale nikdy nefrustruje. Pokud narazíte na obtížnou pasáž, budete mít pocit, že ji můžete zdolat, a až ji konečně překonáte, budete se cítit jako mistr her. Hra vás povzbuzuje k experimentování a kreativnímu přístupu, což je něco, co ocení jak začátečníci, tak i zkušení hráči.

Jediným menším nedostatkem, který bych mohl zmínit, je relativně krátká délka hry. Nicméně, co chybí v délce, to zcela vynahrazuje originalitou a kvalitou zážitku.

Celkově vzato, Pony Island je skvělá hra, která zaujme jakýkoli typ hráče. Pokud hledáte něco jiného a kreativního, rozhodně si tuto hru nenechte ujít. Je to osvěžující a odvážný titul, který si zaslouží uznání za svou jedinečnost a schopnost zaujmout hráče od začátku do konce.

review: Great game, worth the money. I heard somewhere (a scathing Terraria review no less) that people think one hour of your time should be worth 1 dollar. If that were the case, I shoulda paid 3$, but that's not how games work. If that were the case, then grindy games like ARK:Survival Evolved would cost hundreds, but honestly, I wouldn't pay that much for ARK. Alternatively, this game only costs like 5$, but I would have paid double or even triple that price. I might even pay the devil my soul *wink wonk*.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048086581', 'num_games_owned': 531, 'num_reviews': 456, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1671798880}
review: Picked this up after playing Inscryption and I can definitely spot some of the parallels. Its a good but short puzzle game which breaks the fourth wall a few times, which is fun when not over done. Considering its been a few years since this came out and Inscryption is the deeper more fleshed out product, Id recommend this only on discount.

author: {'steamid': '76561198129570459', 'num_games_owned': 390, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 268, 'last_played': 1671642131}
review: Nice game with a creepy ambiance but some cliche storytelling. Some nice surprises though. Would recommend at a low price because it's only 4 hours long but the lore is rich and there are plenty of secrets to discover.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999494879', 'num_games_owned': 926, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 340, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 205, 'last_played': 1671778583}
review:
I'm not sure how I didn't write a review for Pony Island before, but I had always recommended it to my friends.
"What? Pony Island? Are you sure?"
Nobody ever took me up on my recommendation.
Thanks Daniel!

author: {'steamid': '76561198452848636', 'num_games_owned': 40, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 169, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 135, 'last_played': 1671803919}

author: {'steamid': '76561198018228975', 'num_games_owned': 185, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1671732750}
review:
Годная игра. Не сказал бы, что жанр "головоломка" так уж подходит: особо задумываться не приходилось [spoiler]  но после пары моментов казалось, что у каждого элемента на экране есть "второе дно" [/spoiler] .
Визуал, несмотря на то, что не сильно сложный, выглядит приятно. Также, хорошо подобрана музыка.
Сюжет не перетянут, и не возникает чувства "когда это уже закончится?".

В общем, спасибо разработчику. 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198063529266', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1671407672}
review: Pony Island isn't really all that innovative, and it's not meta in a way that hasn't been done many times before it, except in a few places that break the frame of the game in a genuinely terrifying way. The basic gameplay elements work quite well too. If it looks like the aesthetic is for you, definitely check it out! But overall it's not as brilliant, innovate, groundbreaking, or unexpected as I thought, just a fun little goofy sort of horror game with the same vibes as Undertale or OMORI.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164893126', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1665068930}
review:
Inscryptionが面白かったから引き続きプレイしたが、こっちはメインのゲームがちょっと地味ではある。また、マウスが無くってノートのパットでやったんだけど結構苦痛（プレビューとかで見えているポニーが跳ねるパートね）
それ以外のパートや世界観はバツグンなのでとにかくこの作者のぶっ飛んだ世界が見たいぜ！って人はおすすめ
日本語化は現状してないけど英語でも雰囲気は十分つかめるよ

author: {'steamid': '76561198065891764', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1671597124}
review: This is alright. For five dollars, the length and enjoyment are pretty on par. This feels kind of like if you took the google chrome dinosaur game and gave it the creepypasta ".exe" treatment. I did play through this whole game and I didn't hate it, so if you have five dollars to spare and want to support the creator then I'd say get it and play through it real quick. However, if you want a game that does the same subversion/game inside of a game thing that this one does but with much better actual gameplay, then just get Inscryption.

author: {'steamid': '76561199187767879', 'num_games_owned': 130, 'num_reviews': 121, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1671200832}
review:
[h1] Pony is cute. [/h1]
　他のレビューにもあるように、おそらく内容を話してしまうと
　面白さが減ってしまうタイプのゲーム、とだけ言える。

　なので、一つだけ……ポニーはかわいい。

[h1] 面白い/評価できるポイント [/h1]
[b] ・いい感じに頭を使えて楽しい [/b]
　ゲーム内容がほどよい難易度なので、どうすればいいのかを
　考えて解き進める感じが楽しい。

　また、色々と目ざといプレイヤーにはしっかりとご褒美が
　用意されてるのもプレイを飽きさせない工夫だと思った。

[h1] 総評やまとめ [/h1]
　レビューしにくいタイプのゲームなのであまり語れないが、
　一つだけ言えることは何も情報を仕入れずにプレイすることを
　オススメするタイプのものだということ。
[code][url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/44793959-%25E9%2581%258A%25E3%2582%2593%25E3%2581%25A0%25E3%2582%25B2%25E3%2583%25BC%25E3%2583%25A0%25E3%2582%2592%25E7%25B4%25B9%25E4%25BB%258B%25E3%2581%2599%25E3%2582%258B%25E3%2580%2582/][b][u]遊んだゲームを紹介する。[/u][/b][/url] のキュレーターで紹介しました。[/code]

author: {'steamid': '76561198318408963', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 161, 'playtime_forever': 402, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 402, 'last_played': 1671123830}
review:
No tengo palabras para describir este juego sin entrar en Spoilers, pero os diré que es una maravilla de juego que me ha acojonado de verdad en un par de ocasiones, pero asustada en serio [spoiler](el juego, juega literalmente con nosotros y con nuestro pc, mirando listas de amigos y "rompiendo" archivos con mensajes de error)[/spoiler]
Los gráficos son una pasada, para una amante del retro como servidora, y esos ruiditos de estática y electrónica que dan una atmosfera noventera al relato.
Una experiencia muy grata y divertida para echar unas 5h con el ratón (y ocasionalmente con el teclado)
Es un juego de saltos de un🦄poni, un videojuego roto y olvidado que quieren que lo juguen, pues tiene una historia que contar.

author: {'steamid': '76561199015971124', 'num_games_owned': 1055, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 311, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 311, 'last_played': 1671295106}
review:
The game is way better than I expected. Graphics does not look like much, but it is part of the atmosphere that the game creates. The game is story driven but it also contains a lot of secrets. There is a fair amount of puzzles but most of them are quite simple. I particularly like several innovations that I have not seen anywhere else.

The only thing I didn't like is that you can't skip dialogues.

author: {'steamid': '76561198369791759', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1671064211}
review:
PROS: I like ponies. Especially this one, mostly because it can fly and shoot lasers. The game provides you with lots of exciting options and different level designs. 

CONS: Not so sure about the developer since he wanted my soul in exchange for in-app purchases. I didn't buy anything and destroyed his core files, so at the end of the day it's still a recommendation from me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198167671854', 'num_games_owned': 71, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1636666826}
review: Daniel Mullins is a genius. From this game to Inscryption, he's put out banger after banger without missing. This cryptic game with incredibly funny moments and a deeper plot underlying it is something I'd play for hours if only it had more content. If you're looking for something to burn through days of playing without stopping, maybe look at some of his other projects, but for a quick play with plenty of fun and interesting moments, I couldn't recommend this game more highly. This game turned me into a Daniel Mullins fan.

review: güzel işte ne bekliyosun. normalde çok oyun oynayan bi insan değilseniz oyun size alışıldığın dışında gelebilir. alışıldığın dışında derken kötü olduğu anlamında değil aksine daha iyi olduğu anlamında diyorum. her neyse. bulmacalar filan var zor olsa da ben hiç internetten yardım almadan bitirdim oyunu. bi tek en son kısımda boss türü bişey vardı onu yanlış mı yapıyorum diye internetten baktım fakat kendimce onun oyunun bi hatası olduğu kanaatine vardım çünkü oyun "bu oyunda kullandığın at tarzı hayvan ne?" diyor bana, ben de pony diyorum kabul etmiyor (merak etmeyin bu spoiler değil, böyle spoiler mı olur a*k?) meğersem pony yerine poni yazıcakmışım ama oyunun kendi ismi pony ve oyunun içinde de pony diye geçiyor. oyun türkçeleştirildiği için poni diye yapmış olabilirler ama kimsenin aklına gelmez çünkü gelebilecek tarzda bişey değil imkansız yani. oyunun hatası bence. her neyse işte ya, az önce de uzun bi yazı yazdım sonra kendi kendime "sanki oyun sarrafısın a*k ne abarttın kısa yaz geç" dedim, silip tekrar yazdım ve bu haldeyiz :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198203596849', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 215, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1670431687}
review:
(Данный обзор может содержать спойлеры и ненормативную лексику, если тебе это не по душе, то иди в ж*пу и листай дальше)
 Пони, луг и сатана.
 Что же сказать про игру, которой лет 6 и в которую почти все уже поиграли? Да толком ничего про нее саму, но я расскажу про свои эмоции.
 Чудные односторонние диалоги, которые притягивают игрока, и в этот момент ты вспоминаешь почему ты любишь индюшатину. Простота геймплея, но завернутая в обертку таинственности и неоднозначности. Сама история средненькая, но я не отрывал интереса от происходящего, только в тот момент, когда мне начал писать друг, с которым я год не общался, Асмодеус - су*а. Я ох*енел в тот момент.
 Ну и как можно не полюбить сочетание пони и демонология?
 Оценка: 9.5/10.
 Иииииииииииииииииииииииииииииии помните, если бы вместо Сомбры вплели в историю Люцифера, то на заставке MLP играл бы крутой метал.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010394797', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 315, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 315, 'last_played': 1670296939}
review:
一款玩起來體驗很獨特的遊戲，藉由主要是跑酷與邏輯解題的遊戲過程中，一層層撥開遊戲背後的真相。
在解完第一周目，為了 24 張票券和全成就，開始看攻略輪迴，基本上票券的跟著別人寫的攻略都 OK，但如果是為了「THE FULL TRUTH」在這邊提醒一下，我目前測試成功的結果，是要在不關閉遊戲的情況下，可以跳章節用不同順序走過跟 Baphomet 談話的場景，我最後是在這篇攻略的幫助下達成的：https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1264417025。
不然我原先都一直重複刷 ACT 1 和 ACT 3 到懷疑人生，實際上是在沒有退出整個遊戲的情況下，三次都要走過一遍。

author: {'steamid': '76561198881171625', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 269, 'last_played': 1698025320}
review:
[h2] PONY ISLAND[/h2]
+ Es una experiencia bastante única, simplemente no te comas spoilers y jugalo.
+ El dinosaurio que salta cactus modo historia.
+ El gameplay esta bien pensado y pulido, ademas la estética solo suma puntos
+ Estamos condenados a repetir siempre lo mismo?
+ Completar el juego al 100% es obligatorio, ese final vale la pena.

* No Esta copado porque:
- La duración es bastante inexistente, pero con los secretos que tienes y el precio es un Must-Try, aunque no te llame la atención como se ve, no dejes pasar el jugarlo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198147517704', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 525, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 525, 'last_played': 1669758995}
review:
Pony Island: 8/10

Just completed my first playthrough - loved it. So many points for originality and creativity.

Talking about the game can be difficult because spoilers would drastically damage a new player's experience. 

I will be returning to the game to find the collectables and secrets, because I'm interested about how few I found naturally (maybe 1/3rd) - where are they? Colour me curious.

If you like well done, interesting and original experiences then I would recommend this game to you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042769643', 'num_games_owned': 779, 'num_reviews': 108, 'playtime_forever': 152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1669506084}
review:
A great game with gameplay diversity just like Inscryption (the rules of  the game keep radically shifting in new and engaging ways). 

I couldn't help but compare it to Inscryption since I played it first and the games are similar in a lot of ways, from the 4th wall breaking to the silly-game-turned-living-hell scenario, and I like Inscryption a lot more than this one. I had no idea what to expect from this so the similarity it was jarring, admittedly, but this game still has its merits. 

Great art, soundtrack, and varying gameplay. A couple of the puzzles were really hard and I liked the design. It's a STEAL on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986156553', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1667236022}
review: Creepypasta bastante corto, tiene fases puzzle con pseudo programación (ni mucho menos tan difícil como lo real) y plataformeo  cuya dificultad es hacer 2 cosas mecánicas al mismo tiempo. La historia tiene algún agujero argumental y la rotura de la cuarta pared ya no da tanta sorpresa pero se puede disfrutar por lo corto que es antes de que se vuelva pesado. Recomendado en oferta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198984753638', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 368, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 330, 'last_played': 1703098302}
review: İndirimde alınabilecek en iyi oyunlardan biri. Oyun dışarıdan biraz daha çocukça dursa da oyunu oynayınca bambaşka bir dünyaya gidiyorsunuz. Oyunu tek oturuşta bitirdim derken fark ettim ki her şey daha yeni başlıyor, başarımları yapmak için uğraştığınız zaman normal oyun akışının dışında yeni şeyler keşfediyorsunuz ve sizi oyunun içine sürükleyen bir havayla karşılaşıyorsunuz. Şiddetle tavsiye ederim.

author: {'steamid': '76561198824144984', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1669525068}
review:
iba a ver una peli de terror y me acordé de este juego 3.3hs valió la pena. Cerca de ser el juego más barato que compré xD
Tiene cromos que me dieron mas dinero que el gastado.

Variedad de gameplay. Principalmente puzzle y una suerte de minijuego de acción. Guiños a otros juegos, curiosidades, secretos. 
Tiene una ambientación "creppy" que emula una computadora antigua toda glicheada, en la que vas chateando, hackeando y explorando. 
No da miedo, pero es interesante ver qué se le ocurrió al diseñador, es muy imaginativo.

Muy recomendado, a menos que seas muy flojo de puzzle

review:
感觉不是我在玩游戏，是游戏在玩我。
[spoiler] 收集所有票票是需要一点操作的。第一次集齐24张票可以解锁和 hopeless soul 的隐藏剧情，但是由于本人操作实在太差，过不了隐藏关，到现在还不知道结局是啥（ [/spoiler]
另外这游戏汉化难度貌似有点高呢？这个文本配色放在中文上我大概会瞎……
9/10！

author: {'steamid': '76561198127460729', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 275, 'last_played': 1669254752}
review:
Playing this after playing Inscryption feels like going back and watching a student film that your favorite film director made when he was in college. It's fun to see where they came from, to see murky shadows of the signature style they'd go on to perfect, but it certainly isn't as good as their later work. But yeah, it's good.

Just go play Inscryption.

author: {'steamid': '76561198962238240', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 265, 'playtime_forever': 347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 260, 'last_played': 1668401882}
review:
Pony Island is deceptively deep, even compared to its description, and a joy to experience for it. That said, this is definitely a puzzle game with a 2D platforming mother and shooter father. If those aren't really your thing (like me), some sections may overstay their welcome. Even more so if you attempt to 100% this game.

I'm currently stuck on one ticket in particular that is driving me crazy. Even so, the game is short and fun enough to more than forgive it. Definitely worth the price tag.

author: {'steamid': '76561199230690501', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1668024042}
review:
Pony Island se presenta como un juego de plataformas aparentemente inocente y colorido protagonizado por un adorable pony. Sin embargo, rápidamente se convierte en una experiencia mucho más profunda y surrealista. El jugador se encontrará desafiado a resolver puzles ingeniosos, interactuar con el propio sistema del juego y sumergirse en una narrativa meta que trasciende los límites de la pantalla.

Narrativa y atmósfera:
La narrativa de Pony Island es uno de los aspectos más fascinantes del juego. A medida que el jugador avanza, se descubre una historia oscura y retorcida, llena de giros sorprendentes y momentos desconcertantes. La trama se construye cuidadosamente para mantener al jugador en suspenso y preguntándose qué está sucediendo realmente en el mundo del juego. La cuarta pared se rompe de manera creativa y constante, añadiendo capas adicionales de intriga a medida que la narrativa se adentra en temas existenciales y filosóficos.

El juego logra una atmósfera inquietante y opresiva, gracias a su estilo visual y sonoro. El diseño gráfico combina elementos retro con efectos visuales sorprendentes que juegan con la percepción del jugador, mientras que la música acompaña perfectamente la atmósfera, alternando entre melodías encantadoras y tonos oscuros y perturbadores.

Jugabilidad y diseño de niveles:
La jugabilidad de Pony Island está compuesta por una serie de ingeniosos rompecabezas y desafíos de plataformas que deben superarse para avanzar en la historia. La mecánica del juego se mezcla con la narrativa, creando una experiencia inmersiva y única que desafía constantemente al jugador a pensar de manera creativa y fuera de lo convencional. Cada nivel presenta nuevos obstáculos y sorpresas, manteniendo la frescura y la emoción en cada etapa.

Originalidad y metaficción:
Pony Island es un ejemplo sobresaliente de metaficción en los videojuegos. A través de su narrativa y mecánicas de juego, el juego desafía la noción tradicional de lo que es un videojuego y cuestiona la realidad misma. La originalidad radica en cómo se mezclan los diferentes géneros y elementos, así como en la forma en que el juego involucra activamente al jugador en la experiencia y la historia.

Conclusión:
Pony Island es un título imprescindible para aquellos que buscan una experiencia de juego fuera de lo común. Con una narrativa intrigante, una atmósfera inquietante y una jugabilidad innovadora, el juego lleva al jugador a un viaje surrealista y filosófico que desafía las expectativas. Su originalidad, ingenio y capacidad para sumergir al jugador en un mundo desconcertante lo convierten en un videojuego que deja una impresión duradera y que será recordado como una obra maestra de la metaficción en el mundo de los videojuegos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198424902866', 'num_games_owned': 81, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1668007764}
review:
レビューに背中を押されて購入してみたのですが、ゲームの内容はストーリーに重点を置いているためゲーム要素は皆無、
英語が出来ないと虚無ゲーです。中学生レベルの英語と聞いたんですが、普通に英語としての会話の難易度は高く、
少し文章を逃しただけで詰むようなポイントもあります。
というか最後まで何も自分が何と戦っているのかさえもわかりませんでした。レビューを見る限りストーリーを理解できれば
面白いようですが、英語が出来ない人は絶対に買ってはいけません。将来日本語が追加されることを願って高評価にしておきます

author: {'steamid': '76561198190380543', 'num_games_owned': 613, 'num_reviews': 603, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1668002933}
review:
Pony Island is a weird but brilliant game where you try to escape an arcade machine. Gameplay mostly consists of exploration, 2D running sections and puzzles. It has more tricks, but I can’t spoil more than this. It reminded me of Undertale on how it usually breaks the 4th wall.
It is a great little indie title full of surprises. It also has hidden stuff to find for collectables and extra achievements, although you’ll need a guide for 100% completion. But there’s a chapter selection after beating the game to speed that up.
It’s an easy recommendation, even at full price, despite not being too long. It has a very clever design, so props to the devs for this gem.

author: {'steamid': '76561199023920117', 'num_games_owned': 174, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 662, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 662, 'last_played': 1667775506}
review:
i absolutely loved this game! 
psychedelic story about... ponies. it's a dark way to tell a childish story; especially that not everything is white and black. the game is quite short, but it's definetely worth it. 

the plot is much more complicated than it seems - and everything becomes much more disturbing when you know more. so many easter eggs, so many theories - but i had fun while reading those threads on steam/reddit. it scratched my soul. 

10/10, also 'grinding' achievments isn't actually grinding. it's pretty enjoyable and you don't need complete the game 4 times in the row

author: {'steamid': '76561197963781080', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1667360962}
review:
This game seems to be an elaborate joke.

The joke is that the gameplay is incredibly tedious.

The main parts of the actual gameplay are a very basic programming-style puzzle where you drag arrows around to redirect a pointer, but mostly you can brute-force it, plus a terrible auto-running thing where you have to jump gates and shoot enemies. I would say it would be at home on a Game & Watch but that would be an insult to Game & Watch.

The quirky story and meta-narratives are not enough to make this anything other than a very tedious experience. The run & jump sections aren't actually challenging, they're very easy, but you will probably misjudge a jump at some point and get sent back to the start, at which point you'll think "Whelp, now I have to do this crap again".

Just don't bother, the payoff isn't at all worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198805239187', 'num_games_owned': 94, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 843, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 843, 'last_played': 1667332144}
review:
Absolutely loved this game!
The details, getting the tickets, the hidden messages and the long thread on the forum where you can uncover the whole mysteries of Pony Island. All of it brings a great closure to the adventure, including hidden bosses, and I would have loved to have even more little things. Some parts of the game are hard (like Jesus' one).
It's a short game, around 3 hours for the main story. Even for completing the game 100% and getting all 24 tickets, it may take 5 hours max depending on how good you are at the game.
After finishing it 100% I don't feel like playing it again but it's a great game to get! It's also cheap!

author: {'steamid': '76561198000313700', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 813, 'playtime_forever': 618, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 503, 'last_played': 1667200083}
review:
"Boah, wieder so ein Kinderspiel mit Kindergrafik... wähhh! 
Ekelhaft, mit was sich die Programmierer heutzutage so auf den Spielemarkt trauen, lächerlich... LÄCHERLICH, sag ich!
Na gut, wollen wir mal nicht so sein, na los, kleines Einhorn: Hüpf, hüpf!
Na nun hüpf schon höher, Du Mistviech, oh Mann! Wie kann man nur so dämlich...?
Äähhmmm, was war das denn eben?
War das ein Glitch? Ein Bug, oder hat da der Programmierer geschlampt? Typisch Early Access Scam würd ich wetten, mal wieder so nen halb fertigen Rotz hingeknallt, um schnell abzukassieren, tztztz...
Was steht da?
"Gebe jetzt DEINE SEELE ein, zum weiterspielen!"
What the...?
Hihihi, son Quatsch, Spiele können gar nicht sprechen, die sind bloß Bites und Bytes und mehr nicht und wo kommen wir denn da hin?
Meine Seele?
Nönönö, die behalt ich mal schön.
Ich hab nur eine davon und was, wenn ich die nicht wieder krieg?
Hmmm...
... aber wenn ich vielleicht nur ganz kurz...
... ist ja nicht uninteressant...
... für so nen hohen Preis muss es ja was richtig genial Tolles geben, oder?"

ZACK!

Hah! Da hats Dich erwischt, lieber Leser. Wie immer wurde Deine Neugier Dir zum Verhängnis, nun ist die Seele weg und jetzt?
Ich meine: Wir wussten beide, dass Du nach den ganzen brutalen Killerspielen als seelenloser Klotz enden wirst, aber das hier ist ja fast bisschen peinlich, oder?
Guck doch mal hin!
Son Gümmel-Game mit nem Pixeleinhorn!
Und dafür hast Du ne ganze Seele rausgehauen? Also ich hätt ja wenigstens ne halbe behalten, oder so.

Aber durch Deinen unbedachten Seelentransfer hast Du mir ne tolle Überleitung ermöglicht, echt lieb von Dir.

Dieses Spiel hat nämlich wirklich Seele und zwar viel davon.
Nicht nur Deine, sondern auch ne eigene und die siehst Du vielleicht beim ersten Start noch nicht und auch beim fünften immer noch kein Stück...
Aber weil Dir immerzu alle vorbeten, wie toll das Game doch ist, kämpfst Du Dich am Ende dann doch mal so richtig rein und dann...
...
... ja dann biste platt!
Das hier ist große Kunst und eines der allerbesten Spiele aller Zeiten!

Jaha! Ich hab Augen im Kopf und jaha: Guck Du auch nochmal ganz genau hin!
Und trotzdem bleib ich dabei. Das hier ist der Hammer und zwar auf so so soooo vielen Ebenen und noch mehr Metaebenen, das kriegt man nichtmal ansatzweise in nem Review unter.

Außerdem würd ich Dir dann das halbe Game spoilern und ich werd mich hüten, Dir hier den Spaß des Entdeckens und mit offenem Mund vorm Bildschirm Erstarrens zu rauben.
Das darfst Du alles schön selbst erleben, nur ne ganz kleine Einführung kriegst Du hier und dann sing ich noch paar Jubelarien und Lobeshymnen und fertig ists dann auch.

Also los gehts:
Storyausgangspunkt bist Du, nämlich ein Spieler mit eigener, intakter Seele und allem drum und dran, vor nem vorsintflutlichen Arcarde-Automaten. Ein Spieleticket wird gelöst und dann lässt Du ein kleines Pixeleinhorn über lustige Barrieren hüpfen.
Ende.
Toll, oder?

Aber dann gehts los!
Mit dem Spiel stimmt was nicht, das merkst Du flott.
Überall gibts kleine Fehler im Programm und es glitched und bugged an jeder Ecke und an jedem Ende.
Und dann merkst Du: Der Teufel spielt mit Dir und zwar um Deine unsterbliche Seele... oh oh...

Ziemliche Misere, in der Du da steckst, aber Du bist nicht allein, im Automaten aus der Hölle sind noch andere Seelen gefangen, aber wer die sind, ob sie Dir Gutes oder Böses wollen, wer Du eigentlich bist und ob Du lebst oder tot bist, was Du tun kannst und was unmöglich wird, was das Böse eigentlich will und ob und wie Du all den Horror stoppen kannst - all das kriegst Du hoffentlich im Spielverlauf selbst heraus.

Dabei spielt sich das meiste auf mehreren Ebenen ab, Du kannst hinter die Programme gucken, nach Lust und Laune hacken und betrügen, in den Innereien des Automaten rumwurschteln und zum Teil recht knifflige Logik-Rätsel lösen. 

Und vor allem: Da darfst und MUSST abseits der ausgetretenen Pfade denken, sonst kommst Du hier kein Stück voran. Das geht schon im Menü los und zieht sich durch jeden Abschnitt des Spiels um Deine Seele durch.
Und ich weiß, dass es anfangs schwer fällt, mit dieser Optik, mit diesem lahmen Sound und mit diesem total ungewohnten Gameplay, sich da irgendwie reinzudenken.
Aber bist Du erstmal eingestiegen in die verquere Logik, packt Dich das hier auf so vielen Ebenen, mit so viele Facetten und mit so einer Wucht - da kommst Du nicht mehr von los.
Zum Glück ists nicht allzu lang und selbst das Ende ist ein krasser Twist in sich, aber stell Dich auf eine wahrhaft außergewöhnliche Spielerfahrung und ne emotionale Achterbahnfahrt im Reinkultur ein.

Du wirst Dich unterwegs sehr oft einfach nur wundern, Du wirst aber auch staunen, fluchen, schockiert da hocken, ungläubig starren und Dir den Kopf zerbrechen. Du wirst lachen, manchmal auch aus schockierter Überraschung heraus und Du wirst grübeln, rätseln und knobeln.

Und Du wirst mehr als einmal verzweifeln und all das macht das Spiel mit Dir und zwar mit voller Absicht. 
Nach ner Weile merkst Du, wie gekonnt und zugleich perfide der Dev dieses Spiel die Klaviatur Deiner emotionalen Tonleiter rauf und runter klimpert, wie sehr er mit Dir spielt und Dich lenkt und das fühlt sich gelinde gesagt.. seltsam an. 

Aber ich kann und will Dir auch nicht mehr verraten, denn im Reiz des Entdeckens liegt hier eigentlich schon beinahe die komplette Spielerfahrung und die musst Du natürlich schön selber machen. 
Und ich bin mir bewusst, dass dies hier nichts für jedermann ist. 
Das ist sehr weit weg vom Gewohnten, manchmal zu verkopft und manchmal auch zu unnahbar.
Aber für nen Euro im Sale kannst Du das Risiko ruhig eingehen.
Denn wenn der Funke springt, dann entfacht der nen lodernden Flächenbrand in Deiner Gamerseele, die Du hoffentlich am Ende des Spiel wieder in Deinem höchsteigenen Besitz hast...

Also wage den Schritt ruhig mal, es kost´ ja nur Deine Seele und beim Dich verzaubern lassen, dem Abtauchen in ein fremde, andersartige Welt und mal wieder richtig Staunen wünsch ich Dir wie immer...

... viel Spaß  ;-)


Und weil das Spiel ja so dermaßen Meta ist und wir ja hier eh immer die vierte Wand durchbrechen und miteinander quasseln, statt nur Reviews zu lesen und zu schreiben, wend ich mich auch mal direkt an Dich, cool oder?
Es ist grad Halloween, also guck in die Kuratoren Gruppe und schau Dir die Horror Games Liste für den Sale an, schreib Deine eigenen dazu und diskutier mit.

Und: es ist auch Review Nummer 400 und ich möcht auch mal Danke fürs viele Lesen sagen und zudem ein Experiment wagen: Klick doch mal bitte das Däumchen hier an, ich frag sonst nie danach, aber nun bin ich mal neugierig, wie viele Leute das bis hierhin lesen. 
Wär also lieb, wenn mal drückst, dann hat die liebe Schreiber-Seele Ruh (haha... und wieder Seele, passt ja.) und ich frag auch erst in paar hundert Reviews wieder, versprochen :-)






Und hey, wenn´s Dir gefallen hat, ne Runde von mir zu lesen, dann klick hier
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/41622336/
und da gibts mehr von mir auf meiner Kuratoren-Seite. Schmökern for free: Also stell Dir nen Tee bereit und viel Spaß beim Lesen...

author: {'steamid': '76561197998434107', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 125, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 125, 'last_played': 1469171586}
review:
신선한 말게임.

스토리가 신선했던 게임. 지금은 이런 방식으로 흘러가는 게임이 많지만, 첫 출시때만해도 이런 방식으로 진행되는 게임이 사실상 없었다보니 참으로 신선한 게임이었다.

정말 짧다. 짧은 게임이다. 근데 거의 공짜 수준으로 싸다. 매우매우 싸다. 퇴근하고 시원한 맥주와 함께 몇시간 정도만 시간을 죽이고 싶다면 한번 해보자. 처음 했을때는 나름 신선한 충격이 와닿은 게임이었다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198799702320', 'num_games_owned': 106, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 295, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 295, 'last_played': 1666923721}
review: This game was really fun to play, didn't take too long and some of the secrets are really fun to find. And some of the combat that is needed to get some of the achievements are an annoyingly good challenge while not being ridiculous. I love the little story that goes along with it and the characters that tell it. While most of it is great some of the pony island part can get repetitive especially if trying to get all the items in it and some of the story feels just added in with no real sort of meaning. But over all a great game.
