author: {'steamid': '76561197979952202', 'num_games_owned': 965, 'num_reviews': 227, 'playtime_forever': 222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 222, 'last_played': 1634432340}
review:
С виду Pony Island - это простенький платформер, в котором пони прыгает через заборы. Но игра разрушает ваши ожидания. Демоны заточили в игре бедные души и заставляют вас тоже в неё играть, делая процесс затянутым или вовсе непроходимым. Они ломают меню, насылают на беззащитного пони врагов и всячески мешают. Но вы раз за разом "хакаете" игру, решая головоломки: чините настройки, добавляете себе лазеры для защиты, ускоряете загрузку и так далее. Каждый раз происходит что-то необычное: игра может стать красочной или даже перейти в 3D. В какой-то момент она даже переходит в режим приключений, заставляя вас путешествовать по карте.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2629813706
И вот из подобного креатива состоит вся игра. Я обратил на неё внимание потому, что на неё была огромная скидка и она стоила 25 рублей. При этом отзывы были очень положительные. Игра проходится за 3 часа или чуть больше, если вы будете искать секретные билеты, чтобы открыть истинную концовку. За 25 рублей я неплохо провёл время и остался более чем доволен этой игрой. Так что смело могу посоветовать.

author: {'steamid': '76561198178638154', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1634291214}
review:
Mal. Es un juego que atrae por lo raro y ya, pero no me parece la gran cosa, además tiene varios fallos que me hicieron desquiciarme.
Primero, un error con el brillo, no ví por donde seguir ya que donde tenía que pulsar estaba puesto en una zona oscura y el brillo que tenía puesto no era suficiente para verlo, claramente no puedes encontrar eso por internet y con la ayuda de una par de videos di con ello (porque veía que movian el cursor en esa dirección, pero vamos, que me costo lo indecible).
Y el segundo fallo y por lo que lo he dejado y ahora escribo esta reseña es porque se me grabó en medio de una terminal en que se suponía que tenía que escribir una pregunta o yoqueseque y ya no podía verlas... ¿otro walkthrough?, llegados a este punto para eso me veo el video y ya.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061737345', 'num_games_owned': 788, 'num_reviews': 160, 'playtime_forever': 320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 320, 'last_played': 1465771484}
review:
[h1]TRICKED[/h1]
JAPED, BAMBOOZLED, DECEIVED.

I got got. The game pulled the wool over my eyes. It played me like a fiddle. I thought I was impervious to falling into someone else's fraudulent scheme. Alas, I am the dum-dum, I am the fool. I may have '[i]beaten[/i]' the game, but the game won. No other game has made me feel like such an idiot, and this one has forever earned my respect for doing so.

I'm not gonna say much about this game, just give it a play, it's worth it.

8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198176848418', 'num_games_owned': 634, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145, 'last_played': 1633800589}
review:
我愿称之为神作。
同为meta game，黑白像素的表现效果丝毫不逊于there is no game那种色彩鲜明的风格。没有配音，但优质的音效和音乐完全构成了一种更加独特的风格。

随着游戏进度，心路历程大致如下：
哦~横板跳跃是吧~
咦~还有点益智解谜要素诶
票票收集品 估计是收集不全了哎
哈哈熟悉的meta味儿~
卧槽[spoiler] 大激光大翅膀 [/spoiler]
这横板…怎么略微有点难起来了
这解谜…我脑子呢？？
（对不幸被抽奖抽中的好兄弟）你听我解释qwq这都是一个游戏的阴谋！！
（最后跑路时）泪目了 真的泪目了顶不住了
（最后的最后）盯着回到的steam界面，感到十分空虚，不得不掏出OST听了一会平复心情

如果说一句话推荐，我觉得最大的亮点在于它某个地方破壁得比其他同类游戏更加彻底真实，以至于不得不让人感慨设计者的狡诈和脑洞大开（真就敢这么做啊_(:3

解谜和横板跳跃并不难，全程仅通关是不需要看攻略的，并且自动存档点都非常合理。
虽然没有汉化，但英文十分简单。（全大写的英文可能会带来一点点阅读习惯上的障碍，但影响不是特别大）
打折4.2买入真的香疯了，真的香疯了

author: {'steamid': '76561198842528154', 'num_games_owned': 37, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1633622458}

author: {'steamid': '76561198151689142', 'num_games_owned': 199, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 175, 'last_played': 1633594516}
review:
PVを見た？
説明文は読んだ？
興味が出てきた？


じゃあネタバレは避けて急いでプレイしましょう。
途中英語が分からないと何度もやり直す事になるのと「あれ積んだかな？」ってなることはありますが、直前からやり直しなので割となんとかなります。
あとホラーゲームじゃないのでそういうのがダメな人も怖がらずにポニーたちと世界を駆け抜けよう！

author: {'steamid': '76561198972735547', 'num_games_owned': 318, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 317, 'last_played': 1633154873}
review:
有意思的meta游戏。
分析一下为什么好玩：
[spoiler]玩法上主要包含横板卷轴跑酷，类似代码逻辑的解谜游戏，独立的meta相关解谜。
单独拿出来都是还算不错的小游戏，但是耐玩程度有限。
不过游戏里把三者穿插起来，减少了单个玩法带来的重复感和疲劳感，也比单纯的文字meta游戏更有挑战。恰到好处的节奏，配合时不时发现隐藏内容带来的成就感，能够吸引人一直玩下去。
[/spoiler]
不太满意的地方（含剧透）：
[spoiler] 关于过去的提问，据说每次是随机选三个问题。一周目通完之后，我确实想到了要再找demon提问，但是他给出了和一周目完全一样的三个问题，导致我开始怀疑是不是我缺少什么内容或者操作，结果实际上就是要多刷几次。而且刷的过程不算很长但实在没什么意思，为什么不设置一些规律，比如每找demon一次会添加新问题之类的？。
相比之下，ticket的设置就比较合理，虽然有的确实难找，但基本都有某种程度上的提示和引导。
当然全成就不属于游戏正常通关流程，我相信大部分做全成就的人也都会看攻略（包括我自己），所以还算在可接受范围内。
[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198029511756', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 502, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 502, 'last_played': 1633065952}
review:
A game that completely enrages me, and then has me immediately attempt the same level I just almost passed before a surprise! :D 

Seriously, though this is a simple and fun game. The best way to describe this doozy is: Side-scroller meets puzzle game meets creepy game.

This is a very short game, which is good because it does feel like it over-stays its welcome. The levels and puzzles are the same things over and over again - but not in an agonizingly long, stupid story. 

It's quick - the characters are just interesting enough to say hello and goodbye, and the gameplay environment is okay for atmosphere... very FNAF feel to the 'setting'. 

If you like quick games with a short premise. easy to medium puzzles, and a classic side-scroller, look no further! It's 5 bucks, which isn't bad -- but if you can get it on sale, do so! 

Replay value is.. meh.. as you really want to wait until you do another run to find hidden tickets because it can get so monotonous. 

You really know what you're going to get after the first few levels. After ACT I it feels more the same, just with more annoying attributes (Don't hit X, while jumping over posts, while trying to fly and shoot - but remembering not to hit the X, otherwise you start over again).

I am not proud to say I rage-quit this game the other night because I couldn't get it together. 

7/10, have been playing again to find secrets!

author: {'steamid': '76561198080433148', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1633011997}
review:
[h1] Phenomenal Game that is more than meets the eye [/h1]
Pony Island is a morally grey game from the get-go, informing the game of the choices they're making as soon as one of the first choices they make in game. I finished this game in one sitting, it was that must of the game equivalent of a [i] page turner [i]. [spoiler] The creator mixes grimdark horror with pony aesthetics with exisitentialism [spoiler], making this one of my favourite games in my steam library, still going to work on getting all the possible achievements, cannot wait for the next game!

Definitely recommend this game if you enjoyed games or media like
[list]
    [*] [spoiler] doki doki literature club [/spoiler]
    [*]  silence of the blanks
    [*]  Cabin in the woods
[/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561198087433396', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1632768892}
review:
[h1] AVIS GLOBAL[/h1] 
	☐ Vivement recommandé
	[b]X[/b] Globalement bon
	☐ Du bon et du mauvais
	☐ Pas recommandé

[b][u]AVIS DETAILLE[/u][/b]:
Petit jeu assez sympa et perturbant dans lequel on se retrouve coincé dans un jeu (de poney mais ça aurait pu être n'importe quoi au final). Le jeu exploite des mécanismes classiques de jeux vidéos ou même de Steam pour piéger le joueur. Et ça marche plutôt bien ! Au final le jeu est assez court mais plutôt rigolo. Rien de complètement fou mais pour le prix demandé il vaut le coup.

[hr][/hr]
[h1] RAPPORT CONTENU/PRIX[/h1] 
	☐ Généreux
	[b]X[/b] Equilibré
	☐ Prix élevé

[b][u]TEMPS DE JEU[/u][/b]: ~ 3H

[hr][/hr]
[h1] GAME ARTS[/h1] 

- [b][u]SCENARIO[/u][/b]: On joue un joueur coincé dans le jeu, ce qui est plutôt original, même si le lore autour du jeu est assez peu exploité

- [b][u]GRAPHISMES[/u][/b]: Pixel art un peu fouilli mais on s'y habitue

- [b][u]BANDE SON[/u][/b]: Musique des niveaux pas mal. Par contre les sons sont plutôt énervants, dommage qu'on puisse pas les baisser indépendamment de la musique

- [b][u]CONCEPT[/u][/b]: Concept original et très bien exploité. Plus on avance dans le jeu et plus on est surpris de ce qu'il propose !

[h1] GAME DESIGN[/h1] 

- [b][u]GAMEPLAY[/u][/b]: Quasiment tout le jeu se fait à la souris. Rien de fou dans le gameplay proposé.

- [b][u]DIFFICULTE[/u][/b]: Une difficulté croissante et bien dosée

- [b][u]REJOUABILITE[/u][/b]: Quelques succès vous demanderont de forcément relancer des parties (ou repartir d'un chapitre choisi)

- [b][u]BUGS[/u][/b]: Aucun bug rencontré, excepté ceux prévus par le jeu ^^

author: {'steamid': '76561198055870063', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 317, 'last_played': 1632681626}
review: Отличная маленькая игра. Игра в игре. Играем за попавшего в компьютерную игру и застрявшего в ней человека - всё в духе "Ещё один пропавший телефон" и подобных игр. Механически это point-n-click квест и две мини-игры: платформер-раннер и пазл на тему хакинга. Чёрный юмор и нестрашный хоррор в комплекте.

author: {'steamid': '76561198853346679', 'num_games_owned': 121, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1632755183}
review: It's a game about Pony jumping, or IS IT? This game is all about subverting expectations and taking the player on a wild ride, and it succeeds in what it sets out to do. This is a formula Daniel Mullins started with this title, and perfected in The Hex. The core game (showjumping and solving puzzles) is basic, I admit, but that's not really what it's about. Do yourself a favour and give this a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986997483', 'num_games_owned': 846, 'num_reviews': 314, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1632614078}
review:
I guess I feel like this game is a bit derivative of Frog Fractions, which was more surprising to me because I just clicked on it randomly on Kongregate, which I think is how you have to find something like this.  When reviewers act like they do with this game ("Just play it!  I can't tell you why!!!")  That's as good as telling you why.  But it's not like what it is is hidden anyway, even on the store page.  

Surprises aside, it is mostly two games, one is an endless runner where you click the left button to jump and the right button to shoot.  The other is a game that tries to appear like a coding game, but isn't.  a cursor progresses to the bottom of the screen and you put instructions in its path to move left or right or warp.  Well, I don't really care for the endless runner game, and the other is too simple to really be a logic puzzle game, and its method to get harder is just to make you move the instructions faster.  Of more interest is exploring the devil's computer in between the levels, and I think a lot more could have been done with this.  Personally, I didn't find much of interest here.  and shouldn't there be?  Two games that I thought were more interesting that involved involved exploring a strange operating system interspersed with puzzles include Sorry, James, and Macdows 95, which I would recommend over this.  But I would be interested in this designers other games, especially Inscryption looks promising to me.  I heartily enjoyed the demo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198798467431', 'num_games_owned': 658, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 220, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1634058955}
review:
2 liraya oynadığım en iyi ve beni en etkileyen oyun oldu. Hazır indirimdeyken almanızı tavsiye ederim cidden şaşıracaksınız bu kadarını beklemiyordum. Bulmacaları zaman zaman sinir edebiliyor ve oyunu çözmek zaman alıyor. Ama oyunun mantığını iyi kavrarsanız ve algoritmanız da iyi ise bulmacaları çözebiliyorsunuz. Oyunu tam 3 saatte bitirdim ama bu sayı kişiden kişiye göre değişebilir. 

Oyun ilerledikçe ürkütüyor. Bir bölümünde arkadaş listemden fake mesajlar bile yağmaya başladı oyunun içinde. Daha bir sürü olay var bunları kendiniz oynayıp tecrübe edebilirsiniz. 

Türkçe dil desteği mevcut.

İndirimli Fiyat : 2.00₺

author: {'steamid': '76561199019859117', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1632594300}
review: OMG, what an amazing game. Seriously, if you like puzzles and games like Buddy Simulator, this is a must. I bought it for $0.99 when it was on sale, but it is worth the full price. This is seriously a brilliantly done game, especially near the end, don't want to give anything away, but the developer blew my mind and focus ;). My only complaint about this game is that the text utilizes a lot of a red/blue/white effect like if you were to have 3D glasses. This made it feel authentic to earlier games like it is trying to emulate, but it put a lot of strain on my eyes and made the text hard to read. Everything else is damn near perfect. Great game, finished it in under 3 hours but it was a great ride.

author: {'steamid': '76561198236331688', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 138, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1632231388}
review: Pony Island é um jogo meta, divertido, com uma historia interessante e instigante, mas acho que ele deixa um tanto a desejar. Não me entenda mal, é um bom jogo, porem parece que tudo que ele faz é um tanto sem graça ou só ok, ele não possui nenhum momento de choque ou alguma reviravolta, nada, tá tudo na cara desde o começo. Talvez nem seja a intenção do jogo, mas penso que deveria ter algo que pelo menos impactasse. O jogo se diz possuído por um demônio, mas em nenhum momento eu me senti com medo ou ameaçado, o jogo não consegue construir nenhum momento de tensão, e o vilão não faz nada demais, sendo no maxímo um capetinha travesso. Além de não ter nada que o faça se diferenciar no gênero, ficando muito abaixo, e fazendo de forma inferior, o que jogos como Undertale e Doki Doki fazem. Só há um momento que é verdadeiramente criativo e inesperado, por que de resto não há nada muito marcante. Outro problema é que ele é muito fácil, se ao menos ele fosse desafiador, com puzzles talvez mais complexo e com algumas mecânicas diferenciadas, provavelmente o jogo teria mais personalidade. Eu critiquei muito o jogo, mas mesmo assim eu gostei, os personagens e os diálogos são bons, e a historia te interessado. Sei que parece contraditório com que eu falei, mas a verdade é que tem sim ideias legais, mas que são executadas de forma basíca. A trilha sonora e os sons creio que são a melhor parte do jogo, deixando tudo mais dinâmico, sendo por isso que eu quis continuar jogando, já que o ritmo é muito bom. No final é um Pony Island é um jogo divertido, e pela sua curta duração, faz dele um bom passatempo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198877898948', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1632100696}
review:
Process: Installed the game. Entered. Got hacked. Chatted with the good guy, also with the bad guy. Got through some cool puzzles and levels. Typed like half hour in a written based game. Got a bit of panic with some cool stuff. Killed the bad guy. Uninstalled the game. Saved the good guy.
Output: It beeped, but nothing happened. Or maybe I was WRONG.

author: {'steamid': '76561198177412961', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 628, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 296, 'last_played': 1632137854}
review:
Прекрасная!! С первого клика, в прямом смысле этого слова. Ой ей ей прям. 
Хочется скринить каждый кадр игры. Вау вау вауууу! И даже сложная местами. Ямииии. Но они точно родственники с Buddy 1984 (трудно поверить, что это не так... или так?). Столько мыслей, так интересно их связывать между собой и анализировать все произошедшее и в пони, и в бадди. Без спойлеров не скажешь. Кто такое любит - тот любит. Игра доставлена прямо в сердечко, благодарю <3
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2606582819

author: {'steamid': '76561198067872944', 'num_games_owned': 294, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1630459039}
review:
To me this game is all about the presentation. The idea of being inside a game made by Satan. This game has some charm due to the references of being inside a piece of software like icons, chat messengers, passwords, and programming code. I was looking forward to playing more to see what would happen next in the story the game presented.

Unfortunately the gameplay is just...okay. Since the game is short, it’s not too bad but by the end the gameplay got repetitive. The puzzle segments were fine, but were generally a little too easy. The endless runner sections were more difficult, but got repetitive.

Overall I still recommend the game, but just not a hard recommendation. There were some interesting and clever moments, but they weren’t really enough to make the game that enjoyable.

review:
很久以前玩的游戏了，不过今天看到这个名字，还是忍不住点进来写几个字。
这个游戏背景大概是十字军东征之后主角和战友都死掉了，灵魂被恶魔囚禁。
之后就是一些救赎之类的故事，里面的解密不算太难吧，就是需要足够细心，搜集花了我比较长的时间。
英语不难，常玩游戏的人应该很容易能看懂。

author: {'steamid': '76561198235282396', 'num_games_owned': 42, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1628888520}
review:
Сразу могу сказать, что для себя минусов не обнаружил. Игра крута во всем: идея, оформление, сюжет, секретики, да и не слишком большая, на часик если без секретов. Еще очень сильно хвалю музыку, она просто идеально вписывается в игру, особенно в финале. Так же понравиться тем, кто любит ломание 4-ой стены)
Кароч, игра крутая, всем советую просто в нее глянуть, а там 90% она вас затянет.

author: {'steamid': '76561198264204235', 'num_games_owned': 275, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 307, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 307, 'last_played': 1627924807}
review:
[h1]♞ Pony Island ♞[/h1]

Es wirkt so unscheinbar, hat aber wahnsinnig viel Tiefe.

PI ist super abwechslungsreich, manchmal sehr knifflig, niedlich, großartig umgesetzt mit einer tollen Atmosphäre (obwohl ich den Horror Tag nicht ganz verstehe), teilweise sehr komplex, spannend, oft frustrierend und wenn du die Errungenschaften meistern willst auch gerne bereit in dir Hass zu schüren. Nächstes Mal bist du dran Jesus >-> 

Ohne Witz Jesus war mein Endboss. Der Hass ist stark in mir nach fast einer Stunde Probieren bis es geklappt hat. Asmodeus gefiel mir am Besten. Es war schön knifflig und auch lustig. Ich meine das Spiel hat mich so verarscht! Nicht so cool wenn ausgerechnet dein Vater als Freund ausgewählt wird haha xD

Das "Wahre Ende" fand ich ehrlich gesagt spieltechnisch leider sehr langweilig. Gerade der letzte Teil. Kein Verlust wenn man es verpasst hat, meiner Meinung nach.

Da ich die Story schon vom Gronkh LP kannte, hab ich das Spiel mit einem Guide auf 100% gebracht. Kann ich sehr empfehlen, da ich von selbst definitiv nicht alle Tickets und Errungenschaften gefunden hätte.

Kann ich das Spiel nun also empfehlen? JA! Es ist definitiv eine Erfahrung wert.

review:
[url=https://youtu.be/ntvc8sDePk4][quote]first impression: cute pony game
reality: [i][b]DEUS VULT AGAINST SATAN[/b][/i][/quote][/url] Неплохо (особенно для любителей мета игр). Несколько интересных идеек как минимум. Да, линейно, да, не все идеально (например, нельзя перетаскивать ярлыки - уже какая-то печалька), но все равно норм.

Дополнительно накидываю к положительной оценке весь бэкграунд разработчика - [url=https://dmullinsgames.itch.io]несколько геймджемовских игр[/url]. Из всего хочется отдельно порекомендовать [b]OneRoom[/b] и [b]Keep It Alive[/b] (кому не хватило техподдержки поезда в [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/435530/The_Final_Station/]The Final Station[/url], и не менее eerie атмосферы), а также [b]Sacrifices Must Be Made[/b] - демку [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1092790/Inscryption]третьей игры[/url] разраба (вторая - [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/510420/The_Hex]The Hex[/url]). https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=726424342

author: {'steamid': '76561197965213592', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 137, 'playtime_forever': 288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 288, 'last_played': 1627147759}
review:
An interesting take on the 'haunted video game' genre, and well worth playing. It will mess with your mind, which is not an easy thing to accomplish. My mind is a nightmarish hell that would traumatise a lesser man.

Pony Island is a sinister puzzle game at its core, where your aim is to break the game in order to escape it. It's quite difficult to put into words without spoiling anything, so I would simply recommend playing it if you enjoy challenging puzzles, meta-gaming, and weird/creepy stories.

review: there is a difference between compelling hopelessness/monotony and then doing the same puzzles over and over again. this game has promise, but made me want to bash my head into my keyboard rather than be engaged with it. it's a shame because a video game "purgatory" and escaping it via code is a really cool idea...but fuck the puzzles. will either never finish this game or finish it out of spite and never play it again. first half was good when you weren't caught up in the annoying "puzzle break". I feel like every time I turn around there is some devilish puzzle I have to complete. I hate the mechanics of it. Just unfun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198186860769', 'num_games_owned': 618, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 219, 'last_played': 1626633383}
review: Este juego no es que rompa la cuarta pared, es que la destruye. Es una experiencia que si bien es corta, pues puede durar en torno a la hora y media (2 horas como mucho), es realmente intensa. Se nota que el juego está hecho con mucho mimo y cariño por parte de sus desarrolladores, y eso es algo que realmente se agradece. Merece mucho la pena completarlo al 100% solo por llevarte la experiencia, no va a dejar indiferente a nadie e incluso tiene un humor con el que soltarás alguna que otra carcajada.

author: {'steamid': '76561198353897412', 'num_games_owned': 43, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1625228259}
review:
Интересная и крутая игра, сначала может показаться,что она детская,и в ней ничего интересного нет, и что она для детей,но практически сначала игры, она дает знать о себе, что это не просто какая-то фигня, а очень захватывающая игра, с загадками которые возможно не каждый способен решить, но на мой взгляд они были довольно легкими,сильно много времени на них не тратил (скорее- это зависит от игрока), в общем прикольная короткая игра, могу порекомендовать к прохождению.

Особенно понравился троллинг с уведомлением стима. xd

author: {'steamid': '76561198001730103', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 184, 'last_played': 1454466800}
review:
Well, shit.

I`m not sure I will ever play this game again. Usually, I can forget some or all about this or that indie game and try it again for a brand new (almost) experience, but I don`t think I will EVER be able to forget pony island. And I have a dedicated pendrive kept in a very safe place to prove it.

Believe when they say that THIS GAME IS NOT ABOUT PONIES. Believe when they tag it "Psychological Horror" (and I played my share). Trust NOTHING. And have fun, if you can.

This is not Sparta, THIS IS PONY ISLAND.

author: {'steamid': '76561198285132118', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 494, 'last_played': 1625458569}
review:
Haz visto puella magi madoka magica y recuerdas lo que sentiste al ver lo que le paso a Mami en el capitulo 3? 
Pues, si quieres sentir algo similar este juego es para ti, Una joya de terror psicológico detrás de un nombre tierno, divertido y lo suficientemente desafiante como para ser un desafío sin llegar a ser extremadamente desafiante.... Rejugabilidad adecuada y mas sorpresas de las que uno podría esperar....
Desinstale el juego al final....

author: {'steamid': '76561198028705481', 'num_games_owned': 185, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1625311349}
review:
面白いゲームではあったし、サムズアップもしよう。
しかし、圧倒的高評価というのはいまいち・・・
私があまのじゃくなんだろうか。感性が歪んでいるのだろうか。
ちょっとやる前にレビューでハードル上げ過ぎたかもしれないね。
アクションあり、パズルあり、クリックアドベンチャーあり
記憶ゲームあり、私は１回でおなか一杯なので実績コンプはいいや。
プレイ後の読了感も特にすっきりしないし。
というか私アクションもパズルも超苦手なので凄い苦労した。

author: {'steamid': '76561198066236595', 'num_games_owned': 2057, 'num_reviews': 868, 'playtime_forever': 398, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 252, 'last_played': 1625494280}
review:
제목만보면 핑크핑크한 조랑말들이 마법을부리며 무지개 동산을 뛰어다닐거같은데 
정작 게임을켜보면 말의탈을쓴 사탄이 제 4의 벽을 부수고잇엇습니다
이런부류게임은 몇개잇긴한데 그나마 좀 유명한걸 꼽자면 언더테일이잇겟네요
그건 희망과 의지등등 을 외친다면 여긴 악마랑 싸우느랴 공포스러운 분위기를 계속풍겨내지만요

게임자체에 숨겨진 요소도많고 카드파밍가능하며 분위기도 좋으며 퍼즐요소도 괜찮습니다
가격도 5500원에 할인도 자주하는편이라 구매하신다면 추천드립니다

author: {'steamid': '76561198315340141', 'num_games_owned': 177, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 616, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 173, 'last_played': 1625076868}
review:
РЕКОМЕНДУЮ к прохождению. Взял по скидке, но если бы брал по полной цене, то не пожалел бы все равно. Игра стоит своих денег. Как и сказано в описании игра и вправду не о пони. Вы заточены в некоем чистилище, внутренностях игрового автомата, которым управляет дьявол. Вам нужно удалить 3 основных файла и высвободить души других игроков.
СЮЖЕТ 10 из 10. Очень зацепила игра. Буду проходить ее на все ачивки. Концовка очень интересная и необычная. Также игра понравится людям, которые любят разрушение 4 стены в играх.
ГЕРОИ 8 из 10. ГГ какой-то не очень интересный, я так понял что мы играем за ребенка. А вот второстепенные герои, например дьявол или другие демоны, очень сильно запомнились, особенно уровни с ними.
ГРАФИКА 7 из 10. Забавно. Больше ничего и не скажешь.
УПРАВЛЕНИЕ 10 из 10. Всё классно. Управлять нужно в основном мышкой, а когда нужна будет клавиатура - будет понятно.
ИТОГОВАЯ ОЦЕНКА ИГРЕ 8,5 из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198102218155', 'num_games_owned': 386, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 360, 'last_played': 1624929801}
review:
One of those crazy unusual games that's just worth trying. It gives off the same rebellious feeling as Portal and the Stanley Parable, where you're doing everything you can to annoy the narrator/villain. Also with a sprinkling of the 4th wall breaking of Undertale. 

At its core, it is a puzzle and platformer game with a creepy atmosphere. Enjoyable for 2-5 hours (depending on how long you take to beat it or whether you go for all the easter eggs). The soundtrack adds a lot to the experience too!

author: {'steamid': '76561198356579336', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1557282679}
review:
このゲームには日本語が存在しません。
…いえ、正確には有志によってパッチが配布されていましたが現在は公開停止しています。

私も買ってプレイしようとしたら既に公開停止されていました。
英語が得意ではない人は今のところはお勧めしません。
ただ凄く良いゲームなので英語に自信ある方はプレイすることをお勧めします！
私はこのゲームを最大限楽しみたい為、日本語訳が出るまで深くプレイはしないでしょう。
それまではレビューやコミュニティと共にシャットアウトするしかなさそうです。

author: {'steamid': '76561197971880699', 'num_games_owned': 2849, 'num_reviews': 419, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1623748930}
review:
Duration: 2.5 hours

That was bizarre! Although the "pony island" game annoyed me with the jumping and shooting, the actual game Pony Island was quite an interesting game to play. I loved Asmodeus. Very very clever. Yup, he got me.

Worth the 2.5 hours to play the game. I'm almost annoyed with myself that I deleted it and didn't explore what would happen if I replayed after beating it. 

Recommended 666/1000

author: {'steamid': '76561198260873188', 'num_games_owned': 105, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 495, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 495, 'last_played': 1623608034}
review:
After having had this game for a few years gathering dust in my library, I decided to replay it and try to get all the achievements. Just now I've realized how unpolished this game is. Everything lacks depth: There is no character development, [spoiler]there's no explanation as to who is the Hopeless Soul[/spoiler], and the gameplay is just a filler. The puzzles are very simple and even the "something is wrong" aesthetic is really poorly achieved. But what [i]really[/i] made me finally dislike this game was that, if you wish to know the full story of the main character, you [i]must[/i] play the game at least twice. Even with act skips, it's a really slow and tedious process, since most of it is just waiting for dialogues to end and finishing the pony levels. I still haven't obtained the full truth achievement, and I probably will never obtain it.

TD;LR: Slow pacing, poor story, unpolished, poor gameplay. You aren't missing any genius idea here, you'd be better off buying some other game in this aesthetic.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048604080', 'num_games_owned': 428, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 366, 'last_played': 1623246954}
review: Un juego corto que te llevará a traspasar la 4 pared. Una idea muy original y bien desarrollada que te deja con ganas de sacar todos los entresijos que sus creadores han dejado a lo largo del juego. Además, contiene minijuegos de distintas temáticas con lo que verás variedad si eres curioso. En algunos puntos el juego se vuelve algo repetitivo debido al número de niveles que hay que son muy similares entre sí, por suerte el ritmo del juego incrementa a medida que avanzas en la trama. Para los amantes de puzzles, Easter Eggs e historias turbias y confusas: este es vuestro juego.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045736635', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 119, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1622656206}
review:
喜歡點擊解迷類遊戲的玩家別錯過這款
7.5/10
缺點是稍嫌短
劇情太過隱諱
-
塞了很多小細節進去
全票收集不難 基本上遊戲內都有提示
有些單純要在遊戲中找到正確的地方點擊
謎題難度都算中下
最難的也就蝴蝶的按按鈕同時進門而已
全成就很容易
-
破關一次後就可以選擇章節
不用擔心為了蒐集票而重打整個遊戲好幾次
可惜的是似乎沒有顯示票的分布 不知道缺的票在哪個章節
-
另外
我蒐集全票 也打過隱藏boss
看了討論區後 貌似打玩隱藏boss後 還有片段
但是我按照討論區的說法操作後無法抵達
想要重開遊戲後再試一次 但是沒有隱藏boss關的章節可以選
懶得整個重打
反正也全成就了 我就算了
也算是個小缺點

author: {'steamid': '76561198425904792', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 853, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 809, 'last_played': 1623892570}
review:
I got this game quite some time ago, but no matter how much I play, I'm constantly finding new things, like how the puzzle breaks in act III is really just Satan getting you to fix the game for him under the appearance of a puzzle with butterflies (in one of them, the code thing is there) or [SPOILER ALERT] the boss battle that occurs when you collect every ticket in the game. I love all these things, it really adds to the replayability of the game. Plus, while I'm not sure any of them still work, they hid a bunch of steam codes for the game inside the game, which you could give to someone else to use so they could experience the game too!
11/10, do not regret 100% completion.

author: {'steamid': '76561198155676397', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 363, 'last_played': 1592693604}
review:
Я как большой фанат маленьких пони не мог пройти мимо этой игры. И что я получил? Абсолютно бредовый (в самом хорошем смысле) сюжет, хороший юмор, ломание четвёртой стены, простой геймплей и не особо сложные головоломки, что позволяет расслабиться и без напряга пройти игру примерно за 4 часа. И заканчивается она ровно в тот момент, когда ловишь себя на мысли, что дальше игра начала бы просто наскучивать.

Понравилась ли мне игра? Определённо. Концептуально - это просто шедевр, как я считаю, тем более за 100 с небольшим рублей. Второй раз играть в неё я вряд ли буду, но запомнилась она мне точно.

В общем, однозначно рекомендую, такое надо хотя бы попробовать, особенно если вы любите инди-игры. Моя оценка 7/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198260401907', 'num_games_owned': 1964, 'num_reviews': 321, 'playtime_forever': 173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 173, 'last_played': 1620137860}
review:
[b]Trapped inside an arcade machine? You probably have not played many games like "Pony Island" before. Weird concept, imaginative gameplay, vintage pixelated visuals and a hilarious trolling mood. At some points it becomes tiring and repetitive, while the platform part suffers from annoying, inaccurate control mechanics. Nevertheless it is a unique, brave, indie attempt you have to try.


Manometer: 7/10[/b]


The good
- Unique concept. Weird atmosphere and story you won't often meet in modern games. The developers where brave enough to build something different from the usual staff.
- Special gameplay. It doesn't tell you much and let you figure out how it works all by yourself. Some of the mechanics and the choices you have to make are really imaginative.
- Interesting artistic approach. Minimalistic, pixelated, vintage visuals like these of an old arcade machine. Unique aesthetics you don't forget.
- Good sense of humor. At some points the game trolls you with great success.
- The puzzle part is a little bit repetitive but towards the end it becomes more clever and challenging.
- It is cheap.

The bad
- Although repetitiveness is a vital part of its concept, it becomes a little bit tiring after a certain point. The whole game is built on sequences of three things. The same puzzle part, the same platform part, the trolling part and all over again.
- Although this 8-bit music seems identical, it is too loud and noisy and plays almost all the time at the background. After a while it becomes a little bit annoying.
- The control mechanics at the platform part are problematic. I know this is much like an old arcady platformer, but loosing again again because of inaccurate controls is frustrating

author: {'steamid': '76561197996108536', 'num_games_owned': 1383, 'num_reviews': 180, 'playtime_forever': 329, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 329, 'last_played': 1519411327}
review:
Zagralem w Pony Island tylko dlatego, że polecało go wiele osób. Mówili, że to “nie jest tak, jakby się mogło wydawać”… I rzeczywiście tak nie jest. 

Mimo tego, iż witają nas kolorowe obrazki, bardzo szybko okazuje się, że to wcale nie jest gra o jednorożcach a o ratowaniu uwięzionych dusz i walką z demonami. 

Ciężko jest w tym wypadku cokolwiek opisać czy ustandaryzować, ponieważ cała gra to zbiór pomniejszych minigierek. Na każdym etapie robimy co innego a sama produkcja zdaje się nie chcieć zostać ukończoną. 

Wymieniłbym parę moich ulubionych momentów, by podać przykłady… Ale zabiłbym wtedy przyjemność z samodzielnego zachwycania się nieszablonowością i wyjątkowością tytułu. 

Jednak muszę zaznaczyć, że poza paroma sztuczkami i samym pomysłem… Pony Island nie ma nic do zaoferowania. Przechodziłem, bo byłem ciekawy co tam jeszcze twórcy wymyślili. Nie dla tego, że grało się fajnie. I bardziej traktuję to jako ciekawostkę niż naprawdę dobrą grę.

review: This game succeeds in one thing - it generates so much edge yet fails to have a point. author: {'steamid': '76561198053596735', 'num_games_owned': 969, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 236, 'last_played': 1618175735}
review: Chtěl jsem si pustit nějakou kratší hru, kterou jsem už pár let nehrál a narazil jsem na tuto klasiku. Rád jsem si zavzpomínal na tuto minimalističtější hru, je to pěkná kombinace jednoduché skákačky ve stylu Chrome T-Rexe a logické hry (také s prvky "hackování"). Některé obraty ve hře jsou dokonale zpracované, že i při druhém hraní jsem se skoro nachytal. To bylo ale bohužel vše, druhé odehrání mi už nepřineslo tolik radosti. Pokud jste tuto hru ale ani jednou nehráli, určitě doporučuji. Kdo by totiž odmítnul hru s poníky :)

review:
Si quieres un juego corto y de una alta calidad, pues este es el juego para ti.
Tiene partes de plataformas, puzzles, HACKEO, y unas peleas contra jefes. 
No se dejen engañar por el titulo, el juego tiene una historia interesante y vas a querer completar el juego al 100%.
El precio es justo para el contenido que tiene, aunque si quieres puedes esperar hasta que este en descuento.



Lo jugué en una pc de gama baja y literalmente no se que decirte, es un juego que pesa poco ademas de ser 2D, así que debería funcionar en todos los pc.

review: Sin duda uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado en Steam. Al principio infravaloré mucho este juego por la portada al pensar que sería un simple juego de ponis, pero después al ver el rumbo que estaba tomando el juego, la historia, los puzzles y las capacidades que tiene para hacerte sentir cosas que otros juegos no, tenía ganas de más. No hablo en broma cuando digo que deseo olvidar todo lo que he vivido con este juego para volver a jugarlo y sentir lo mismo que sentí la primera vez. 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198115820587', 'num_games_owned': 3074, 'num_reviews': 351, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1527185262}
review:
Un jeu dans le jeu dans le jeu du jeu. Le Existenz du jeu vidéo en quelque sorte. 

Ça pète pas 3 pattes à un coincoin, mais c'est très original, complètement psychédélique, et assez addictif. J'ai eu mon lot de "ah putain, quand même!", je l'avais acheté dans ce but, mission accomplie. C'est très court (2h30 en prenant son temps), complètement fou, ça ne plaira donc pas à tout le monde, c'est sûr. 

Mais ça reste une très bonne expérience à petit prix, à mon humble avis.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970831764', 'num_games_owned': 1022, 'num_reviews': 238, 'playtime_forever': 366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 366, 'last_played': 1615838257}
review:
Crackpot plot about a game gone rogue. Really fun and unique experience, where you’re searching an operative system for clues and important files; interacting with code and finding back doors to avoid an omnipotent and evil program. Sometimes you’re even forced to play a game. No programming skills required of course, just a sense of humor and a partialness to puzzle games and adventure games. Feels like a genuine deep-dive into the inner workings of a computer, albeit abstracted, with an obvious narrative backdrop.

Recommended if you enjoy games like There Is No Game and/or Hypnospace Outlaw.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018927788', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 385, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1497648685}

author: {'steamid': '76561198384287565', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 351, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 351, 'last_played': 1615669064}
review:
Really fun and innovative game. The best thing about Pony Island are its creative 4th wall breaks.  

- Pony Island's story is pretty interesting but it isn't deep. The characters are pretty funny. 

-  The game play is fun. It has puzzles and some text based and runner style game play. Many of the puzzles are based around coding but having coding knowledge isn't required to play this game. The puzzles are challenging but they aren't infuriating. 

- Also, if you're looking for a terrifying horror experience then you may not like this. The game does have a creepy atmosphere but it isn't scary.

review: It's a neat game. Not usually into puzzle games but it has enough variety to keep you going. I went through it in 1.5 hrs but if you want to collect all the tickets or get more story info you could easily double that. I do wish it had support for 1920 x 1200 resolution because steam messages and achievements would get stuck in the corner of the letterboxing. But you can solve that problem by running it in a windowed mode. It did crash once on me that was not part of the game but it seems to save itself pretty often so I didn't lose any time played.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025306820', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 147, 'last_played': 1613459594}

author: {'steamid': '76561198258932575', 'num_games_owned': 372, 'num_reviews': 167, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1615530942}
review:
Yes, I'd recommend this game. But personally, I thought it was okay.

[spoiler]I'm not sure how I feel about fourth-wall-breaking games and media in general. I think they're neat in that they question tropes, but it's difficult to not be so trope-y themselves. In the case of Pony Island, I think it's a bit too zany for my taste - I'd prefer something far more subtle. Additionally, in this type of game, puzzles that are at least a little difficult feel out of place (unless it drives the story forward) because it really dams the flow.

This is also a personal preference, but I'm not a fan of faux-desktop games. Shrug emoji.

I do think, overall, it was pretty cool. I did enjoy everything else I didn't complain about, especially the very cute games inside the game - those made me laugh more than anything.[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198098505045', 'num_games_owned': 1715, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 341, 'last_played': 1497594021}

author: {'steamid': '76561198994767956', 'num_games_owned': 84, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 522, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 302, 'last_played': 1702930355}
review:
I believe Pony Island can be described as super fun and quick-paced, as well as super creepy at the same time XD. The game mechanics are extremely out of the ordinary, the puzzles require simple yet sophisticated actions to be solved, and the overall environment does not fail to simulate the sense of beta-testing a game, from a kind of desparate but also powerful developer. Also, I cannot [i] not [/i] mention the bosses. The boss fights of this game are the weirdest (in the best way possible) and coolest ones I've ever played, or at least they are in my top 5. The game breaks the fourth wall, and God knows how many more walls, trying to reach out to you, and at some points you have trouble to distinguish what is real and what is part of the game. Keep in mind though, that it involves themes like "Hell", "The Devil" and some other religious elements , so if you feel uncomfortable with such plot points, I would not recommend playing this game. 
However, personally I enjoyed it very much, and I would really like to find something similar one day!

author: {'steamid': '76561198404978431', 'num_games_owned': 195, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 162, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1613585336}
review:
Juego de 2/3 horas con una historia que parece simple ("Wow, algo diabólico... Qué terrorífico" podrás pensar) pero que eventualmente hace que te concentres en resolver los puzzles y en entender la historia.
La maquina tiene muchos trucos para hacerte perder, algunas veces hasta te deja loco de como fuiste tan pendejo para caer en sus trampas. 
No da miedo, es entretenido y logra hacerte hasta reir de vez en cuando. Recomiendo comprarlo en oferta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198840117228', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 223, 'last_played': 1613578750}
review:
“你希望彻底地打完这款游戏？那么我就给你你想要的。”


“谢谢你的游玩，这次我不会再强行退出了，你可能不信，但真的什么也没有了。”

剧透预警
[spoiler] 我是真没想到主角会是十字军战士 [/spoiler]
[spoiler] 全收集后和hopeless soul的三段boss战就有一种敷衍感和疲劳感，毕竟其实是没有什么隐藏boss的，玩家强行寻找的后果就是让hopeless soul一直困在游戏软件中无法解脱，只好和玩家打一局满足玩家的好奇心，希望他能卸载游戏解放自己的灵魂。打完之后就后悔没有打通就卸载游戏，感觉很对不起这个老实可怜的家伙 [/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198796853887', 'num_games_owned': 138, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 284, 'last_played': 1613256466}
review: 很好玩，而且我很喜欢像素风，代入感很强，解谜不算难，puzzle那里做加减法就可以的。就是我手残玩马的时候麻烦了点，又要射又要跳。说实话，吃了没文化的亏，剧情理解不太透，查英汉互译都糊里糊涂，要是有汉化该夺好。游戏会让你有各种错觉，感觉还蛮好玩的。但是就算想要集齐Ticket开隐藏结局，我也不太想玩第二遍了，因为不懂英文玩的我好累。

author: {'steamid': '76561197984830449', 'num_games_owned': 1169, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 271, 'last_played': 1613185181}
review:
Remember in Batman: Arkham City when the screen freezes and glitches and you think it's because your disc was dirty or your file is corrupted? But it turns out it was a gimmick used by Scarecrow?

That's Pony Island.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065633637', 'num_games_owned': 134, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 184, 'last_played': 1612409101}

author: {'steamid': '76561198059551616', 'num_games_owned': 360, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 331, 'last_played': 1610204759}
review:
[h1]Atrapado en el limbo y obligado a jugar en una máquina diseñada por el diablo, tendrás que encontrar la forma de escapar antes de que pierdas tu alma.[/h1]

"Pony Island" esencialmente es un [i]endless runner[/i] con desafíos lógicos donde hay que reacomodar símbolos para activar comandos pero lo que lo hace destacar del resto es su presentación impecable y la forma en la que juega con tu mente.

Un viaje memorable aunque no tenga mucha duración.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977512266', 'num_games_owned': 245, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 143, 'last_played': 1607817591}
review:
Daniel Mullins is the most interesting game designer working today, and Pony Island is a masterpiece. 
I WILL DIE ON THIS HILL!

author: {'steamid': '76561198099891499', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 286, 'last_played': 1612306004}
review: a very fun puzzle based game with a few tricks up its sleeves. not terribly long or difficult, can be beaten in one evening, but it would be a good use of an evening!

author: {'steamid': '76561198827246382', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 722, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 607, 'last_played': 1698438271}
review: Very good and engaging game, requires you to think a lot for some of the puzzles or getting tickets. Often you can find out secrets in the game by just messing around randomly.

review: This is one of the best "self aware" games I've played. It was short but any longer would have over stayed its welcome. The pacing of mechanics and such was better than Undertale's.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997036304', 'num_games_owned': 3192, 'num_reviews': 459, 'playtime_forever': 222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 222, 'last_played': 1586040179}
review:
This game was a hell of a lot of fun to stream! I followed it right after the previous game and I have to admit, I wasn't sure what to think in regards to this game immediately apart from that it's pretty damn brilliant. It starts off innocently enough with playing a fun little game about being a pony and jumping over barriers, ect, but it soon begins to devolve into something absolutely insane!

My video for my first impressions of it: https://youtu.be/83UEIr5LShI 

This is one of those games that attempting to explain it is difficult, but it's a hell of a experience that you won't soon forget.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025340227', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 133, 'last_played': 1611973667}
review:
I bought this way back when Jim Sterling first recommended it and it has sat in my library ever since. Finally, hitting that dreaded point when I had no idea what game I actually wanted to play, I landed on this long-forgotten choice. What followed was 2.2 hours where I fell down the rabbit (or should that be pony?) hole.

At times I questioned my sanity. I definitely questioned whether events were part off reality or the tricks of the game. I battled daemons. I conversed with souls. 

Having been plunged in and out of this game so abruptly I don't know what to think. It's 2 in the morning. This may not have been the best choice for late-night gaming. Alternatively it could be perfect. My late-night internet brain was oddly accepting of the strange goings-on. The seizure-inducing fonts. The Satanic symbols.

This game is a bargain at full-price. I need to play it again. And again. And maybe a hundred more times before I actually understand the insane vision quest I just played through.

Do it mortals. Just inflict it on yourselves.

author: {'steamid': '76561198255137241', 'num_games_owned': 598, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 157, 'last_played': 1611958239}
review:
Oh boy, what can i say about this game?
First of all, what a journey. I am not the same person as I once was before completing this game. It made me feel smart, it made be feel stupid. I made friends, I upset friends, just by playing this game. I used to, as a wee child, want a pony and now, i dont know if i can ever look one in the face ever again. If you don't have enough stress in your life, i highly suggest this game or, if you DO have a stressful life i highly suggest playing this and realising that those stresses could be totally worse. 5/7 game, highly recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074409143', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 142, 'playtime_forever': 89, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 89, 'last_played': 1611865141}
review:
It pains me to leave a negative review (neutral would be my choice; I understand the positive ones) for a bold indie game, but I've got to be honest. 

I've tried to like this, but couldn't. The game beat me (maybe that was part of the point?) instead of me beating it _ and not in the sense of being difficult (it's not) or frustrating (although it is). 

The problems here are way worse: it's not that smart (the [spoiler] meta [/spoiler] was done better later by [spoiler] Doki Doki Literature Club! [/spoiler], for example) and, capital sin, [u] it's not fun [/u]. I see the sense of humour in it (even when it trolls the player), but unfortunately that was not enough for me to go on, no matter how hard I tried.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101103255', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 591, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 591, 'last_played': 1611381753}
review:
写在最前

恭喜点进来的各位，会发现这个游戏跟封面上表现的东西实际上完全不同。本文以下都称本游戏为《小马岛》

我们应该感谢制作人Daniel Mullins，因为他在2016年伊始，就为全世界的玩家献上了这份精彩绝伦的超越之作，它的完成度之高，涵义之丰富，风格之独特，使得它完全有资格在独立游戏的光荣殿中占有足够重要的地位。接下来我就将对本作进行测评，详细分析和探讨这款游戏的特别之处。

本文将分为三个部分：《小马岛》是否好玩、《小马岛》是否是一个好游戏、《小马岛》的基础上的meta以及其他。

【《小马岛》好玩吗】

如果直接问这句话的话，那我也直接给出答案，不好玩，一点都不好玩。刺耳的音效、阴间的配色、丑陋的人物（甚至吓到我了）、无聊的操作，它简直一无是处。还有挺大的英文文本量，无汉化，充满各种隐喻，对玩家文化要求较高，这些都在劝退玩家，所以一句话，不好玩。

但是值得一说。

 剧情部分

[spoiler]玩家是一名被困在游戏机中的灵魂，只能玩着由恶魔制作的操控小马的横板跳跃的垃圾游戏。在游玩两关之后我们发现了在游戏程序中的bug，通过解开谜题之后我们见到了一个无助的灵魂（hopeless soul）。在他的央求和帮助下，我们逐步击破系统核心最终解放所有被囚禁在游戏内部的灵魂的故事。 [/spoiler]

我们再来看看它的游戏系统，大致上可以分解为三块。

 动作跳跃系统

在这里我们将扮演小马在不停向左滚动的卷轴二维画面中奔跑跳跃。通过点击鼠标左键跳跃，右键发射光线消灭怪物直到到达最右边的终点。在这个部分中作者对小马的操作手感调教的很不错，跳跃时感受不到滞后和漂浮感，整体轻盈。发射光线没有滞后感，并且虽然画面简单但是光线全展开的样子每次都能震撼到我，有种暴力别致的美感。

解谜系统

形式类似让你调整并设置给定的运行方向来完成一个自动运行的流程，以使得不停向下落的箭头得以满足条件并且到达最终地点。有点像以前玩过的小游戏《接水管》。虽然后面难度在不断提升（检测经过的数据是否符合要求）并加入了很多新的指令方块（传送、分裂），但是总体的难度都不高。这个部分是我认为最无聊的部分，不少流程需要在流程内重复几次操作才能通向终点，再加上伴随着箭头每次移动的电子滴滴声，刺耳又令人瞌睡。但是值得玩味的是箭头经过的路径上会有很多词汇作为暗示，有些会告诉你命令方块的作用，而有的在暗示游戏真实想表达的内容。作为解谜系统，《小马岛》的解谜仍然处于强制玩家解决谜题或是需要完成任务式的“开锁“，这一点虽然在解谜游戏中算是中规中矩，但是在一款探索类游戏和meta游戏中仍然全部谜题都使用此法与玩家见面的话，是有些不足了。既没有意料之外的惊喜，也没有情理之中的逻辑。意料之外是指玩家可以通过自行发现简单办法解决原本非常困难的谜题，甚至跳过谜题。情理之中是指玩家主动寻找谜题来达到目的自觉。在这一部分可以通过隐藏设置也可以通过剧本演出的方式达成，比如《There is no game》通过演出的方式完成了较好的解谜与游玩的结合。

探索系统

在meta类型游戏中探索系统是一个承上启下的关键。对于玩家来说，探索会让玩家止不住的点来点去（或许人类本质就是多动的XD），这样有助于将玩家推进的进度打断，从而加深玩家对内容的理解。对制作者而言，探索是给制作者一个发言的机会，通过埋藏彩蛋或是剧情信息的演出来直接表达制作者真正想表现的内容。例如在雅达利时代存在于世的被公认为第一个有彩蛋的游戏《Adventure》。通过一系列不寻常的动作和隐晦的操作，玩家可以发现一个隐藏的房间，闪烁着“Created by Warren Robinet”字样。
探索部分大概分为两部分， [spoiler]一是在游戏中期会提供给玩家一个被限制的自由移动的大地图，玩家可以相对自由的探索，不过范围极度有限。
另一个是玩家直接面对游戏机的画面，通过操作游戏机菜单和在无助灵魂的帮助下侵入这台机器的其他用户操作界面。 [/spoiler]
前面说的这么多，无非是想表达这种探索系统很难以一言以蔽之。那么在《小马岛》的话，探索大致上就是在游戏深层系统中翻翻找找和在游戏内部地图和各种菜单中随意点点逛逛。
不过这里的探索系统明显还是比较粗糙，与同体量独立游戏《FEZ》相比，小马岛在探索的惊喜感上明显不足。甚至可以说这款游戏的探索几乎不会给玩家带来惊喜， [spoiler]比如在大地图中，我们可以通过探索有一次改变外形的机会，我们从小马变身成了十字军战士。虽然本游戏普通画面已经够阴间了，不过陡然出现的人形模样仍然让我感觉阵阵发毛。 [/spoiler]
在系统的探索中，《小马岛》的游戏其他元素探索显得不够合情合理，在笔者看来，除了拖动游戏素材组成一个上帝之眼图案之外，其他的探索元素略显生硬。这并不是可以用meta游戏的特性就能说得过去的，虽然这些探索部分应该是作者与玩家之间对话的场所，但是显现的内容不应当是突兀的，关于这一块第三部分会提。
总而言之，《小马岛》的探索部分仍然处于让玩家探索顺便发现的思路中，仍然没有让玩家从饶有兴致到兴致勃勃主动探索的变化。那么在这里他的探索将不再是一种纯粹的探索，就仅仅是将游戏内容对玩家的硬塞。如果说这款游戏是单纯讲讲故事或者没什么故事爽爽就完事的产物，那么这种内容玩家完全可以当做耳边风就过去了，而不是需要找齐线索的刻意探索。从探索这一点来说，我认为是很失败的，并且在第三部分我将继续着重批判下他的收集部分。

画面和艺术风格

本作的在游戏中构造了三个世界，分别以截然不同的风格进行呈现并相互连接。首先是复古的灰阶及16色像素风格；然后通过立体动态的黑洞形式在这一世界中撕裂出了一个后台的代码的解谜世界；第三个世界，也即主角（玩家）的视角和世界，则是以标准的三维建模和渲染进行表现。这三种截然不同的画面风格，以一种极具纵深和动态感的形式结合在了一起，让主角在叙事中自然而然地穿梭与其间。
但是本作糟糕的配色非常容易使人感到视觉疲劳，并且某些细节部分因为美术原因及其难以辨认，有些可惜。
在叙事上， [spoiler]由于故事在暗示主角是一名死掉的十字军战士，那么就不得不谈下本作究竟内核的故事是什么。在游戏中通过向恶魔巴弗灭（baphomet）提问所得到的答案可以得知，我们操控的主角名叫Theodore，他在1252年夏天被一个叫作Abu Al-Kindi的阿拉伯男人以保卫家园为名所杀死，葬身于与其家乡相隔万里的哭墙脚下，随后，作为一个被罚入地狱的灵魂，Theodore来到了地狱的边境并被困于此。值得一提的是主角的名字是一个源出希腊的常见男子教名，而杀掉主角的那个人也是常见的阿拉伯伊斯兰名字。结合上述的内容外加在游戏中被困住的上千名灵魂和变身十字军形象的暗示。我们可以大致推测出主角是法国国王路易九世发动的第七次十字军东征中（1248 - 1254）的一员，正好囊括了主角死亡的1252年。在这6年时间里，疲乏的十字军最终被阿拉伯的马木留克奴隶军和阿尤布王朝击溃，顺便通过俘虏路易九世赚取了一笔不小的赎金。理所当然地，在那时哭墙所在的著名城市耶路撒冷也在阿尤布王朝的版图内。
巴弗灭告诉主角和玩家，只有被放逐的灵魂才会来到地狱边境。明明是参与了“圣战”的十字军战士，Theodore还是没能前往天国，可能的原因很多，或许因为曾在战争中杀过人，或是打着信仰的名义做过违反教条的事情，又亦或是参与战争本身就是不可取的……诚然，从历史角度看，十字军东征对文化的融合有着积极作用。但这不并意味着参与战争这个行为本身就应该被合理化。在游戏整体基调方面分析，我感受到了对该历史事件的概括性否定态度——虔诚的圣战英雄流落到地狱，无疑就是件讽刺的事。名义上为了信仰却行使着杀人的罪恶之事，本身就是背叛信仰的行为。即便士兵本人坚信自己所行的是正义之举，也无法改变他们背离初衷的事实。如果从这个角度分析，《小马岛》可以说是一部在探讨宗教战争背后是否真的正义的作品。
不过从游戏内我们的经历来看，主角在经历垃圾游戏的迷惑，在无助灵魂的帮助下侵入系统，分次逐步探索更加深入的世界和击败看守游戏核心的三个恶魔的经历，有些许像是但丁的《神曲：地狱篇》的缩写。外加游戏包含众多经典恶魔形象就更加容易坐实本作的那股纯粹探讨宗教世界的味道。
总的来说，本作应该是通过文字、音乐、画面的三重出击，概括性的批判了所谓的圣战。它既可以说是一部反战作品，也可以说是在当今这个“上帝已死”的世界中探讨清算曾经打着正义旗号的西方宗教世界。 [/spoiler]

小结

作为一款游戏仅从可玩性来讲，《小马岛》甚至可以称之为是一款不好玩的游戏。各方各面体验都不太舒服，甚至内容都显得沉重的夸张。但，这篇评测还远远不止于此。

【《小马岛》是否是一个好游戏】

前面我们刚得出本作不好玩的基础上，现在提了一个新问题：《小马岛》是否是一个好游戏。虽然看起来挺尴尬的，不过我这次的回答是：《小马岛》是一部佳作。

好游戏的标准

游戏作为依托现代电子产品的产物，它的历史发展至今只有短短几十年。在这几十年内，游戏早就不是最开始那个用来打发时间或者仅仅用来娱乐的消遣了。依托现代的电子技术发展，我们从最开始显示的点阵到如今的越来越精致的建模注入到这个名为游戏的载体。为了迎合大众的审美习惯，游戏也越来越向着“好玩”变化着。但这不是在说一个好游戏的标准仅仅是好玩与否。甚至我可以更为激进的说，好玩可能根本不是一款好游戏的评判标准之一。因为在严肃的审视和标准下，游戏虽然先天带着娱乐人们的“玩性”在先，但他总归是一种艺术。
艺术的本质跟绝大多数人理解的都不一样，更与我们如今社会，艺术所处的社会角色和商业链条上的那一环不是一回事。它并没有那么深奥也没有那么奢侈和华丽。相反，它很朴素，因为它至始至终所描绘的都是人类自己的精神世界。无论以何种形式作为载体，无论艺术家选择的是哪种载体，都是他当时所处的时代环境与他自身，或主动或被动去选择的。所以，重要的不是载体，而是背后的表达，是背后那个人的意志体现。那么从审视精神内核来看，《小马岛》用了一种特别的方式将作者想要表达的内容展现给了我们。游戏虽然生发自传统艺术，但是游戏其本身的独特优势会帮助游玩者获得别具一格的审美体验。这种体验就是交互，尤其《小马岛》是一款类型特别的游戏，metagame。

《小马岛》的meta

简单介绍metagame的话就是说，这种游戏它虽然以游戏为载体，但是尽可能的或者直接与游玩者在现实中对话。就像是在一本小说中，你喜欢的角色深陷困境，在一筹莫展之时突然对着书外面的读者说了一句“快帮我想办法，不然我要死了“。比如在《苏菲的世界》中，苏菲和老师意识到自己是小说中的人物；史铁生《关于詹牧师的报告文学》，一边讲詹牧师的故事，一边讨论报告文学该怎么写，其间还给出各种写詹牧师的方案。在游戏中，这种表现手法通常会有一个旁白直接根据玩家的行为进行交流（《Stanley 's Parable》），或者是游戏内部的游玩部分直接影响到你现实的电脑，《小马岛》就属于后者。 [spoiler]在游戏末尾我们挑战的最后一名守护者他将直接对玩家的现实发难，玩家不需要与其作战，但是它要求玩家时时刻刻看着他并回答他的问题。在这个过程中除了胡扯，读取玩家steam在线好友并且盗用好友头像发送信息给玩家，还会假装程序崩溃。当然玩家如果真的去确认了这些事情就输掉这场对决了。这里是最能够直接体现meta的部分。其中还有不明显的。
在游戏后半段，游戏画面会由原来的”阴间“画面变成“乖宝宝”模式，在这个模式下我们的跳跃系统中原本会出现的会飞的恶魔会变成基督的形象。如果我们秉承着做一个“善人”的心态不去击败他，游戏会在本关结束恶狠狠的嘲讽你:你竟然没打败他？实际上无论是游戏最后的守护者，还是”乖宝宝“模式下的内容亦或是更多其他的部分，都体现出一种有别于日常对于恶魔凶神恶煞的认知，反而是一种经典传统的恶魔形象——通过谎言哄骗，诱导着人们一步步堕落。结合游戏中大量的文本使得每一次玩家面对这种欺骗或是信息时都要感受游戏直接与我们对话的力量。因为玩家的身世是由恶魔亲口告知的，玩家所有找到的线索都是在恶魔的游戏机上找到的，甚至帮助我们的那个无助的灵魂央求我们解放其他灵魂的样子都像极了伊甸园的那条蛇。在种种值得被怀疑的信息中，游戏隐喻着抛给我们这样一个问题：这些以上帝荣光之名，行恶魔行径为实的正义者都下了地狱，我作为其中一员，我该解救我们吗？

我不知道来自恶魔的信息是否正确，我也不知道仅仅把关住灵魂的容器大门打开让这些罪人逃脱是否真的是救赎。甚至如果这些罪人真的是圣战的参与者的话，究竟能不能在天国的审判中被定罪！ [/spoiler]我只知道我在与这款游戏本身打交道，作者将他自己的意志演绎成了游戏，而我虽然在玩游戏，可实际上也在被游戏玩弄着。

游戏作为一种艺术的载体在《小马岛》中绽放

从艺术的角度上来说，《小马岛》是成功的。虽然它体量非常小；虽然它是独立制作人制作；虽然它画面和其他表现上有着“用力过猛“或”生硬死板“的缺陷，但是它成功的表达了。它是有意义的，有别于生硬的指导玩家或者引诱玩家充钱，它将关于宗教和人性的探讨通过电子设备从1252年穿越到了如今。它本身不是为了某样功利的、虚幻化为资本的目的而存在，它只是想要表达。他的表达言之有物且充分详实，甚至将圣战的暴行与天神恶魔相联想我甚至在脑海中有浮现过毕加索的《格尔尼卡》的影子。作为艺术来说，《小马岛》是瑕不掩瑜的佳作，那么游戏作为艺术的载体来讲，《小马岛》是一部佳作了。也许不好玩大概是表达的一环吧。

《小马岛》的基础上的meta以及其他

关于批评

这一部分是用来表达我对本作品不满的部分的，如果仅看测评的话可以到此为止了。

细节与彩蛋

在游戏中，我们按照流程不去随意探索就能获得几张票（ticket）,这些票在游戏中根本不知道有什么用，但是在主菜单我们能看到收集的票数，以及显示着总共24张。得到所有的票需要费点小心思，这也意味着玩家在一周目几乎不可能或得到所有的票。在游戏结局时， [spoiler]玩家能够依稀透过屏幕看到碧树蓝天和隐约的楼房，这也许暗示着玩家的逃脱成功。但是玩家作为一个早就死掉的灵魂不是应该得到救赎到达天堂吗？再加之在结尾无助的灵魂告诉你需要玩家卸载掉游戏他才能解脱，这就暗示着这个游戏不止存在这一个结局。 [/spoiler]玩家意识到这点的时候游戏似乎明白玩家心意一样，提供了一个允许玩家回到游戏不同部分的菜单。玩家回到之前的场景细细寻找并重玩流程最终找齐了这24张票。这时，无助的灵魂会对你说：“啊你竟然找齐了呀，你不就是对这个结局不满意吗？那我满足你给你现场做一个新的结局。“玩家体验过不同结局之后也许多数会感到满意，但是我不满意。

被强迫寻找这关于结局的彩蛋

或许直接点说，选择权在玩家手上，玩家想不想玩这个彩蛋是玩家自己的选择，何来强迫呢？但是玩家在体验过本作之后感到意犹未尽并且对最终结果感到疑惑的时候，玩家哪里来的那么“自由“选择的能力呢？尤其是在流程中一切中规中矩仍然会收集到不少票，这简直是明摆着告诉玩家我这里有彩蛋，请玩。
在这里我想花点时间稍微聊聊彩蛋，这里我想节选一篇演讲稿， 2002年游戏开发者大会GDC上，布莱恩.莫里亚蒂所演讲的内容。我想它的内容影响了我，我也想让更多的人感受。

……不要以为，埋两个彩蛋就是设计出令人敬畏的游戏的关键！一般的游戏，人为地置入彩蛋和作弊码，就像是“每月电池”俱乐部一般，你需要长途跋涉，来到店铺最里面，获得你此行的真正目的——如果人们真的想要超能力，那么为什么不直接给他们呢？
我们的想象力真的有那么不值钱，需要凭借营销点子，才能让玩家对我们的游戏感兴趣吗？令人敬畏的事物不需要隐藏，令人敬畏的事物既富有又出手大方。
宝藏就在那里。
不久之后，甚至就在我们的有生之年，会有那么一个游戏设计，如同闪电一般照耀我们的文化。它极易辨识，它有着泉涌般慷慨，有着肆意妄为的发明气魄。学者们毕其一生，甚至数个世纪来对它探索和痴迷。它会是美妙的，它会是令人战栗的，它，令人充满敬畏。
  ……

 是的，我对这种对彩蛋强调的姿态不满；对这种半强迫玩家或者干脆用彩蛋宣传的姿态不满。说的就是幻刃你们做《ICEY》宣发的态度，还有《映月城与电子姬》，这个更离谱。还有全是彩蛋的电影，或许某些打着彩蛋卖座的片子都称不上是电影。彩蛋是意外的惊喜发现，甚至彩蛋可以是游戏中可以选择的隐藏通路。但它不能是深藏在游戏的隐秘幽暗角落，玩家为了彩蛋而特意做出异乎寻常的操作并对其他内容走马观花式的直取。因为在那时，游戏将不再是它本身，虽然彩蛋仍然是彩蛋，不过失去了依托的彩蛋还是那个味道吗？

彩蛋的最后

玩家见到的另一个结局仅仅是 [spoiler]无助的灵魂为了你 [/spoiler]凑活出来的boss战， [spoiler]在最后打赢时都没办法正常退出，因为游戏甚至都没有做那个阶段的菜单。甚至你都不知道到底打没打赢，因为游戏不在乎到底给你呈现个什么效果，只知道玩家想看另一个结局那就给你看就是了。最终玩家只能在最后的场景中看着远方不停地向前奔跑。 [/spoiler]仅此而已，啥都没有。

【结束语】

评分：8.5/10
+出色的黑色氛围，有新意的背景                        
+精致又融入很多元素的剧本
+完整度高，内涵尚可
+技术力
-音效画面等制作
推荐人群：恶魔
不推荐人群：车枪球爱好者

你以为彩蛋是游戏拙劣的隐藏？

或许实际上收集票不过是在诱惑你进入这个空无一物的永远不会停歇的场景。或许 [spoiler]无助的灵魂 [/spoiler]才是真正的Satan，每一个被囚禁的灵魂都在这种世界里永久的囚禁。连玩家，就连玩家，在关掉游戏之后依旧没有发现被蒙骗，被这个游戏永远的玩弄过了。

review:
This game hits so many buttons for me. Puzzles, platforming, and a snarky narrator who you get to disobey, to name a few. A bit short, but worth every minute.

Graphics

☐ Decent
☐ Boring

The pixel art really gives it that arcade/coding feel.

Gameplay

☑ Great
☐ Good enough to keep playing

☐ Bad
I like the mix between puzzles and platforming, and I think the game does a pretty good job of going back and forth between them so nothing feels too repetitive.

Audio
☑ Listen to the soundtrack for fun
☐ Great
☐ Good
☐ Maybe
☐ Just turn the sound off
Epic soundtrack! Really gets you into the mood. And the sound effects are perfect.

Story
☐ Captivating
☑ Good
☐ There for those who want it
☐ Cringeworthy
☐ There is no story
A clever story that leaves you wondering what will happen next. I didn't feel like it was quite original enough to fit into the highest tier, but I'm still very happy with it.

Difficulty

☐ Significant brain usage
☐ Easy to learn / Hard to master
☑ Not so easy
☐ Difficult
☐ Dark Souls
There were a few puzzles I had to look up and a few platforming levels I had to retry a few times, but for the most part I found this fairly easy.

Balancing

☐ Players doing well get taken down a notch

Achievements are really the only reason to replay this. Most of the fun comes from experiencing things for the first time.

Took me about 3 hours to complete.

The price is lower than many games, but this game is also shorter than many games. It seems fair to me.

私もギフトで貰ってレビューを見に来たけど皆の助言に従って即座に回れ右して起動しました。
ギフトの中にそっとこれを紛れ込ませて送ってきてくれたフレンドに感謝⋯！

途中で詰まってここへ来た人へ:
画面の中を隅々までとことん見渡し、できること全てを試してみること。

author: {'steamid': '76561198038114113', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1610574371}
review: It's a short game, and I think I am about 2/3rds of the way through it, but it is freaking amazing.  The person who wrote it is a little twisted, possibly insane, but it is really fun.  Each hurdle is similar to the last, but just enough harder and different to not be repetitive.  It's designed to make you look around and think outside the box, which makes it very engaging.  I like it very much.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075251444', 'num_games_owned': 635, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1609499268}
review:
这个应该算是meta游戏，披着小马的外衣的解谜游戏。

除了普通解谜以外，还有平台跳跃和类似写程序的小游戏，前者因为频繁出现加上比较单调挺让人厌烦的，难度虽然不高但是因为画面问题容易视觉疲劳。

如果收集齐游戏内的卡，还能享受到一场紧张又刺激（才怪）的boss战。

author: {'steamid': '76561198000861562', 'num_games_owned': 3271, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 1068, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1068, 'last_played': 1610048419}
review:
Sounds like a cute game about a pony on a island right? Well that's not the case, but that doesn't mean It's a bad game. 

This is a trippy puzzle-game with a wierd and funny twist, the gameplay is nothing special but the story is the catch. Pony Island is only a few hours long but considering the price tag the value is okay. The game does have some replayability, secrets and achievements that is worth doing, but It's still a short experience. 

It's recommended to know as little as possible before playing this, but lets just say the story is full of dark humour and self awareness and the game jokes about things like hacking for example.

author: {'steamid': '76561198346043587', 'num_games_owned': 170, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1609871586}
review:
この手のゲームは設計そのものがネタバレになりかねないのでレビュー泣かせではあるが、ストアページの紹介文や紹介動画自体既にネタを披露しにかかっているのでなんとなく察していただければ。
自分はむしろ気になって購入したクチです。

各種言語に対応しているが残念なことに日本語には未対応。しかし中学レベルの英語力があれば単語などから次に何をすればいいのか理解できるし、実際ゲームプレイそのものは簡単なアクションとパズル要素、ポイント＆クリックがメインなのでそこまで影響はない。
しかし、このゲームの根幹部分、をより深く楽しむためにはやはりある程度の英語力があった方が良い。
自分も英語はからっきしなので2~3か所答えに詰まったところがあった。
また、解像度の低い筐体をモチーフにしている為フォント自体が読みにくく、AとR、MとW、Sと5など似たような文字が判別しにくい。
それらを差し引いてもストーリーテリングに魅力があり、レビューの「圧倒的に好評」にも頷けた。
単純にクリアするだけなら２~３時間、実績コンプ含めても５時間もあればクリアできます。
気軽に始めてより良い余韻を楽しむのに丁度良いゲームでした。おすすめ。

author: {'steamid': '76561198075324976', 'num_games_owned': 909, 'num_reviews': 689, 'playtime_forever': 423, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 418, 'last_played': 1609550331}
review:
Did you want to play a cute little game about a pony? Too bad, you're stuck in purgatory with a "broken" game and a mystery to solve.

While the gameplay is nothing special and even a bit repetitive, the entertainment value here is the puzzles and a self aware backstory. It's a simple and relatively fun few hours of delving into the devils arcade machine.

There's not much replay value once you solve the mystery but it might take you twice through to get all the achievements and unlock "The Full Truth." Anyway, it's decent relative to the low price and makes for an evening of entertainment.
---

author: {'steamid': '76561198139344280', 'num_games_owned': 475, 'num_reviews': 209, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 215, 'last_played': 1606883376}
review:
[h2]Die Hölle ist kein Ponyhof[/h2]
Pony Island zu beschreiben, ist gar nicht so einfach. Mal ist es ein Hacking-Puzzle, mal ein kryptisches Drama über verlorene Seelen und mal ein mieses Rollenspiel mit schrecklichem Erfahrungspunktesystem. Hey, manchmal sogar das hässliche, bunte Jump 'n' Run, für das es sich auf der Shopseite auf den ersten Blick ausgibt. Und alles davon ist gut! Entwickler Daniel Mullins gelingt mit diesem auf den ersten Blick unscheinbar wirkenden Genremix nicht nur ein gelungener Seitenhieb auf die ein oder andere Angewohnheit von Spielen und Spielern - es durchbricht dabei auch so kreativ die vierte Wand, das es sich in dieser Hinsicht nicht mal vor einem The Stanley's Parabel verstecken muss. Und dazu steckt dahinter auch noch ein herausforderndes Spiel. 
Die erwähnten Hacking-Puzzle haben zwar eigentlich wenig mit ersterem zu tun, doch beim Lösen der in gesunder Regelmäßigkeit eingestreuten und stetig komplexer werdenden Logik-Knobeleien hab ich mich trotzdem wie ein cooler Coder gefühlt. Auch die teils durchaus anspruchsvollen Jump 'n' Run-Einlagen sind eigentlich nicht übel - es sei denn, Satan ist schlecht gelaunt und/oder will es so. Bitte was? Ja, die Geschichte trieft voller okkulter Mysterien und Fragezeichen. Hinter dem Spieleautomat mit dem freundlichen, lila Pony steckt noch so einiges mehr, was uns durch so kryptisches wie kreatives Storytelling nähergebracht wird. Selten wohl gab es in einem Spiel einen ausgefeilteren Satan, als in Pony Island. Abgerundet wird das Spiel von seinem coolen Äußeren, denn der klassische Retro-Look wird durch die Röhrenbildschirm-Optik und den stilistisch pointierten Einsatz von roten und blauen "Bildfehler-Pixeln" enorm aufgewertet.

[i]Persönliches Rating:[/i] [strike][b]85[/b]/100[/strike] 

[code]$launch_satan.exe $modify_entry $removevalue_85 $setvalue_101[/code]

[i]P3rsönl1che5 R4t1ng:[/i] [b]101[/b]/100 {!error_overflow}

[i]Fazit[/i]
[h3]Pony Island durchbricht nicht nur durch stetige Überraschungen die vierte Wand, sondern kann dank coolen Rätseln und kreativem Storytelling auch auf allen anderen Ebenen glänzen![/h3]

[i]Wenn dir mein Review gefallen hat, freue ich mich über eine Bewertung.[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198810266284', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1608648720}
review: 9岁的时候做过一场梦, 自己被囚禁于地狱需要通过撒旦的全部关卡来获得给父母打通电话并重返人间的机会。醒来时非常想要把这个梦境设计成一款游戏, 无奈当时的自己并没有技术储备去做好这件事。所以对于Daniel的小马岛, 我有着非常私人的感情。如同看见童年梦境(双重意味)以另一种方式醒来并焕发能量。我永远都不会卸载小马岛, 对我而言它业已成为一个Daniel与我的共享梦。

author: {'steamid': '76561198202489307', 'num_games_owned': 308, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 238, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 238, 'last_played': 1608735052}
review:
[h1] Pony gibi tatlı bir hayvanı nasıl şey yaparsınız ... Neyse spoiler olur [/h1]
Yani oyun ilk başlattığımda [i] aaa ne kadar tatlı bir giriş... biraz çocukca ama neyse deniyelim[/i] 'den. [i]  [spoiler] bu oyunu silmezsem ruhları serbest bırakamaycağım [/spoiler] [/i] yere kayması beni baya baya eğlendirdi.
Kısaca belirtmek gerekirse oyunumuz bir retro-platform oyunu sıra sıra bulmacalarla sıra sıra zıplamalarla sıra sıra [spoiler] [strike] şeytanın sizin ruhunuzu ele geçirmeye çalışmasıyla... [/strike]  [/spoiler] Yani eğlencesiyle sizi büyülüyor.

[h1] Türkçe dil desteği düşünülmüş! [/h1]
Evet beni etkileyen ikinci bir şey ise bu dil seçeneğin düşünülmüş olması. Açıkçası bu kadar basit bir oyuna türkçe dil atılması beni gerçekten sevindirdi. Dürüst olalım hangimiz bu oyuna türkçe dil gelmesini bekleyebilirdi ki?
[i] Dipnot: Belirtmekte fayda var bu oyunu ben türkçe dil desteğiyle oynamadım. İngilizce versiyonunda oynamanızı şiddetle tavsiye ediyorum. Çünkü oyun yabancı yapım ve hani dilimize uygun çeviriler olamabiliyor bazen çünkü bir kelimenin birden fazla anlam taşıyabiliyor. Ama yine de bilmeyenler için tabi ki de oynanabilir. [/i]

[h1] Tek seferlik bir oyun [/h1]
Biraz üzücü ancak benim için anısı olacak diyebileceğim bir oyun.

[h1] Genel Puanım 9/10 [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561199020963083', 'num_games_owned': 226, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 339, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 337, 'last_played': 1638014205}
review:
本来是补票嗷，实在无聊就又玩了一遍，打个全成就

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561197999823834', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 133, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 267, 'last_played': 1611964841}
review:
You might think with a name like Pony Island, this would be a bland, sappy, sparkly little adventure specifically-designed to keep your 7-year-old relatives quiet finally.

You would also be wrong.

In reality, this is a weird, confusing, dark, and very meta part-advenure, part-programming, part-horror game. You can't really say "oh, it's an X game" because it might be, but it also kind of isn't, and even still, that wouldn't tell the whole story. It is OF many genres, but not IN any genre, if that makes sense.

Confused? Yeah, welcome to Pony Island.

If you enjoy games that play with you just as much as you play with them, you should love this one. It has some frustrating parts, and not all of the later programming sections even made sense to me, but if you want to take a break from the norm and try something different, well this certainly qualifies.

review:
A great, small, meta as hell purchase that knows exactly what it is. Very simple gameplay but an interesting twist on an arcade game as a concept. Some great meta comedy and basic meta puzzles.

Doesn't do anything too crazy but is consistently fun all the way through. Worth checking out for it's price, but might not contain enough content for everyone.

author: {'steamid': '76561198425462345', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1570082954}
review: This isn't really a game you can describe. I'd only say it's a creative project that defies classification by genre. You'll get a very amusing few hours out of it, assuming you can appreciate games for a solid theme and aren't expecting Civ7 from an artistic title. Fewer spoilers ahead of time will improve your experience. Recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067371366', 'num_games_owned': 2090, 'num_reviews': 584, 'playtime_forever': 940, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 940, 'last_played': 1607917923}
review:
An okay game. I get the gist, a meta game in the vein of There is no game or Stanley Parable, plays on original narration etc. Unfortunately the gameplay in most of these games is not very interesting, so get ready for that in Pony Island too (half jump/shoot, half puzzle). Gameplay wise, it is lacking, so as a game, the entertainment value is not great. As a story though, a work on narrative design etc, it was pretty good and original. Ponies, Demons, a unique turn on it. Worth the experience I guess!

author: {'steamid': '76561198284347467', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1607877813}
review:
Daniel Mullins w Pony Island wychodzi poza standardową przestrzeń gry. Wyciąga diabelskie, cyfrowe szpony w kierunku sfer, które zwykle nie interferują z rozgrywką. Te nieoczekiwane wypady w inne rejony rzeczywistości elektronicznej są skuteczne. Uderzają we wrażliwe struny nie tylko gracza, ale użytkownika komputera w ogóle.

Rzeczywistość elektroniczna w Pony Island zorganizowana jest na zasadach manicheizmu. Po stronie dobra stoją gracze i bezproblemowo działające gry. Złą stronę reprezentują twórcy gier (szczególnie gdy gra sprawia problemy techniczne), kod gier, bugi. Nie da się pogodzić tych dwóch stron, bo gracze nie chcą uczestniczyć w procesie poznania - nie interesują ich szczegóły techniczne, chcą jedynie bezproblemowo używać sprawnej wersji produktu. Z punktu widzenia konsumentów bugi to coś złego, coś co mgliście kojarzy im się z developerami i kodem gry. W takim ujęciu developerzy to niemal pariasi zajmujący się czymś nieczystym, bo związanym ze złem - kodem, który może powodować błędy. 

Manicheizm w Pony Island to próba przedstawienia ambiwalentnego stosunku graczy do twórców gier. Wystarczy kilka potknięć i z idoli, kreatorzy gier, stają się diabłami.

---
Mój profil kuratora Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/curator/33910649/

author: {'steamid': '76561198331657029', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 252, 'last_played': 1607305790}
review:
Pony Island é um jogo ruim.
Mas na verdade Pony Island quase não é um game.
Na verdade, é difícil definir o que Pony Island é. Jogo? História interativa? Experiência artística? Experimento?
Sem querer promover o título a uma maravilha da arte, devo dizer que foi uma das experiências mais interessantes que tive na Steam. 
Acho difícil descrever para  alguém que não jogou o que este game é, já que as imagens só mostram um jogo que lembra um SHMUP com cavalos no lugar de naves com gráficos retro. Bem, isso é parte do game (na verdade, essa é a parte mais "game" dele. E, apesar de simplícima, joga bem para seu propósito), mas também tem relação com a experiência. 
Pony Island mescla um jogo retro da era do MS-DOS com puzzles de encaixe (simples, divertidos e satisfatórios), puzzles de textos, desafios mentais (calma, você não sairá daqui como se tivesse lido Literatura Avançada, mas sim como se tivesse solucionado algum desafio lógico das revistas Super Interessante antigas) e interações com um emulador de um computador retrô fictício.
O jogo brinca com muito as interações que você tem com a máquina virtual que ele te proporciona e tem ótimas sacadas, principalmente devido ao texto muito bem traduzido e localizado para o Português. Os termos técnicos padrão não fazem muita diferença aqui. Os gráficos são belos para a proposta (exceto em uma parte onde o texto foi muito serrilhado me fazendo confundir um número com um símbolo), a parte sonora é mais focada em efeitos sonoros básicos  e uma música ambiente. 
Pony Island não é um jogo para todos, mas também não torna ninguém especial por zerá-lo. É uma experiência muito satisfatória e criativa. Recomendado principalmente para gamers com mais experiência, não pela sua dificuldade, mas pelo fato de que uma bagagem de outros gamers ajuda a aproveitar mais este título. 
É um game barato, então é muito fácil comprá-lo e testar para ver se agrada. 
Para mim foi um game nota 9/10, mas entendo alguém não se adaptar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198108898679', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 253, 'last_played': 1607289151}
review: Pony Island é uma mistureba. É uma paródia/homenagem a diversos estilos de jogos com uma pitada de ocultismo barato e vale muito a pena para se gastar umas poucas horas (o jogo é curto) do seu tempo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198319200107', 'num_games_owned': 396, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 364, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 363, 'last_played': 1608001764}
review:
Acabo de terminar este juego, es entretenido y tiene una historia que se ira descubriendo de a poco, pero que para completarla habria que terminar de nuevo el juego completo supongo o quizas buscando los capitulos donde se generan esas partes de su historia. El juego es bueno, y la idea es interesante, lo que me pudrio por un momento fue una serie muy repetida de puzzles, hacer el mismo estilo de puzzle tantas veces, llega un punto que cansa y enoja. Pero de todos modos lo recomiendo porque mas alla de eso, es entretenido, intentar descubrir la verdadera historia es interesante. En resumen, sos una pobre alma (como muchas otras)  atrapada en el infierno, representado en una maquina arcade, maquina controlada por el diablo y sus demonios que te intentaran trollear todo el tiempo, Lo unico que no me gusto ya cerca del final fue lo mencionado anteriormente de los puzzles, al principio estan buenos, pero despues de varias horas ya cansan, por suerte cuando me empece a hartar de tanto puzzle del mismo estilo, fue cuando ya casi se terminaban. 

Es un juego que tienen que tener en su biblioteca. 
Saludos compas!

author: {'steamid': '76561198351255474', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 385, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 385, 'last_played': 1606589707}
review:
知り合いに勧められて、セールがきたので買ってやりました。
「どんなゲーム？」と聞くと
「やったらわかるよ！レビューも見ずにやるんだよ！絶対ネットで調べるな！何も見ずにやるんだよ！」

気づけば実績解除すべてクリアするまでハマっていました。
自分はホラーが苦手なのですが、これは一味違ったホラーですんなりプレイできました。

author: {'steamid': '76561198875005578', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1546862067}
review:
[h1]О, уведомление![/h1]

[i]Осторожно, эта игра будет творить очень много странных сатанистских штук. Держите иконку святого Гейтса под рукой.[/i]

Как нам сразу говорят в трейлере - игра вовсе не о пони (хотя казалось бы). Мы заперты в некой адской аркаде, проиграв в которой, можно потерять душу. И поверьте, это будет происходить часто. Очень часто. Сможете ли вы одолеть самого дьявола плюсами и циклами? Включайте свои пони-лазеры и откручивайте запястье до упора, взлетаем.

[b]Плюсы:[/b]
+ Несмотря на монотонный поначалу геймплей, события развиваются быстро, а создатель не жалеет грибов, усеивая ими наш сюжетный путь.
+ Разные режимы игры. Придется не только прыгать, но еще и подумать.
+ Уйма впечатлений. Вы даже представить не можете, сколько эмоций может вызвать раннер с по- Кхм...
+ Все зависит от игрока. Не от героя, а именно от игрока. 

[b]Минусы:[/b]
- Очинна мало игрового времени. Хотелось бы подольше поиграть, поисследовать систему автомата и т.д.

[b]В итоге...[/b]
Замечательная инди-игрушка на вечер. После неё (да и в процессе) будет много вопросов без ответов, тотальный конфузъ и потребность подышать свежим воздухом. А оценка... Да какая тут оценка, дайте прикурить.

review:

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198139242870', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 221, 'last_played': 1553298542}
review:
This game is honestly such a masterpiece - in genre and creep factor, it is like a more interactive version of doki doki, but with the added creep factor of perverting traditionally childlike cute things (i.e, unicorns, cutesy arcade games)

I played this game without reading anything about it, and honestly I think that was the best way to figure it out. The gameplay is immaculate, the easter eggs are actually unexpected and enjoyable, and the actual arcade style gameplay itself is super clean and nostalgic. If you enjoy the eerieness of horror games rather than the body horror element, then you will seriously enjoy this game. I cannot recommend it enough, the subtle cleverness and deceptively simplistic style of the puzzles are probably my favourite thing about this game - but the effectiveness of the art is a close second.
